The Project Gossip Ghouls is the new film from R.J. Wilson Horror, written, directed, and edited by horror microshort filmmaker, R.J. Wilson. Gossip Ghouls is a teen film told in seven parts. The film will be shot like a 90s television show, with references to such programs of the era like Dawson�s Creek, Are You Afraid of the Dark? Goosebumps, and Recess. Because R.J. Wilson Horror creates microshorts, all of the segments will be less than 60 seconds long. The five middle segments will each correspond to one of the five characters, bookended by two full-cast segments. Each character has their own macabre story to tell, and will feature their own unique story. R.J. Wilson has a love for analog; he grew up in the age of video stores and recording your favorite shows onto tape. In essence, the film will appear as though it were stored on VHS. The film is about nostalgia. It�s about memories and storytelling. It�s about coming together, and how when someone says can say �remember when?�, people immediately fall into a trance, with waves of longing, fond memories and homesickness soaring through their body. Outreach/Exhibition Plans Gossip Ghouls is guaranteed distribution through Damnationland, the all-Maine made horror showcase. Every year, Damnationland brings an amassment of audience members to the State Theater in Portland, ME, around Halloween time, as Maine filmmakers set to scare the pants off of them with their content. Additionally, there are always DVDs of the films, as well as soundtracks that feature the music featured in the showcase, which can be found online or at your local Bull Moose. 2019 marks the tenth anniversary since Damnationland opened its doors to local independent filmmakers, and Gossip Ghouls will be opening and closing the program with several segments in between! Our Team - The Cast Hannah Daly as Autumn Cabrera Hannah Daly is a Portland-based actress and educator. Stage credits include Emily Webb in OUR TOWN (Theater at Monmouth, BroadwayWorld's Best Actress in a Play), Emmy in A DOLL�S HOUSE PART 2 (Good Theater), Irina in THREE SISTERS (Fenix Theatre), and Belle/Fred�s Wife in A CHRISTMAS CAROL (Portland Stage). Hannah has also been seen and heard in campaigns for Target, Hasbro, and on the Smithsonian Channel. Training: BFA in Acting from Syracuse University, Shakespeare�s Globe. A lifelong horror fan, Hannah is super excited to have the chance to dip her toes in the genre. Follow along @hannahkdaly & www.hannah-daly.com. Linda Line as Valerie Miller Linda is thrilled to be a part of this years independent film submission to the 10th anniversary of Damnationland! Raised on the stages of Southern Maine, she ventured down to pursue stage work in Miami, FL. Missing the slower, sweeter, side of life, she returned to Maine and soon found herself acting for film. From student films to union work to music videos and voice overs, Linda is excited to add some horror fun to the mix. She looks forward to this new adventure with an awesome group of talented artists! Emily Eberhart as Lindsey "Purple" DePerpignan Emily is very excited to be a part of GOSSIP GHOULS, her first project for Damnationland! A thespian of the stage, she is now making her way onto the big screen with festival and independent films such as Robbie Moore's BEGIN AGAIN and Crickett Cote's MY BABY SAW A BIRD. Emily is a normal 20-year-old aside from the fact that she goes to Germany every summer to visit her family. She is very excited to play Purple and hopes that everyone supports this team who will make this project a reality! Michelle Faria as Tabitha "Zuke" Zukowski Michelle Faria is a local performer from New England. She earned a BFA in Theater Performance at Salem State University and is also a singer and songwriter. She is excited to embark on her first film project with Gossip Ghouls! Hannah Perry as Quinn Felker Hannah Perry is a Maine actress, originally from Buckfield. She studied theatre at The University of Southern Maine and now acts in plays and films of all kinds! Hannah currently lives in Augusta with her boyfriend Mike and their dog Hank. You may have seen her in The Party at Damnationland 2018. Hannah is honored to participate in Damnationland once again and with so many cool and spoooooky folks! Xoxo Gossip Ghoul Our Team - The Crew R.J. Wilson - Director, Writer, and Editor R.J. Wilson is a filmmaker, editor, producer, and VHS hoarder based in Portland, Maine. For about five years, it has been his goal to �scare audiences in 60 seconds or less�; as such, his website, www.rjwilsonhorror.com, launched earlier this year, where you can watch his original horror microshorts and stay up to date with productions. From 2015 - 2017, he acted as one of several producers for Damnationland, and then as soundtrack producer in 2018. He also plays guitar for Portland thrashpunk and cokecore band, Eyeball. Breanna Leigh Penney - Producer Breanna Penney is an energetic filmmaker and avid adventurer in Portland, Maine. In the past, she has interned at Lone Wolf Media, an internationally established documentary group, and Bonfire films, working on both independent and client based projects. She is comfortable in both documentary and narrative production roles, while always looking for new ways to expand her knowledge. She is now working for Praxis Motion Pictures in Portland, Maine Rebecca Myshrall - Art Director/Costumer Rebecca Myshrall has been working on films in Portland for the past four years. She�s procrastinating on writing one of her own, but until then, making horror movies happen has become a bit constant in her mental frame. Please enjoy GOSSIP GHOULS. Joseph Hyland - Director of Photography Joseph Hyland has loved cinema since the age of 10. For this project, he will be pulling a lot of inspiration from his childhood, and his love of the 4:3 box frame. Additionally, he has been watching horror movies non-stop this past year to help bring these seven segments come to life. On the side, Joey also has a passion for making electronic music. Budget The budget is broken down into six departments: Equipment, Food, Art Direction/Costumes, Props (Built), Animation, and Misc. items. The biggest portions of our budget are going to Art Direction/Costumes and Equipment. The reason being we have five main characters and three separate outfits for each of them, as well as six different locations. Some of these costumes we will need to order in time for them to be delivered prior to the shoot. We will be renting Equipment as well, and unfortunately since we are unable to shoot everything in one weekend (there are no scenes at the same location), we will be shooting one day each throughout the summer, meaning, we can't rent all equipment for one weekend; instead, we will have to rent multiple times for each shoot. Food is a huge necessity, as we will need to feed both cast and crew on each of our shoot dates. It's one of the ways we thank everyone for doing their part on set, by giving them a nice hearty meal. There are some scenes that will need built Props and Animation sequences; part of the budget will be going to these departments to gather materials for said sequences. And as for Misc. items, we will be supplying gas to those who have to drive long distances, as well as renting cars for scenes that need them.

Update: EVERY Goal has been funded, and each pin pledge receives an equal amount in stickers! Example: 3 pins = 3 stickers. Scroll for all the info!  Thank you!  Hello everyone, my name is Ariel! I go by @theroseraptor on instagram.  I am a storyteller and an artist who loves pins. (and dinosaurs!)  In pursuit of my dream to tell stories, part of that journey now includes making pins. Yay! Although this is my first kickstarter, this is not my first time making a pin.  Share if you'd like to see more Dino-Knights unlocked, and support our fight against the Meteor!  The amazing thing about Kickstarter is the ability to pledge now and pay ONLY when the campaign is successful. If the initial goal is not funded, you will not be charged. There is no risk! You can also change your pledge amount at any time before the end of the 30 day campaign. By pledging to this Kickstarter, you are getting these adorable dinos at the best possible price, retail value is between 12$ to 14$. Yay savings!    All funds go towards the production, packing, and shipping of the pins. Let's unlock those stretch goals, knights! Pin details include: Gold plating  Two rubber backings  Back stamped  Backing cards  Glitter enamel (on select pins.)  Varied sizes  Really cute dinosaurs! This pin is a 1.25" gold plated pin with pink glitter enamel. It is the first pin I've made and I'm pretty proud of it. I hope this gives you confidence in backing this project!    Once surveys are sent out, this pin will be available as an option!  NEED TO CHANGE YOUR PLEDGE?  Early Birds: Add 8$ for each additional pin you'd like. Regular Pledge: Add 10$ for each additional pin you'd like. Stickers: Add 3$ for each additional sticker you'd like.  Once the campaign has ended I will send out surveys for the pins.  End June/early July orders will be made once funds are released from KS.  August the orders will be received, graded, sorted, and packed.  September all orders will be shipped!   FUNDING  70% will go towards manufacturing of the pins, 20% towards shipping and packaging, and the other 10% will be in Kickstarter fees.

Mythical Mika & The Land of Light Welcome to the Kickstarter for the first book of a nine book kids series that explores the concepts of ego & enlightenment in an action packed fantasy adventure. This story stars a tiny but powerful little girl, a curious cast of cats, a magical ukulele, and a diverse collection of characters coming together to create a new age fairytale that teaches kids the value of mindfulness, compassion, and acceptance while inspiring them to be the change this world needs. Mindful Mika was deep in meditation... The Message Below the surface this book explores concepts such as meditation, spirit science, harmonics, sacred geometry, yoga, mindfulness, aura alchemy, the chakra system, and how to overcome inherent human flaws that lie in all of us, to become your best self. I hope to equip children with the tools to practice mental and physical wellness promoting positive internal dialogue, higher self-esteem, & healthy lifestyle choices. Meet the Mythic, Mika. �Are you sure of your path?� With great conviction Mika nodded her head, �I am!� In that statement she set her intentions and committed herself mind, body, & soul. The Series Enter Mika (Mee-Kah). A little girl in a very big world. She must travel to the magical kingdom of the Land of Light and become the lands prophesized Mythic. As the Mythic she has been choosen to save the Queen of Quintessence and her Sacred Sages from the cats curse that has been cast upon them by the Empress of Ego. In this nine book series Mika travels through the many worlds of the Land of Light to face the sinful Dark Druids that block her chakras, overcoming them with powers and insight gained from saving the virtuous Sacred Sages. Can Mika save all of the Sages and face the Empress of Ego to rescue the Queen of Quintessence and free the land from the dark curse turning everyone into cats, Mika included, before it�s too late? Suddenly, the storm was upon them... Clinging desperately to her shattered ship, Narci�s wicked cackle trickled through clogged ears like bad reception as a fresh wave of evil energy barreled toward her. Narcissus the Nightmare leered from above dripping in a dark foreboding aura. Narci�s voice was all needles and nails as she shouted, �You don�t stand a chance little girl!� The First Book In the first book of the series, Mythical Mika & The Land of Light, Mika travels from the real world to a surreal dreamlike realm and begins her journey across the Land of Light. Accompanied by her soul guardian, a tiny cat named Spirit, and equipped with a magical ukelele, Mika sets out to bring Light back to the Land, which is quickly fading to darkness as the cats curse spreads. They seek out the sacred sage Lily the Light, keeper of the Oversoul Chakra, who has been transformed into a cat and captured by Narcissus the Nightmare, the first Dark Druid you encounter in the series. Mika must face her greatest fears and learn to recognize that there is nothing to fear but fear itself if she is to save her new companions and become the Mythic the Land of Light so desperately needs to overcome the shadow of ego that is spreading across this once magical paradise. Magic is everywhere, the numbers and shapes will lead you there. Align with the Nine and your true self you will find. The power of the universe in the palm of her hand, she finally understands how to make her stand and save the Land. The Inspiration Mika aims to empower young minds with the ancient knowledge that transcends any one culture of inherent human flaws and the behaviors we can exemplify to overcome these challenges and be our best self. I was inspired by my own journey traveling the world, interacting with a variety of cultures and spiritual beliefs, and exploring knowledge of ancient teachings, sacred geometry, numbers, chakra systems, meditation, mindfulness, enlightenment, the power of now, and ancient lore such as the seven sins & virtues, the emerald tablets, and other various mythologies to create a universal approach to spirituality and morality that can be interpreted openly and enjoyed despite various beliefs and backgrounds. I combine these sacred teachings with a creative and simple style to captivates all ages, heavily influenced by the video game and cartoon culture of my nineties childhood, to bring to life this Iliad for a new age. The time is now my friends, join me in manifesting this dream into a reality. Together we can create a New Age of literature for the next generation. In ages past, when Light first brought Life to this sacred land, a prophecy was written. A prophecy predicting the rise of the Mythic Mika. Mika began to slow as a land of faded beauty manifested before her. Softly she landed amongst the wildflowers, sporting a few new fluffy features of her own. �We have a long journey ahead of us, Mika. We must cross the Sea of Fear & face Narcisuss the Nightmare if we are to save Lily the Light, keeper of the oversoul chakra.� The Plan The vision I hope to manifest with your help is a vibrant fully illustrated children�s tale aimed at kids of all ages, and those eternally young at heart. In pursuit of this dream I have spent the past few years devoting all of my spare time to bringing this world to life. Countless hours of planning and daydreaming eventually gave way to a 64 panel sketched visual storyboard depicting the events in the first book, a first, second and third written draft, a series of watercolor sketches, and a collection of digital illustrations to convey the style and character designs. In addition to having all of the planning completed for the first book in the series, Mythical Mika and The Land of Light, I have outlined the following eight books ensuring the entire series will flow and have a sense of continunity. Your campaign contribution will allow me to devote my full time and attention to creating all 64 illustrations to bring the first book to life as well as writing and editing the final draft before publishing this one of a kind children�s story. Together we can inspire a whole new generation of young minds and teach them how to overcome their own limitations to become a real life hero. Imagine the lasting impacts of empowering the next generation with the knowledge to help save our own world through internal self-awareness, positive actions and personal accountability. Where your pledge is going to bring this story to life. �You are our prophesized Mythic. The one and only Hero who can save our kingdom. As your Spirit, I�ve come to guide you on your journey.� He paused thoughtfully as he sized her up. �I�ll warn you though, The Empress of Ego is no easy foe. Darkness follows wherever she goes.� The Concept Art Below are additional character images I have been experimenting with to capture the overall style that will be used to illustrate my story along with conceptual watercolor sketches created as part of planning the final illustrations necessary for this story. Through extensive planning, dedication, and hard work I hope to achieve magical and dreamy imagery and unique character designs to accompany a poetically written story and capture the imagination of young minds everywhere. Leaning against the far end of the boat, an odd ukulele was calling her name. Spellbound she reached for the instrument and strummed a few chords as they sailed off into the starry night. Magic is in the air. With magic in her heart, Spirit at her side, and the Queen�s dreamsake in hand, Mika felt unstoppable as they sailed into the rising sun. Made of sunsets & moonbeams, the Unity Uke has the power to help Mika bring light back to the land, if only she can learn to Align with the Nine and harness the Magic of Music. Rose the Radiant, the Queen of Quintessence has been captured by the Empress of Ego and trapped in her pure spirit form as a cat. Big hypnotic eyes, unique costume designs, and wild hair colors give life to a simplified style, creating one of a kind visually stimulating character designs. Surreal themed based elements lend a dreamlike quality to the character design. This ensures a diverse and unique cast of characters that will stand out and draw in young readers. Embedded design elements and elegant costumes create a sense of wonder that engages the minds eye. Inspired by our shared world culture, a diverse and inclusive cast of characters allows children from the world over to feel represented in their favorite bedtime story. With sunshine strands and eyes swirling like the seas, she had an air of summer breezes and ice cream dreams. Hidden beneath that layer of sweet serenity she was all spice and firecrackers inside. Mika�s dream encounter with the Queen of Quintessence, Rose the Radiant. Trapped in the cats curse cast upon her by the Empress of Ego, she has used the last of her powers to reach out to Mika through their psychic connection. Drawn to him like a puppet on strings, Mika chases after Spirit as he disappears into the fabled Crystal Caverns. Spirits first encounter with Mika, he discovers her deep in meditation. He�s traveled far from another land seeking a hero to save his kingdom, The Land of Light. Mika try�s to stop Spirit but he�s gone in the blink of the eye. She must decide if she will embrace her fate or let him escape. Mika stumbles into the Crystal Caverns, slipping & tumbling into a portal and falling through an endless void. Mika is a little girl, in a very big world. Little she may be, yet littler still could stop her in her tracks. Title will be revealed when this reward is unlocked. Come meet the creator!! Find me at my art stand every Saturday in Saxapahaw, NC. The Creator I am a 28-year-old Artist, Writer, & Mother from North Carolina. My biggest inspirations in this life are my small family, my best friend and husband, our perfect two year old little boy River Kai, two huskies, and a pride of five cats. My son is the light of my life, he drives me to be the best version of myself and inspires me to create the change I want to see in the world. Growing up I was a big superhero, video game, and fantasy geek who spent most of my free time locked in my room playing Nintendo games, role playing online, and binge reading fantasy novels. In my early twenties I met my husband, sold all of our stuff, and moved to the Hawaiian islands. I spent several years there exploring my spirituality, receiving particular inspiration from a lost & found copy of Eckhart Tolles The Power of Now. As a team my husband and I spent our free time, while not exploring the boundless natural beauty of the islands, studying a plethora of things from ancient teachings of a variety of cultures that included Egyptian, Vedic, Greek, and even Atlantean teachings, to sacred geometry and the principles of numbers from their effects on a universal level, to their relationships with harmonics and music. We also delved deep into a vast collection of ancient lores, myths, and fairytales to explore the repeated story elements throughout the ages that address the core corruption of humanity when we subcome to our sins and allow the infestation of ego. After our time in Hawaii we spent a few more years traveling before we settled, started a family and bought our first home near the Haw River in North Carolina. I now find myself, as a creator, equipped with all of the tools needed to set out to combine all of these life experiences and insights into one epic nine book story that blends science, magic and spirituality into an adventure packed children�s book. I appreciate you taking the time to check out the campaign, thank you from the bottom of my heart for your support and I can�t wait to see what we can create together. Aloha from my family to yours.

Hi! I�m Mary Helen. My sister, Sarah, and I are fledgling ceramicists living in Austin, Texas. We began working with clay in earnest a little over a year ago. Since then, our enthusiasm (or is it obsession?) has grown tremendously. Ceramic feather holder Hand painted bowl WHY WE NEED A KILN As with most artistic pursuits, a huge part of the journey is practice. We need to make A LOT of pots. That means we have to fire A LOT of pots. Right now we are firing our work at a community studio, but that option is not ideal. It�s slow. It�s expensive, and we aren�t learning anything by letting someone else perform that part of the process. OUR KILN STORY As luck would have it, my neighbor Melanie Schopper, an established ceramics artist, was moving her long-tone studio and offered to share her kiln with us by moving it into my garage. This is the perfect opportunity for us to have access to a kiln and to learn from someone who really knows their stuff. OUR $$ GOAL The kiln has been moved in but we will need to install a special electrical outlet before we can get it up and running. That�s where you come in. We need to raise $1079 to have the outlet installed. GET SOME POTS!! Being novice ceramicists we know that we can�t offer the same professional level of work as master artists, but we can offer our own personal touch and unique creative style. For every donation made we will create a one-of-a-kind piece JUST for you. Hand shaped pendant necklaces Sgraffito Mug Moon baby wall pocket CUSTOM WORK You can let us choose the color and theme for your piece or make a special request along with your donation. We will do our best to honor your request but please understand that the finished piece is likely to be very different than you might expect! Thank you so much for your support!! Doll Parts Jewelry Dish Doll parts Wall Hanging

ABOUT THE ARTIST. Hello, everybody! I'm Josh, and welcome to the kickstarter for my new art-book, "IMAGINE." Some of you might already know me from instagram as LOBSTERSQUIRREL where I post all kinds of sketches, daily doodles and illustrations using the Procreate app on an iPad pro. Outside of that, I work a full-time job as a storyboard artist in the animation industry with past credits on, Marvel entertainment's Avengers assemble and Black Panther's Quest, and currently, I'm working at Dreamworks animation on the new Fast and Furious animated TV show. ABOUT THE BOOK. My plans for the book are simple! I thought I'd take the hundreds of sketches and illustrations I've done over the past couple of years and pack them all into one book and share them with everybody. You'll find a wide range of work from character design, environments, backgrounds, fan art and full step by step break-downs from rough sketches to line art, and fully colored pieces. The book will also include some never before seen artwork! The book itself will be a perfect bound soft cover with 128, full color pages, and will measure 11" W x 8.5" T. SAMPLE PAGES A quick look at what you'll find in, "IMAGINE." - Step by step processes, fan art... Character design... Environment and background illustrations, and more! REWARDS STRETCH GOALS Thank you for the support! I greatly appreciate it!

The first time I ever heard Tracy Chapman sing she blew my mind! As a homesick teenager working in France, her courage and energy inspired me so deeply I was compelled to write home to Ireland and tell my biggest fan, my Dad, that I finally knew for certain what I wanted to do with my life. �It won�t be an easy life� he wrote back, but the die was already cast. I had no idea the emotional roller-coaster path my life would take. Many times I felt the price I was paying to pursue my passion was too much and I often wanted to scream �I can�t do this anymore, I give up�, but the Irish blood that runs in my veins doesn�t know how to quit and the love I have for it grows ever stronger. Music has always inspired me. It�s the ultimate healer, the ultimate connector, the universal language that bridges all cultures. It speaks to our souls in the most deeply personal of tongues, it lifts us in our sorrow and animates us in our joy. Making music that resonates with others has been my lifelong passion. But the world has changed since I first picked up a guitar and sang. Even the record labels I aspired to be a part of no longer exist. Technology has wiped out the dreams of most of my kind, but it has opened the door to those who are willing to adapt, to evolve their craft and to take risks. I need you all to be my record company now. I�ve left my family (again) and emigrated to my spiritual home, America, determined to prove to myself that when you love what you do, all dreams are possible. If my journey thus far has prepared me for anything � it has prepared me for the risk I am about to take. Thanks to John Bush & Matt Hubbard of (Edie Brickell & The New Bohemians) , I�ve made an album very personal to me. It reflects the journey I�ve been privileged to take, it reflects the people who came into my life who helped me over hurdles I thought would sink me, it reflects the desire in all of us to leave our own personal mark on the world. It�s my song to those of you who are struggling to find your path in a world that often seems indifferent, it�s my urging to you to never give up. It�s me, with all my insecurities, all my fears and all my hopes, and I�m placing it in your hands � with all my love and trust. I don�t know how Kickstarter works, but I know how love does, and I know that the more you spend it the greater it gets. It�s why I called the album "You Can�t Run Out Of Love". I've launched this Kickstarter Campaign to raise funds to promote the album, to maximize its chances of getting to those who can be lifted by it, to give it a fighting chance in a noisy world. Will you help me do what I have to do to promote this album? It�s made, it�s pressed, it�s ready to go. Here's a breakdown of the costs: I believe we are all born to create, it might get knocked out of us through life, but it always calls us and we can choose to do something about our burning desires or ignore it. The ball is always in your court. I believe these new songs are a form of healing and everyone needs some sort of healing. We're not broken but we don't mind a little WD-40 every now and then... :-) Will you help me FIND MY AUDIENCE for this record? Thank you all, XOXOX

It's time to manifest the life you want and spread positivity within yourself. The Good Intentions deck was created as a tool to recenter yourself in tough times, help you see the bigger picture in situations and dispel any anxiety you're facing about your future and circumstances. I love doing tarot readings for myself when I'm feeling anxious about situations and wanted to combine the relaxing practice of pulling cards and meditating with my habit of journaling. I currently have an Etsy shop called The Good Intentions where I sell crystals and wanted to add this fun, peaceful deck to my shop! However, with all intricate print orders, there's minimum quantities to meet affordable price points. So, here I am on Kickstarter - launching my deck and seeking to spread positivity and introspection to all of you! When we exceed our funding goal (little mini manifestation there) there of course will be stretch goals! Right now the decks are packaged with shrink-wrap, however, exceeding the goal will allow for fun upgrades like boxes and tins to store your decks in! Who knows, maybe a little citrine crystal cluster to manifest prosperity in your life is a better stretch goal reward! When the times comes to decide, I will send out a survey and find an upgrade you guys are excited about! The deck contains 36 unique intention cards that fall within three categories: the self, the journey, and the mind. Each card is 2.25" x 3.5", is printed on superior smooth playing card material with a gloss finish. See updates and more from my Instagram here. UPDATE: Hl! We've reached our minimum goal thanks to your support! We remain optimistic of meeting our stretch goal of $17,300, to cover long overdue repairs and improvements for Meleana, our solar-powered mobile studio. Before elaborating there, we uploaded our completed video project - see our NEW main campaign video above! Were able to pay all outstanding bills, and most importantly, it turned out to be an amazing end product. Please enjoy what your generosity made possible. Stretch goal: The majority of funds raised beyond our minimum goal would go toward long overdue repairs and improvements to Meleana, our solar-powered mobile studio. A minority would go toward higher than anticipated event costs. Built from a refurbished 76 Airstream trailer, Meleana serves as a classroom on wheels for our youth across our partner schools. Meleanas high-end, industry-standard equipment, along with many of Hawaiis top musicians, engineers and videographers - whom we refer to as the Mana Maoli Collective, also provide fee-for-service offerings to individuals, businesses and other nonprofits, as a means to feed our programs, while providing our youth a real-world internship and learning environment. ====== Be a Part of Something BIG, meaningful and inspiring. We're working on a new video project and we invite you to join us. 1000 youth, artists & collaborators across 4 islands & 14 schools will re-imagine an iconic song of universal resonance. Our 1st 2 collaborations with Playing for Change surpassed 15 million views, yet we feel this next one is our most powerful piece yet! Before its worldwide premiere, the video will be shown at an unprecedented Hoomau & Mana Mele joint concert at Victoria Ward Park. featuring youth from 26 Hawaiian immersion & charter schools across 3 islands, and an all-star lineup of artists featured in the video. The trailer video shown above is a sneak peek of what we're working on now. This is a project under THE MANA MELE PROGRAM, the experience that's better seen, heard, and felt. The series of videos below produced by students, college interns, and Mana Maoli Collective industry pros provides background on this program. Who We Are Mana Maoli�s vision is to facilitate individual and community healing and empowerment by fostering lifelong learners who think, feel, and act in ways that are pono (harmonious, righteous). We serve Hawaii�s youth by giving them opportunities to perpetuate and evolve cultural practices as they adapt to and embrace the modern world. Our current primary focus is the Mana Mele Program, which teaches ABCs - Academics, Business, Culture - through its Music/Multimedia Academy, Meleana, and over 200 musicians, engineers and videographers of the Mana Maoli Collective. Within the past year, the Mana Mele Program delivered the following results: 42,177 Student Contact Hours 2051 student participants 105 mentors engaged 400 students received college/career readiness services 111 Knowledge Resource Products produced 46 live events at schools and in the community OUR CURRENT PROJECT - VIDEO PREMIERE: HONOLULU & WORLDWIDE We're gearing up for a highly anticipated video & host a community event that brings together youth, leaders, and music & multimedia industry professionals to pay homage to the rich culture and history of Hawai�i. When students join us in creating music videos and performing at our concerts, it serves as a platform for them to hike, or demonstrate, application of their learning in real world settings. Their acquired skills contribute to a product that is shared with the world. While we have successfully secured the vast majority of funds needed for this video and premiere event project, reaching our minimum goal of $7,800 is needed to cover final post-production expenses below. Any funds raised in excess of $7,800 will be used for long overdue repairs and improvements to Meleana, our solar-mobile studio, to continue to be able to do projects like this one, as youth learn from the process in a real-world setting. Owning a fishing kayak has never been easier. We're proud to present the brand new Point 65 KingFisher, the world's first modular trimaran fishing kayak. We wanted to make owning a fishing kayak easy. A kayak that can take you anywhere - regardless of how much space or strength you have to store and carry it. A kayak that�s as easy to handle outside the water as it is on it. Modular kayaks can go places most kayaks can�t. The two halves of the KingFisher snap apart in seconds and easily fit into your car, apartment or even as checked-in luggage on an airplane. Plus, half a kayak is twice as easy to carry! One person can easily load, unload and assemble the KingFisher. No roof-racks or storage space? No problem! The KingFisher�s flexibility doesn�t stop with its modular design. You have the choice of using your legs, arms, or motor to get where you want to go. The slender hull design makes for smooth, effortless paddle strokes if you want to go the old-fashioned route. The optional Impulse Drive is ready and waiting when you need your hands free, using the power of your legs to propel you forward or backward. Steering is a breeze with our handy rudder controls and you can fit almost any motor to the KingFisher's aft deck. A fishing kayak that still feels like a kayak. This beautifully designed boat melts into the natural surroundings. No disturbing wake, no loud noises or smelly motor fumes. Feel relaxed as you paddle, sit, stand, and fish. All with complete confidence in the KingFisher to support your weight and movements. With multiple settings & heights, the Game Chair adjusts to you - not the other way round. Perfect for when you�re patiently waiting for the next bite, setting up your line, or wrangling your latest catch! This boat is decked out with everything you need to have the best possible fishing experience. Multiple Rod Parks, super-comfy adjustable Game Chair, two spacious storage hatches and plenty of compatible attachment rails and bars for anything else you want to add on top. All of our kayaks are made from high quality, durable, moulded HTP plastics free from harmful chemicals and dyes. The material used is 100% recyclable, and all manufacturing remnants (like cut out hatches) are recycled. We put every model through extensive durability testing to make a product that will last through many adventures. And, thanks to our 'modular' spare parts design system, if any piece gets damaged or broken, you can easily replace an individual part instead of scrapping your entire kayak. When designing the KingFisher, we set out to tackle the biggest challenges of owning a fishing kayak. You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 When kayak fishing, you often need your arms and hands free for fishing. The optional ImpulseDrive easily pops into its slot in the KingFisher kayak and effectively propels you forward and backward using leg power. The pedal drive unit is extremely light-weight and is one of the few pedal-driven units on the market that can be driven both forward - and in reverse. With your largest muscle group in play, kayak fishing becomes easier and more efficient than ever. The Impulse Drive is a revolutionary pedal-drive system designed around a very simple premise: if a product is designed to be used in the water it should be 100% corrosion proof. Featuring a high performance encased shaft drive design, that is immune to water damage, the Impulse Drive will not corrode or degrade in water. Not only does this design dramatically reduce wear but it also provides a high performance system that is 100% user serviceable. The Impulse Drive is incredibly versatile for the retailer and end user. You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 The Trimaran hull is the secret to the the KingFisher's stability, speed and lightweight design. Trimarans evoke a vision of stability. A conventional monohull must balance conflicting needs of resistance and stability. You want a narrow, skinny hull to reduce resistance and paddling effort, but you need a wide hull to maintain vessel stability and keep the kayak upright. The trimaran separates these two design requirements by using three strategically-placed hulls to maximize stability but keep the overall width to a minimum. Primarily, trimarans deliver stability in a very power efficient package. In order to maintain the same stability in a regular monohull kayak, the hull width must be wider. A wider hull makes the kayak awkward and cumbersome to paddle, adds extra weight, and significantly decreases portability. You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. The super comfy KingFisher Game Chair, combined with the kayak�s world-class stability, speed, and logical accessory positioning, makes it a serious fishing machine in all water types. The front, middle and rear sections have rails along both sides, and can fit RAM, Scotty, or other accessories securely. Flush-mounted rod holders are located on either side of the Kingfisher, with integrated rod-holder recesses and rod-tip protectors. You can relax knowing your rods will be held in place while you paddle, pedal or motor through the water. The KingFisher has well-placed, generous storage space for all your gear. Below the Game Chair, you'll find space for your tackle boxes for easy access. There are front and rear hatches with a removable liner for equipment, battery packs, etc. There is also a rear cargo area with secure bungees and floor-mounted aluminum rails. The super efficient, hand-controlled twin rudders help you maneuver your KingFisher with ease and precision. The dual steering handles with fingertip control are located on either side of the Game Chair, and the rudders can be locked in place to give you more options for steering. Since 1996, we've been passionate about designing kayaks and redefining the kayak adventure. Point 65 is a family business, run by a close-knit team in our Stockholm, Sweden HQ. We're proud of our Scandinavian roots and take inspiration from both the idyllic natural surroundings and the innovative design culture. In fact, Point 65 is named after the co-ordinates of the island of R�nnsk�r, a magical place in the North of Sweden featuring an iconic lighthouse looking out over an archipelago of hundreds of small islands. We've designed & developed over 30 kayaks, and you also might recognize our brand of Point 65 Boblbee hardshell, impact protective backpacks. Our heritage may be Swedish, but you can find our kayaks all over the world. We partner with world-class product distributors to stock our products in stores everywhere. You can also find our kayaks being used for outdoor excursions, hotel guests and rental fleets. You love coffee and good design. The Ratio Six is the coffee maker you've been waiting for. I'm a coffee equipment nerd, and this is what I've been working on for 3 years. I started Clive Coffee 10 years ago that imports customized, high quality, and expensive espresso machines directly from Italy. Why should espresso enthusiasts be the only ones with great looking equipment, I wondered? The Ratio Six is my attempt to offer an incredibly easy-to-use, beautiful-to-behold, pleasure-to-own coffee maker, at a price point that more people can afford. Coffee matters. It can provide the basis of a quiet bit of solitude to start your day, or a drink to share with a new friend, or a finale to a great dinner with those you love. Let Ratio brew amazing coffee for whatever you're doing with your time! -Mark Hellweg, Ratio founder One Button Simplicity. Simplify your coffee routine to the touch of a button. The Ratio Six�s Bloom, Brew, and Ready phases run in sequence, delivering a perfect (and easy) cup of coffee every time. Love pour over brewed by a skilled barista? So do we. But sometimes you need to *quickly* make great coffee. Ratio will handle the extraction for you. Just add cold water and freshly ground coffee. Delicious, Perfectly Extracted Coffee. For Everyone. Our coffee machines are used by Top Chef champions and coffee professionals. You can find the Ratio Eight in Palm Springs resort suites and in tiny coastal restaurants producing 15 course dinners reviewed by the New York Times. We wanted to expand the availability of great coffee, and the Six offers trusted coffee best practices in a more affordable format. The Ratio Six emulates a skilled barista pour over process, precisely metering water flow through both the Bloom and Brew phases. All of the taste. None of the work. Trusted by those with great palates. Fibonacci Spiral Shower Head & Bloom After the button is pressed, Ratio gets to work on brewing great coffee. First, the powerful heating element sends hot water bubbling up through handblown glass supply lines to the stainless steel spiral shower head. Water is distributed over the ground coffee, causing a bubbly interaction called a �bloom.� The control board allows the Bloom to settle before delivering the rest of the hot water, slowly, near the ideal temperature (200�). The result? More evenly extracted grounds and a more amazing cup of coffee. Designed for today. And tomorrow. We designed the Ratio Six for longevity with precision formed stainless steel, borosilicate glass, and high end BPA-free copolymers. Every inch is built to last and covered by a 5-year warranty. Compact Size, Full Performance The Six will fit in most kitchens without taking up too much countertop real estate. Flexible Brewing The Ratio Six ships with a thermal carafe designed for flat-bottom basket coffee filters. Prefer a conical filter? You can also use the Ratio Eight Thermal Carafe or Glass Carafe with a Chemex paper filter or stainless steel reusable Ratio Kone. Both the Ratio Six and Eight have the same brewing capacity (1.3 liters / 40 ounces). Read all the details on the Ratio Eight versus the Six. Modern Quality, 5 Year Warranty There are coffee machines that make great coffee, and there are coffee machines that look great. Ratio Six is both, combining form and function. Designed in Portland, Oregon, every Ratio machine is meticulously assembled by hand from components we manufacture with our overseas partner. While common appliances often have a built-in obsolescence and 1-3 year life span, every Ratio is built to last and covered by a 5-year limited warranty. Technical, Yet Simple All of the features you need, with nothing that will clutter up your routine or provide too many options when you just want a cup of great coffee. Reach Goal If we hit $100k in this campaign, we will offer an all black version of the Ratio Six to all supporters. Share the good word! (eight 5oz. cups) 5-year warranty Powerful 1400 watt/110 volt (230 volt releases early 2020) Dimensions: 13.5" deep x 6.75" wide x 14.25" tall Weight: 8 lbs Cantilevered top made of precision stamped stainless steel with a satin finish. In thinking about the future, we asked ourselves: could we deliver the best of the Eight, but smaller and at a lower price? The result is the Ratio Six. Breathe your best with the world�s first magnetic nasal band that opens your nasal passageways to their widest capacity, allowing you to experience full, deep breathing like never before. Intake works by allowing you to breathe through your nose even at increased heart rates, unlocking a physiological process that helps your body build strength and increase resilience--even in the face of the most challenging training regimens. We know this sounds like too small of a change to make such a big difference, but we�re not the only ones who are getting behind nose breathing �its benefits are being talked about from the Washington Post to the New York Times to the Joe Rogan Podcast. Because you�re breathing more efficiently, you�ll be performing more efficiently, whether you�re a hardcore athlete or someone who just wants to give their body the best edge it can get. From cycling to yoga to weightlifting to running, Intake will be your most steadfast training partner. Traditional nasal strips can't compare to the Intake Band. Intake opens your nasal passages far wider than nasal strips, stays on through sweaty exercise, and doesn't collapse upon inhale. See the rest of these testimonials and others at the bottom in �Testimonials from GEN 1 Users�. Seen enough? CLICK HERE to be among the first people to get our new breathing device! Clean each side of your nose with an included alcohol wipe to remove any dirt or oils from the skin. Using the applicator, apply one adhesive tab to each nostril just above the pinch point. Press the edges of the tab into your skin. Apply the Intake band over your nose. The magnetic ends of the band will �click� into the tabs, opening your nose. Unlike some campaigns, we don't aim to make money on your shipping fees. By calculating shipping after the campaign is over, you save up to 30% on shipping fees. Shipping charges above are estimates. Final shipping charges will appear on the post-campaign survey and may vary slightly from these estimates. US estimates apply to the lower 48 contiguous states only. Alaska/Hawaii shipping is charged at �Rest of World� level. �Rest of World� prices are an estimated range. There�s sort of a biological catch-22 when it comes to nasal vs. oral breathing Generally speaking, our noses are more efficient breathing machines than our mouths. When you breathe through your nose, you�re able to pull oxygen into all five lobes of the lungs, whereas your mouth can only pull oxygen to the two uppermost lobes. This act of fully stimulating the lungs has a positive domino effect on the body, ultimately boosting blood flow and helping protect organs and muscles from damage. Here comes the catch: During increased heart rates, our noses physically can�t inhale quickly enough to deliver air at the rate our bodies need. So, we rely on breathing through our mouths, which can deliver the requisite amount of oxygen, but can�t create the positive domino effect achieved through nose breathing. In fact, chronic mouth breathing actively hinders physical performance and recovery. Sounds like a problem, right? That�s where Intake comes in. The Intake band keeps your nasal passage ways open at their widest capacity, allowing you access to deep breathing like never before. Intake ensures not only that you�re getting the most out of your workout, but that your body has full access to the processes it needs to be at its absolute best. DEHYDRATING and IRRITATING - Your mouth can�t filter air the same way your nose can, so the air you take in orally can cause inflammation in your lungs and throat. Exhaling through your mouth can also contribute to whole body dehydration, as water molecules leave your body more rapidly: you can see this on cold days, when the temperature makes the water vapor visible. UPSETS BLOOD PH - Nasal breathing balances CO2 levels in the bloodstream, which helps to keep the pH of our blood in its proper range. Mouth breathing decreases CO2 level, which in turn makes blood too alkaline. CAUSES PERPETUAL STRESS-STATE - Breathing through your mouth causes hyperventilation, which triggers the sympathetic nervous system and activates our fight-or-flight response. When this side of our nervous system is activated, our focus drops and our stress response goes up, contributing to feelings of anxiety and depression--despite the endorphins exercise can stimulate. INCREASE NITRIC OXIDE - Nitric Oxide is formed in the nasal cavity, and it�s vital to your body�s function. It�s a vasodilator, which means it allows your blood vessels to relax so that blood flow increases and your body is able to deliver more oxygen to your muscles and organs. This means optimal endurance and stamina, and faster recovery. BOOST COGNITIVE FUNCTION - Nasal breathing stimulates the amygdala and hippocampus, balancing your mood and improving short term memory and focus. It also stimulates the parasympathetic nervous system, which is associated with feelings of centeredness and relaxation. MAINTAIN HEALTH - Breathing exclusively through your nose protects your immune system in two ways: your nose filters particulates and humidifies the air reaching your lungs, which cuts down on inflammation, and the nitric oxide in your sinus cavity acts as an antimicrobial, helping to inhibit pathogen growth before it can enter your body. Most of our users are professional athletes--but you don�t have to be to benefit from Intake. We�re not. We�re just regular humans who wanted to feel good when we were going for a jog or winding down with a yin yoga class. The solution we found works so well that we want you to have access to it too, whether you�re an Olympic trainee or a desk jockey or somewhere in between. The idea behind Intake is simple: if you can breathe your best, you can be your best, no matter where you are. The hours you spend recharging are just as important as the ones you spend up and running�if not more. While we designed Intake for high impact activity, many of our test phase users have also used Intake for sleep, and have reported feeling more rested and energized upon waking. Deepen your sleep, cut down on snoring, and utilize your breathing like never before. After over a year of development and testing we are excited to offer the new and improved Intake Breathing System to Kickstarter FIRST! The improvements to the Intake Sport Band: New contours for increased comfort & fit across the bridge of the nose New softer edges for additional comfort against the skin Even radius for custom printing capabilities Changes in Intake Tabs: New method of manufacturing for minimal exposure of adhesive to air for better adhesion. New pull tabs for easier application New sweat channel to expel sweat built up under the steal disk The Intake Band comes in sizes Small, Medium, and Large, and the sizing is determined by the width of your nose. We�ve designed the range to be fairly universal�if you�re of average size, a Medium is a good place to start. Based on our test phase users, we typically recommend a small for kids and teens, a medium for women, and medium or large for men. Here�s where it gets a little more complex: if you�re wearing Intake for high-impact activity, or in a sport that requires goggles or a faceplate, we recommend sizing down. A smaller size band will create less pull on the adhesive tabs, making the band more likely to stay put. If you�ll primarily be using Intake for sleep or lower-impact activities (for instance, a moderate gym set), we recommend choosing your normal size or even sizing up�the larger sized bands are less convex, meaning they�ll pull your nostrils open wider and allow greater airflow. However, this also means they�ll pull harder on the adhesive tabs, meaning you�ll potentially get less run time out of the tabs. We get it: this is kind of a weird product. Before we started Intake, we�d all heard about the benefits of breathing through your nose, but we�d likened it to eating broccoli: good for you, but weird to do all the time. Well, we�re here now to tell you that nasal breathing is both good for you and decidedly not weird to do all the time. Actually, it�s pretty incredible So, we�re launching a Kickstarter campaign because we think this product--while humble--is truly revolutionary, and we want to share it with you. Through our research and test phases, we�ve realized that having a little help breathing through your nose can radically improve your athletic endurance, your recovery, your mental aptitude, and your mood. Our Kickstarter target is to raise enough money to make our production process more efficient. With support from our backers, we�ll be able to increase both the accessibility and affordability of Intake, and be able to develop different product models for our increasingly diverse customer base. The faster we�re able to adapt to accommodate our growing market, the more people we will be able to help. Ultimately, this all boils down to one single, driving force: we want to help you breathe your best, because that means you can be your best. Just try it for yourself. You�ll feel the difference. CLICK HERE Connect with us on Instagram to see Team Intake in action @intakebreathing #teamintake We�re a friend-and-family owned athletic company based out of Santa Barbara, California that�s dedicated to helping everyone achieve their own cutting edge. The Intake team hitting the slopes in Mammouth Ca, with our first tabs from our GEN 1 band. (2017) We launched in 2018 with our first generation product, a magnetic nasal breathing strip that our users tell us is--not to toot our own horn--the best on the market in terms of oxygen flow, comfort, and durability. Our original design was conceived by athlete and medical entrepreneur Jim Castillo (if you�ve ever been in need of a knee brace, you can thank him for designing the most widely-used model). Want to know more? Drop us a line! We�d love to be in touch. --- In Partnership with Funded Today In partnership with Funded Today: The world's most successful crowdfunding agency. I've designed a 3 in 1 bag that can be used across the board. A Tank bag, Backpack, Camera bag. Its the Triple Threat Bag. Whats really great about it is that no matter what you need it for, its versatile enough for everyone. This all really began out of my need as a photographer and motorcycle rider, to have the proper travel and carrying cases for my important equipment. I needed something that was strong enough to protect my gear while I was busy trying not to break it, or myself. I love traveling, so if Im not doing that on my bike, Im on my way to somewhere cool where Im taking photos. I wanted a bag that was versatile enough for all of that. Like most photographers that ride you want your camera at the ready. Not packed deep inside your luggage. Riding with a backpack on for long periods of time can be tiring and fatigue your back, so having the option to place it on your motorcycle tank or strap it to the back of your bike is great. Ive really tested this bag out, riding with it, traveling, carrying it around. It works! Its also my perfect carry on bag for flying. Fitting perfectly under the planes seat. Whether Im on one of my own bikes or renting one on a trip, packing can be kind of a challenge. Lets face it..packing in general is a challenge, with or without a bike. I wanted to make that easier for people. I want it to be an easy decision for anyone, from a professional photographer, to a new rider, to anyone itching to go get out and travel.
