The Uinta Daypack This packable daypack is brimming with your favorite features that fit in the palm of your hand. From the waterproof 25L capacity and 30D ripstop material to the anti-theft pockets and �Brain� pouch on the top, you just found your new favorite go-to pack. The minimal look hides the functional pockets, which are right where they should be in a pack. When packed down, it stays incognito so you are ready to go on your day adventures. Have you ever tried a packable daypack only to find that it is basically just a cheap sack of material? Or maybe you have been bringing your high quality backpack with you on all your trips and travels? The Uinta Daypack brings you a high quality feature heavy backpack in the palm of your hand! Key Features Packs Down to the Size of Your Hand 30D Ripstop Material Water Resistant With DWR Coating 25 L Capacity Anti-theft Pockets Strategically Placed Against Your Back. Hydration Bladder Compatible All Zippers Sealed All Zippers YKK Ultra Lightweight (Only 14 oz) Cargo Strap For Extra Storage Roll Top For Water Seal G-hook Reflective Front Zippers For Visibility Brain Pouch Adjustable Sternum Strap DSLR Camera Quick Access 25L Capacity The daypack fits into your pocket to be stowed away, yet it can be filled with all of your gear for a day trip. This is enough for your typical gear setup like water bottles, food, extra clothes, cameras, phone, and other everyday carry gear. 25 Liters is like 40 apples, 400 golf balls, or 6000 marbles, for those of us who measure things that way. The pockets on the outside are great for extra gear and a cargo strap for carrying large items like a jacket, tripod, or a skateboard. The main pocket also is large enough for up to 18" laptops! Packable The daypack packs into it's own zippered pocket so there's no stuff sack to lose! This is one of the defining characteristics of the daypack. It packs down into it's own pocket to be stowed out of the way until it is needed. It can easily fit inside any travel bag ready to be used on those days walking around Machu Picchu or exploring the Neuschwanstein castle. The pack fits into its own pocket so there is no stuff sack to lose! Water Resistant Hopefully you never get rained on this much, but if you are, we've got you covered! All Zippers are Sealed, All are YKK The inside of the pack will keep your stuff confidently dry with a DWR coated 30D Nylon Ripstop. Who wants to open a pack to find a wet camera or have to eat a soggy sandwich? Not us. The outside pockets also have sealed zippers, and will keep things dry from rain or water splashing. Anti-Theft Keep your gear secure where you know it can't be accessed by anyone but you. Secure pockets give you the confidence of keeping your gear protected, yet its easily accessed by only you. The main pocket is for your laptop or tablet, with a smaller pocket for your phone, passport, or wallet. This pocket gives easy access to take a quick shot, respond to a message, or pay for something. The anti-theft pockets cannot be reached by anyone without swinging the pack to your side, which allows for easy access of your valuables. Keep your valuables hidden and touching your back, where you can feel that they are secure. Nobody has access to the pockets against your back except for you. Gear Access That Makes Sense The Roll Top lets you easily take gear in and out. Quick access through the side vertical zipper (sealed). The roll top opens wide for easy stuffing of your pack with all your gear, while the sealed side zipper allows for easy access without having to open the top again. It's the best of both worlds! Premium, Low Profile Materials Only the highest quality materials are used for the daypack. The main fabric is an incredibly strong 30D Nylon Ripstop, with a DWR water resistant coating. This will keep water out, scratches off, and will last a long time. Every zipper is water sealed and are the industry leading YKK with a soft grip TPU molded zipper pull. All of these have been field tested to last the test of rugged conditions. We have also decided to change the logo to black due to popular demand! We will be getting a mock up of what it will look like soon but in the meantime use your vivid imagination to picture the logo black (shouldn't be too hard). The Straps and Adjusters The shoulder straps on this pack are as wide as a standard backpack (2") and have a light padding to provide comfort while still being lightweight. The mesh on the underside of the shoulder straps gives a cool and lightweight feeling, while still keeping their strength from the reinforcements designed in along the sides. The shoulder straps are extra long so every body type can wear the pack comfortably. Shoulder Strap (Left) has a soft mesh on the outside with padding on the inside. Sternum strap (right) can adjust up and down and open wider. Sternum straps should stand the test of time, that's what we believe. The sternum strap is super robust and has a light stretchy section so it is extra comfy. It can be adjusted up, down, and wide to fit every person's body type. The strap dimensions are: 18" (45cm) length padded section + 24" (60cm) adjustable nylon strap length, so the total usable strap length is 42" (107cm). Water Bladder Compatible The Uinta Daypack has an integrated water bladder system that is perfect for hiking or those long days to always keep you hydrated. The hose routing makes sense without having to leave a zipper cracked open. There is a seperate compartment just for a hydration bladder that does not open to the main compartment. The hose can be pushed through the hole and around to the shoulder strap for quick access where you need it. Most 2L Hydration packs will fit into the custom designed pocket. Perfect Complementary products (Designed to fit together) Perfect Hydration Bladder (2L) This is not your typical hydration bladder. It is packed with our favorite features such as pop-proof TPU material that is seriously tough, the bladder mouth that completely opens to turn it inside out to clean it, and a quick release mechanism for the hose. It is dishwasher safe, leak-proof, and has a pop-up bite valve that lets out just the right amount of fluid when biting. All of the features are super durable and made from the highest quality materials. Would you do this to your old blue hydration pack? Didn't think so. This one can take the abuse. Washable! Turn it inside out and throw it in the dishwasher! Have you ever made the worst mistake ever and left liquid in your old water bladder or even worse put Gatorade in it? If you are like us, you have, and you will never forget how horrible it was to clean out the bladder. We think time is better spent doing anything else in the world, so you can easily clean this bladder by turning it completely inside out and putting it in the dishwasher! Compression Packing Cubes Compress these indestructible cubes down by 30%. If you've never experienced the joy of traveling with packing cubes, prepare yourself to regret never having them before... This set of three cubes compress down your stuff to carry the lowest possible volume. They are made with a super strong, yet lightweight 410D Nylon Ripstop and YKK zippers. The compression zipper brings the volume down by about 30% to make packing your gear efficient and dense. The cubes open all the way so they can be used right in drawers without having to unpack and repack when you are done. All these features fit into a super small package that weighs next to nothing. This is what the kit includes Kit Includes: 2L Compression Cube: Perfect for electronics or small personal items. 4L Compression Cube: Just the right size for undies and Tees. 10L Compression Cube: This is the big boy that keeps all your pants, shirts, and maybe your travel companion's too! Featured on: When will it all ship? Design Process Project birth and development: The project was born from a 10 day trip in Europe where I brought both a large duffel and a standard backpack, which didn't make a lot of sense to me. I wore the duffel on my back and the backpack on my front, which made me feel like a Bull in a china shop wherever I went. I could have fit all my gear into my large duffel except that my daypack didn't fit well, so I was forced to carry it outside like a dope. The problem distracted from the amazing places we visited. When I got back I looked at the available options only to find packs that were too simple, too small, or too expensive. The gears in my head started turning and I started researching to find and solve the problems found in packable daypacks available on the market. Here I am thinking about an easier way to do things: Walking around like this even for a little while is frustrating and makes you vulnerable to pickpocketers. Customers were surveyed, the pack was scrutinized, field tested, iterated on, and finally we captured the design with only the best features. The included features hone in on the most important uses of a day pack, and cut out the rest. The minimal design is very functional, yet does not add unnecessary complexity that can clutter the use and ad failure points. Early survey data, Sketches, and first prototype iterations. Refunds/Returns? We only use premium materials and offer a one year warranty. We will repair or replace any product that somehow don't hold up to do what it was designed to be used for. We do not offer refunds or returns on product that were received as a Kickstarter reward. We�re passionate about creating amazing products and Kickstarter is a way for us to launch our products into the world. As you've read, Kickstarter isn't a store and rewards are a thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns. Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do everything we can to make sure that this exchange is great for everyone involved. Backer support is what allows us to grow and design new products. We in turn want to reward you for your support in the form of a gift. We put your funds to work and are passionate about building new and exciting products. Thank you for your understanding and your support. If your reward for some weird reason doesn�t have value to you, you can: 1. Give your reward another chance. If the product performs differently than you were expecting, there might be a way to enhance your experience. Reach out to us and we can give you tips on how we�ve found �pro tips� and ways to make great use out of your reward. 2. Make an excellent gift. 3. Ebay, amazon, etc are great routes to go as the reward you received from us was sold at a discounted rate. If you have questions reach us at hello@blancgear.com if you have any questions. This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $250MM raised between them.

Friends and followers, We�ve got a very special release for you today. After years of getting requests to add a clip to our Original Machine Era Pen, we�ve finally come up with a solution worthy of this well-known design. Originally released in 2015, the Machine Era Original Brass quickly became our most popular item. Although we don�t know exactly how many we�ve made. It�s been featured on almost every gear blog, Multiple collaborations, EDC review channels, and rose to #1 brass pen on Amazon�s Choice. We�ve decided to clean up some lines, dial in some finishing work, add a 3D machined pocket to hold the well made (in USA) extra flexible clip in place, and actually laser engrave our logo so you know it�s the real deal- It�s inspired quite a few copies. Adding a 3D machined clip holding pocket doubles production time, but securely holds the made in USA extra flexible spring steel clip- no spinning, scratching the body, or coming loose. The Machine Era Markup comes pre-loaded with a felt tip Fineliner by Schmidt. We fell in love with this new ink, and thought it worked perfectly with this design. But don�t worry, if that�s not your thing, it still fits standard Pilot g2 cartridges (also included). The internals are the same as our Original. 100% machined. No springs or any other moving parts. Machine Era | Markup in Solid Brass Machine Era | Markup in Stainless Machine Era | Markup in Black DLC Simple. Utilitarian. Solid in hand feel. Fineliner ink The 1.0mm Schmidt 6040 Fineliner is a Reservoir based refill with a spring loaded felt tip. For those of you who aren't familiar with fineliners- it writes like well flowing (non-permanent) marker. Hand Polished Stainless Steel Features & Specs: Machined clip pocket Zero tip play Postable cap threads on body Balanced weight Compact size No springs or mechanisms Weight- 1.6oz Length (capped)- 4.6 inches Length (open)- 4.3 inches Diameter- 0.40 inches Fits Standard Pilot G2 refills (included) Pre-loaded with a Schmidt Fineliner (included) Finish The Stainless steel version is hand polished to perfection. The Black DLC is blasted to a matte finish and coated with aerospace diamond like carbon. The brass has an incredibly clean off the machine finish that we�ve dialed in after much trial and error over the years. About us and how we operate. As many of you have noticed, we don�t always keep making our products. Although we frequently get requests for gear we�ve discontinued, our main priority is always to keep improving and releasing new designs. Our machine time is limited, and most of what we manufacture isn�t going to be in production forever. So if you like what you see, get it while you can. We 100% always run out of stock. We�re a small two man shop and plan to stay that way. That said, we�re super excited about this project and a few others currently in the works. Stay tuned in. Thanks for your continued support! Be in the know. Keep with us and our latest projects is via instagram: @machineera Machine Era Shop | Richmond, Va Wireframe drawing from the prototyping process (2015).

Hello Family and friends, Most of you will have seen my writings posted on social media, and a good number of people have commented that it would be cool to see my work collected in a hard copy. I enjoy writing and I enjoy having a real life physical book to add to my collection, so I thought I'd give it a go. I collected and refined a good number of my pieces and "wrote" a book. It's done, it's cool, I'm stoked! BUT... it's just a document saved to my computer at the moment. I want you to have a real, hands-on, quality book, and the printing isn't cheap. If your keeping up with me at the moment, you know that I'm in school and that clinicals are going to prevent me from working full time until I graduate from school, so there's not a lot of extra change under the couch cushions to try to make this project a reality. That's why I've started this Kickstarter. I'm not looking for a handout here. If you contribute to my goal, I promise you will receive a quality product in the form of a personal treasure! If you've enjoyed any of my writings, I know that you will think this little book is pretty sweet!

Emily working it, creating new rows for potatoes, corn, leeks, kales, garlic, tomatoes, under last summer's hot sun! ...She's 100% behind the success of this campaign. Broadfork & Friends is Employing and Training Women in Farm Skills, Providing Affordable Labor and Coordinated Growing for the Lost Sierra Region To bring local food to the community table, we need to bring everyone around the table. So, we at BFF are working with all the food-adjacent groups already existing, raising our hands to say, "We smart and strong ladies will come together to break ground and grow food for the community, in the best way possible." We want to be as non-mechanized as possible, hence the broadfork (a low-till leverage device), empower women to work and coordinate all year (hence Broadfork & Friends Collective) not be discarded in October at the end of the growing season (winter crops projects and fundraising), and pool everyone's efforts and energy to get the best biodynamic community grown yields, year after year. The hard lessons of growing food in the Sierra Nevada Range have been learned by those who went before, mostly men, until recently when women took to the dirt. Most of the farms of prior years are not growing any longer, with the exception of the exceptional, Gary Romano, at Sierra Valley Farms. There is a huge potential and rising awareness in this area, in the heart of Plumas County, for local food production, reimagining the CSA model under a new paradigm, including even the smallest gardens, granting access to gleaning AND year-long work for our local women. We are working on demonstrating a new model of health, entrepreneurship and agro-ecology. With your help we will build our workers and community membership, outfitting our admin and populating and publishing our web forum. If you believe, like us, in the power of food to build community, create experiences and build meaningful relationships, then we want you to join us to make this a reality. We're willing to put in the work, we just need the support and resources to bring this to life... WHY NOW? There is an itch in the community to grow and eat locally. A lot of things are happening and most of it is happening fast. What is currently happening: The education of children around food production is covered with all the schools housing their own gardens and teachers, and there is a new Eco-Farm Certificate program for aspiring farmers at Feather River College A 2.5 acre plot on private property donated to FRC and County Action Committee under the Lost Sierra Community Food Project, designed by two young women as part of a Master's degree project. The donated food will supply the Seniors, Veterans and School Lunch Programs A group of locals purchased an old dilapidated property with farmable acreage attached to be the local Farmer's Market location after Quincy Natural Foods decided it was too much of an expense. A couple from Idaho is establishing themselves under the name The Funky Beets, growing at what was our local market farm and building out their own CSA, like they did in Idaho, to replace the Five Foot Farm-sized hole left when High Altitude Harvest folded. Sage Eggs & Ham, which provides rare-heritage breed and grass fed and finished pork, is rebuilding her Food Hub/Buyer's Club to flex and grow with the new food producing sprouting out everywhere. There is a lot of energetic forces swirling in the atmosphere looking to fill the vacuum left by our recent slump in local producers, markets and distribution. BROADFORK & Friends aims to be the link to all the information on what is happening, broadening our membership of townsfolk and building out more small gardens and workshops and specialized events to enrich community, and give everyone a chance to have a personal connection to their food, flowers, herbs, remedies and renewing the nutrient cycle. Agriculture, historically, has not been so kind to women. The shift from foraging and kinship societies to a patriarchal, private property system meant women had few rights and were expected to provide the labor force in Ford factory-style. The work involved in gardening and farming is worthwhile, healthful and therapeutic. The act of working together in the soil, planting and harvesting is as nourishing as the eating around a table with friends and family. Why can it not be self-sustaining and beneficial to all involved? Sign up to be part of the Solution, get more info on joining the collaborative @ BFF Form What will we do with the Money? Support development and growth of our Collective: Signage, Advertising and Admin . . . As a start-up we still have the costs of building out a new entity. With our new garden spaces and gatherings being planned we need SIGNS! We need to be able to have a presence and explain our goals to those who see what's happening and want the info. Composting Program . . . Currently all manner of materials gets dumped into the waste transfer station in East Quincy. In the mix is plenty of food waste. There is not a lot of positive publicity around the practice of separating and processing food into working compost. We will be building compost bins, making bike trailers for the pick-up of full buckets and leaving new clean buckets, also buying the buckets and branding them with the BFF logo and instructions on what goes in the bucket. WELLNESS "Gathering" GARDENS . . . Currently we have spaces in line to develop into raised bed gardens. UPDATE!! We were given access to a source of old garden beds, set on concrete and full of fallow soils. We are placing those in our partner sites and preparing the irrigation, planting and planning. All the sites will also be assessed for appropriate composting systems and suitable irrigation. We aim to share the healing component of growing food, flowers and herbs; from handling the soil, to the social gathering of people around planting, maintaining & harvesting, all the way up to preparing and enjoying the fruits of our labors. We will offer special access to our members and run demonstrations, events and workshops. Ladies' Mud Wrestling ... Otherwise known as Fundraising and Community Service Every season offers a new opportunity to do something FUN and actually raise FUNDS. We will offer bikini weeding in the hot summer days, also a community stress relief "SOIL SOCIALS", and Buche de Noel contest in Winter, and every crazy amusing thing we can come up with: Winter salads, anyone? We also facilitate symposium sessions, in the vein of design charettes bringing together innovative people from the food community creating an dynamic discussion around our local food culture. Our goal is to increase cooperation among are producers, chefs and food processors by creating an improved Local Food culture that will help to define our products, and expand their reach. As with any new venture, there are a lot of unpaid hours and expenses in setting up. Your amazing involvement will allow us to turn this vision into a reality, keep prices fair for workers and affordable for producers and make this a truly local, Broadfork & Friends Collective success! Our most recent sponsored Charette, bringing together everyone with concern for food production, education and distribution. Winter Cropping ... Year-Round growing and fresh greens all winter-long! As part of expanding our reach and improving access to fresh, local food we intend to build cold frames and outfit our garden sites with cold cover and other old-world techniques to keep a garden productive even when the temperature drops. It is so exciting to imagine walking through the snow to harvest your dinner's ingredients. Also, with our canning and preserving workshops we will have stored BFF goodness on all our member's shelves till spring. BFF Facilitated Community Marketplace ... Digital Farmer's Market and YARD to MARKET! We already developed a localized App to share real-time what is available and happening with our Community and Membership. Eventually, we want to also have a physical space, for producers and buyers to exchange for the benefit of all. Our Market Location will provide affordable avenues for our farmers/gardeners to sell their product on a DIY inventory system and get paid monthly or quarterly. In addition to amazing local comestibles, we want to have featured a number of local musicians and artisans, workshops and special events. We're passionate about creating a truly unique, free space, for our community to gather around food. Together we can fund the extras that create a memorable experience, while keeping prices low for our local producers. (See Yard to Market Article, below) Yard to Market Co-op enables backyard gardeners to bring a surplus of eggs or small amounts of produce farmers markets, local grocery stores, and restaurants. The gardener-to-consumer pathway allows customers to talk one-on-one with the producers of the food they're buying. Photo by Scott David Gordon. BFF BRANDING ... Support our local makers, by helping us spread the word. We believe that the BFF brand evokes something special that is worth celebrating. From the sweetest corn, juiciest strawberries to the best summer solstice sunscreen - we want to help distinguish Broadfork & Friends Partner products, and showcase those to the world. Through our local coordinated growing, our Partners receive the best fresh or preserved ingredients to make their finished products. They will be branded to promote the mission and message, and businesses that source our local products will understand the brand, celebrating the effort to employ and empower women and stimulate the local economy. We will also supply a GOOD-BUY list to our members and community of products that we verify as fair to the environment and the workers. Hopefully this list will grow and make it easy to support, allowing you to quickly identify what's a GOOD Purchase! And participating merchants get a window sticker to show their support. FOOD EVENTS! ... As part of Membership we will host special dinners, picnics and breakfast. We want to see more events that involve amazing food and experiences in Plumas County. In partnership with our producers, and our talented citizenry, we are looking to create and host events for the community to connect around food, like the other amazing food cultures we see around the world, historically and new shifts back to the source. We hope to reach outside our locale too, by posting EXCURSIONS thru AIRBNB. WE KNOW THIS CAN WORK ...BECAUSE IT HAS. We all owe a lot to Elizabeth at FIVE FOOT FARM (founded by two 5'2" farming females) for she put in all the effort and hours and created a produce stand on Saturdays full of the best and freshest goods, and designed a CSA system that work beautifully for the area. Elizabeth mentored many of us and pioneered the best run CSA "High Altitude Harvest" in the area, up until last year! BIODYNAMICS ... Along with supplying work and food and education, we also care for the entire system, building bat, bird, and bee friendly spaces and integrating animals back into the Agrarian structure, both wild and domesticated. One of our goals in planting and maintaining a lavender farm! Can you smell it? You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 We are following the Principles of Cooperatives and asking all workers to be owners and involved as integral participants in all functions of the Collective. We also need outside support to make keep our rates reasonable. Digging in now, becoming our founding funders means you have a stake in making BFF an ever-adaptable, growing and learning collective, doing for ourselves and providing for our community. Cooperative Principles We need funding to pay for set-up, advertising an actual physical space to meet and a cottage kitchen certification. Once that ball is rolling though, we will be able to make agreements and plans with farms and farmers to add extra hands and orders to the process. We hope to unify everyone under the mission of Learning, Producing, Harvesting and Giving Back. MEET THE TEAM: THANKS SO MUCH for YOUR SUPPORT!! ...your BFF's REWARD @ $120: Mug and Shovel Spoon for Those Lucky Supporters who reserve their set, it is a Limited Run with one of our Craft Partners, Ryan Deane Co. (ceramics and designs) REWARD @ $250: Join us for a harvest dinner with all the food grown, harvested and prepared by your girls at Broadfork.

The All-New ZOOM Trailer makes your life easier by filling both your outdoor activity and day-to-day professional needs. The TourIt ZOOM Trailer is: A cooler that keeps your food and beverages cold for 24 hours A messenger bag for your everyday belongings A detachable fanny pack for on-the-go activities A bike bag with reflective material and straps to attach to your handle Remember those big and expensive coolers you used to carry when spending time outdoors? The ones that made the whole experience a bit uncomfortable and otherwise were mostly left in your garage to collect dust? And remember those other small coolers that were actually cheap and easy to carry, but you totally gave up on because they simply did not store all you needed to carry nor kept your drinks cold for very long? Awesome; now that you remembered both, feel free to forget all about them! TOURIT is proud to introduce the ZOOM Trailer, the multifunctional cooler/messenger bag. It will ensure your cooler is never forgotten in the garage and no food or beverage is left behind. As a cooler, the ZOOM Trailer is truly unique. It's designed to have huge storage capacity (it can fit 20 cans) while still compact enough for easy carrying. And the best part? It's designed to keep food and beverages cool for up to 24 hours with freeze packs. The ZOOM Trailer is an all-weather soft cooler utility bag that covers all your outdoor needs while meeting FDA requirements for food packaging. What�s more, with the ZOOM Trailer, one bag is all you need! As a messenger bag, you can easily use it to transport your laptop (it comes with a removable pouch to safely carry laptops up to 15.6 inches), documents, chargers, and other small items like granola bars so you can enjoy healthy snacks throughout your day! In fact, the ZOOM Trailer is so convenient as a messenger bag that it features a unique three-strap shoulder system that eases the burden on your shoulders while also allowing you to conveniently keep it to one side of your body. That's why the ZOOM Trailer is more than just a cooler, it's the perfect multifunctional bag for your everyday needs... ... whether you're going to the office in the morning or you're heading to the gym in the afternoon. And as if that weren't enough, we've added even more storage to the ZOOM Trailer. The front pocket is actually a detachable fanny pack that can be used completely separately. Fanny packs have made an official comeback this year with convenient hands-free storage for jogging or exploring a new area without lugging around a giant bag. Because you never know where you�ll need to go or how you�ll need to get there, the ZOOM Trailer even comes with adjustable bicycle cruiser straps that make it ridiculously easy to attach to your bike. Whether for your commuting needs or outdoor recreation, taking this unique bag on your bike is as smart and easy as it gets! The adjustable bike straps aren't the only extra feature increasing capacity and versatility of the ZOOM Trailer. The bag's bottom straps allow you to easily take clothing, towels, and blankets to the beach and on camping and other short trips. The nature-lover in you will be very happy to know that the ZOOM Trailer is an eco-friendly bag. However, its environmentally-friendly nature does not compromise the bag's strength and durability, since the ZOOM Trailer is made with a durable and resistant TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane) material, which means the bag can withstand scratching and folding without getting worn out. Did you know? Between 100 and 200 billion pounds of plastic is manufactured annually An estimated 10% of plastic ends up in the oceans every year About 20% comes from ships and platforms in the sea The remaining 80% comes from the land � garbage that travels through storm drains or watersheds and accumulates in streams, rivers, and bays. Eventually, this plastic garbage finds its way into our world's vast oceans. We strive to reduce the environmental burden and provide higher quality materials to our customers, partners and consumers. The ZOOM Trailer has been successfully tested for its FDA & BPA-Free features. Believe it or not, the ZOOM Trailer gets even better: all its zippers are water-repellent! The ZOOM Trailer comes in black, navy, red, green & camo grey, giving you five incredible colors to choose from. With super early bird discounts, you can get one for up to 43% off! Get yours now! You can support our campaign by ordering your ZOOM Trailer today. You can also support our project by liking it and sharing it on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube.

Howdy you beautiful people! My name is Lil Jimmy Touzel. I've been making records for over two decades, but every album that I've ever made has been as a sideman or producer. I love being a sideman, but I've never made my own record and I think it's time for me to step out into the world and make my very first solo album. I'm really excited to share my talents as frontman with the world, but I need your help to cross the finish line with this project. I've already started recording 4 of the 10 songs to be included on my album at an amazing all-analog studio in Oakland, CA called Owl Sight Recorders. My good friend and audio engineer, Alex Laipeneiks, is handling all the recording and mixing work. The 4 songs that we've already recorded sound really amazing, if I do say so myself! I'm prepared to pay for all of the recording, mixing, mastering, and licensing out of my own pocket. However, I'm launching this kickstarter campaign to cover the cost of manufacturing the vinyl LPs, CDs, and album posters. I've listed a breakdown of the budget below to give y'all a clearer picture of the cost of making an album. Needless to say, its really expensive! Budget breakdown -Recording, Mixing, and Mastering: $2,500 -Vinyl manufacturing: $1,500 -CD manufacturing: $350 -Graphic Design: I'm thrilled that the design company Tiny Crowbar has offered to do this work pro bono. -LP + CD Packaging & Printing: $2,000 *It's super important to me not to cut corners on this step. I want an album cover that's one-of-a-kind and that has a rustic, homemade feeling. I need a custom print shop to complete this step. I'm thrilled to be working with MCL Custom Screenprinters in El Cerrito, CA! -Licensing and Publishing: $1,000 Budget total = $7,350 If I don't hit the $3,888 goal by June 30th, I don't get to keep ANY of the money raised to support this record and your credit card will not be charged. Additionally, as you can see, my total budget of $7,350 is almost twice the amount of my $3,888 campaign goal. If I'm lucky enough to exceed my campaign goal, I have some stretch goals planned to help this album reach a wider audience. My primary stretch goal, should i be so lucky as to exceed my $3,888 goal, is to invest in a music PR specialist to help with the radio campaign and to try and get my album reviewed by media outlets that match my genre and style. What will my debut solo album sound like? This album is gonna sound super-dreamy and minimal. There will be lots of reverb, slapback delay, and tremolo. I won't be using a backing band. I'll just be singing and playing my Fender Bass VI. My repertoire will consist of some of my original songs, a co-write, and some old country and bluegrass tunes that I've reimagined for this album. Will I still be working as a sideman? Absolutely! I will always love working as a sideman. I'll still be playing with the Earl Brothers, Dave Ricketts, the Silver Bell Jazz Band, the Vivants, Blisses B, the Town Howlers, Mitch Polzak and the Royal Deuces, Hank Maninger and the Jukebox Charlies, and Nashville HoneymoonI However, I do plan on taking my solo act on the road and touring in support of this album, so please be on the lookout for me in a town near you. Check out the videos below to see some cool stuff I've done as a sideman

A powerful, affordable, easy to use water filter that is perfect for every home. Aquatella is a 4-stage countertop water filter that eliminates over 99% of all harmful pathogens, heavy metals, pesticides, and chemicals from your drinking water. Tap water is treated with a large number of chemicals to kill bacteria and other microorganisms. Plus, even if the source of the water is pure, that water must travel through pipes (sometimes very old pipes) to finally reach your home. These chemicals are routinely added to our water: Aquatella will filter out all those things and purify your water! Keep your water clean and your body healthy! Who�s ready for delicious, clean water? Aquatella comes equipped with the latest nanofiltration filters. It works even with low water pressure and boasts the highest removal rate in its class. Using a micro high-quality sediment filter, this stage removes small particles including dust, dirt, rust, grit, and particles that are 15 times smaller than a grain of sand. Removes Pesticides, Formaldehyde, Chlorine, Heavy Metals, and Odors. The nano-membrane filter is a unique system possessing removal capabilities well beyond the scope of conventional filtration technologies. This stage is capable of removing a wide range of waterborne contaminants including bacteria, macro-molecules, colloids, and micro-sediment. Enhances the fresh taste of water, providing a natural taste by removing dissolved gases and odors through a high quality granular activated bituminous filter. Also removes residual chlorine, pesticides, heavy metals, organic pollutants, and odors. The process of removing fluoride also lightly alkalizes your water (a natural side effect of the fluoride removal process). Enjoy fluoride-free, alkaline water with the Optional Fluoride Filter! Oh and guess what�as a thank you for being a Kickstarter backer, we�re including the Fluoride Filter (Compare at $60 with other filters) for FREE! The Fluoride Filter is an upgrade of the Activated Carbon filter (replaces it) and removes everything the Carbon Filter filters just as well along with fluoride. When we say these filters last, they REALLY Last. Aquatella was built to handle the nastiest tap water. That�s 200x more than a single Brita filter! To put that in perspective, if you drank half a gallon of water a day - you wouldn�t need to replace your filter for almost 44 years! We still recommend changing the filter every year to keep the flow rate high, but in a doomsday scenario, one Aquatella will provide you fresh water for a long time. The secret is in the quality of the filters and the out valve. By dumping the contaminants, the filter is able to stay cleaner longer and prevent clogging. Since you�ll be changing filters much less often, you�ll be significantly reducing waste from discarded filter cartridges! Aquatella is extremely easy to install when used as a counter-top filter. Attach it to almost any counter-top faucet without hassle! Here is our installation video: You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. When the campaign ends, you will have the option to add a $19 under-the-counter system upgrade. The under-counter system comes with a separate Filter Faucet, so you can enjoy fresh water AND a clear counter. Moms, runners, shake makers, athletes, environmentalists, crossfitters, gamers, do-gooders, hikers, bikers, entrepreneurs, adventurers - Aquatella is perfect for everyone. We are on a mission to help you lead a healthier lifestyle starting from within. Water, coffee, tea and even that post-workout shake all have their own unique benefits for our bodies, but these benefits are often compromised by the water we use. This is why we are on a mission to bring you clean, pure water. Start clean and eliminate harmful pollutants at the source in your home or office tap with Aquatella. We envision a beautiful world where no one lacks clean water. We believe everyone has the inalienable right to pure, safe drinking water. We�re on a mission to bring clean water to the world. We believe clean, pure drinking water is an inalienable right to all people - and we will not stop until everyone has access to it. With our filter, we hope to make clean water accessible to all. Please join us. Together, we can make this world a beautiful, clean place - where fresh, clean water is available to all.

What is Argent Saga? Argent Saga Logo Argent Saga is a brand-new trading card game (TCG) from Alter Reality Games (ARG). ARG is known around the world as one of the largest card retail shops and for their Circuit Series of cash tournaments. Alter Reality Games has been in business for over twenty years and as such has seen the rise and fall of innumerable card games. Every time a game unfortunately dies off, we see a community of players left without a place to go. We hate seeing this happen, especially when the reason for a game�s untimely demise is publisher mismanagement. We created Argent Saga to give the power back to the community by engaging with our players on an intimate level. Between our unprecedented level of community involvement and our team�s combined experience of over 100 years in the game business, we aim to avoid the pitfalls of our predecessors and create the next big thing in card gaming. Argent Saga: Trading Card Game is the result of countless hours of playtesting and devotion to one central idea: Let�s make a game that�s fun, easy to pick up, and that can react quickly to player feedback. We�re not a huge company with corporate overlords to please; we started small and have grown because of the community. In many ways, Argent Saga is a love letter to that community. A trading card game by the Community, for the Community Argent Saga was designed by world-renowned Yu-Gi-Oh! player Jeff Jones and Force of Will and Kaijudo champion, Rob Hebert, with art direction by John Kimmel, lore by Ian Spiegel-Blum, and additional assistance from Christopher Medina. Jim McMahan and Brad Hoisington of Alter Reality Games are the masterminds behind the whole project. Jeff Jones, Rob Hebert, Jim McMahan, Brad Hoisington While we�ve got plenty of industry insiders behind the scenes, the game is really the product of a year�s worth of community involvement. Everything from the logo to the colors used on the templates and names for keywords has gone through our dedicated and growing group of Facebook followers. We�ve kept our community in the loop from step one and plan to continue to do so as we grow. Oh, and we plan to grow. Lots. Overview of Gameplay In Argent Saga, players take on the role of a Champion who leads an army of Units and casts powerful Spells to destroy their opponent�s five Towers of Power and ultimately taking over the sixth tower, the Argent Tower. Champion Cards Spirits The Five Towers of Power Shards Produce Shardlight Units Spells Augments Playmat with Zones Order of Phases Declare an Attack Exhaust a Unit, Responses Declare Blockers if Any Exhaust a Unit with the Guardian Keyword to Block Compare Power for Damage Calculation If Not Blocked, Select a Random Tower to Attack Selected Tower Flips Compare Tower's Power to Unit's Power If Unit Has a Higher Power, Destroy the Tower and Immediately Activate the Effect First In, Last Out How to Construct a Deck Setting Up the Game Quick-Start Guide Rules Types of Cards What about Organized Play? Argent Saga: Trading Card Game will be heavily featured at all future ARG Circuit Series events with cash prizes given out for top placement, including a $10,000 Invitational Tournament summer 2019. OP Structure Tiers Each tier includes all of the items from previous tiers. For example, tier two includes items from tier one. What kind of rewards can you get? Each reward is given as its own entity. Argent Saga Art Book Cover Retailer-Only Rewards Pre-Release Tournament Kit (Brick and mortar retailers only) KICKSTARTER BACKER EXCLUSIVE Release Tournament Kit (Brick and Mortar Retailers Only) Stretch Goals New, exclusive promos and more to be announced! A Unique Fantasy World The World of Argos Argent Saga takes place on the planet Argos. The planet has six continents, each of varying sizes, four main oceans, strings of islands throughout, incredibly diverse topography and vegetation with many familiar climate-types and a few totally alien. These so-called �alien� climate-types would be unique to earthlings, and could include markers like Light Showers, burning fog, volcanos that erupt snow, places where metal sleets from the sky, and more. Despite having many different continents, countries, and cultures, nearly all of our first set takes place on the continent of Turrim during Age 778. Every 10th spot represents 100 years in Earth time. So, for example, Age 768 would be ten years prior to Age 778. Turrim is twice the size of the United States and broken up loosely into seven unique districts. Each district is defined by a Tower of Power that lies within it. Everything on Turrim revolves around these towers; they provide sustenance to the ground, power to their machines, energy for spellcasting; shards of the towers are used as currency. Control of the towers, therefore, represents control of the continent and, as far as the people on Turrim know, the world. At the beginning of our story, the Turrim people are too far from the other continents to know that they even exist, and as such believe they are the only people on Argos. How could this be, one might wonder? Turrim technology, while advanced, is almost totally reliant on the towers for fuel. Shardlight is the gas for any motor; the further one gets from the source of Shardlight being used, the less a machine works. Go far enough, and your plane could fall out of the sky, your new-fangled motor vehicle stops in its tracks, your horse-body augmentations malfunction. (Horse-body augmentations, such as lasers on horse�s heads, armor, and robotic legs to increase speed, are all the rage in the Scarlet District). The geographical ignorance of the Turrim people could become a troubling point down the road but will not be particularly relevant for us at the beginning. The entire society is based on Shardlight; almost nothing is possible without it, from travel to communication to farming techniques. Because of this, weapons and accessories that may not be relevant in today�s real-world society, like swords, axes, and medieval style cannons, are significantly more useful in Argos when powered up by immense Shardlight. We can also surmise that the culture of Argos plays a large role in which technology has flourished and which hasn�t. Couldthe people of Turrim create airplanes that run on a different energy source to get to another continent? Sure. But why would they? That�s like saying, �Could you create a form of life that doesn�t rely on the sun?� Maybe. But... we have the sun, so there�s not much pressure to do so. Turrim Society As touched on in �The World of Argos� section, the continent of Turrim is roughly broken up into six districts organized geographically around one central Tower. In the center of the continent is the biggest, most powerful of these towers, called The Argent Tower. No district lays claim to this tower; instead, the immediate surrounding city, known as the City of Silver, or just Silver, is a sort of demilitarized zone. In most districts, the people are both effected by the cold war running through society but can live their lives without being majorly affected at all. Within the districts are many unique communities, sub-districts, burroughs, and neighborhoods. Surrounding the districts proper are smaller villages, a few off-the-map shanty towns, mercenary outposts, forts, bases, and lawless riders. The people of Turrim have a mostly capitalistic society with all of the virtues and problems that capitalism brings. There are weaponsmakers, bankers, lawyers, brother owners, bakers, teachers, business people... everything one might expect in a society of people organized by wealth instead of birthright. In the early days, royalty existed in Turrim and some districts even still profess their loyalty to the throne. But this is mostly unimportant and viewed as a novelty by most of Turrim society, a holdover from a more inferior time. Secret societies, too, exist and pull strings behind the scenes. In other words, there is no more aristocracy in Turrim than there is in modern-day America, which is to say, the rich get richer and the poor get poorer. Society has adjusted to an invisible guillotine over their heads; for generations now, the Frigid War has threatened to break out into open war amongst the districts. If this happens, the very soul of Argos and the future of the Turrim people and the towers will be at stake. Turrim Society is roughly broken into two major groups, each of which follow the Mayor of their district and adhere to a certain vision of the future. These two groups are called The Forge and The Rose. The Forge and the Rose The Forge and The Rose are the two names given to the loose association of districts that exist among ideological lines. The Forge believes that the power of the towers, known as Shardlight, should be used to force society forward. They would use the power to increase their means of production, generate new technology, build new robots, and force the world into a new industrial age in which order and balance reign. They would burn everything down to its roots to forge a new future of their own design. The Rose, on the other hand, believes in freedom. If they adhered to a modern-day American political philosophy, they would be Libertarians. They wear brightly colored clothes, use technology sparingly, and want, more than anything, the freedom to do what they want. They�re a little flowery in dress, many-petaled, and thorny. The Towers and the Districts As discussed previously, Turrim society is based almost entirely on who controls the six Towers of Power. The Towers are living, breathing entities, and are wells of enormous power. They can defend themselves, refuse to let people inside, and choose in a spiritual way who they bestow with their Shardlight � their immense power made portable and used throughout society to channel energy into machines, cast spells, heal, and more. They have long memories, may choose champions to grant power to, and can even communicate on a spiritual level. They could produce avatars to interact more directly with the people if they so choose. This is most apparent in the existence of Spirits within the shards. Spirits are creatures made manifest from the power of individual shards. Champions partner with spirits to enhance their powers, cast spells from different elements than their own, and to perform incredible feats. People who use shardlight must do so by channeling the energy through a physical shard: a piece of the tower from which the shardlight originated. For example, if someone wanted to channel Scarlet shardlight, they would need a shard broken off of the Scarlet Tower. In the card game, these will be represented as our resource system. Think of the towers as bottle caps on top of a shaken-up soda pop: if a tower falls or were to be removed, the resulting explosion of energy would be catastrophic. As described above, the towers are somewhat cognizant and as such demand certain sacrifices from those that would use their power. The Shadow Tower, for example, demands blood. The Vigilant Tower demands emotion. The specific demands of each tower are closely held secrets by those that control the Districts in which the towers reside; if others were to discover the means of extracting power from the towers, they could theoretically offer sacrifices to the tower to replenish their stores of Shardlight. No District would give up their power so easily, as each color of Shardlight corresponds to a different element and set of abilities. Each of the six districts surrounds a tower. Below, I have listed each of the towers, their surrounding districts, symbol, and more. The Argent Tower Primary Color: Silver Element: Neutral District Name: The City of Silver, Silver Symbol: Silver Lynx Demographics: The City of Silver surrounding the Argent Tower is one of the most diverse in all of Turrim. People of every creed, color, and birth-district flock to the neutral safety of the City of Silver. It has two major ports with excellent waterway access to the other districts, making it an economic powerhouse. Religious cults and scholars can be seen. To the north, one can easily see the Shadow Tower, made of gray slate, and to the south, the Vigilant Tower, made from pristine white marble. Political Body: A network of local politicians vie for power, but the true influence in the City of Silver is in the hands of the seafaring merchants. For those few influential families that control the seas control the economic ebb and flow of the city. Alignment: Neutral The Vigilant Tower Primary Color: Yellow Element: Light District Name: Knitehood Symbol: Sphynx Demographics: The Vigilant Tower is primarily organized into militaristic defenders who, as their name implies, remain vigilant in the face of an always-changing world. This is a strict military district almost entirely made up of military men and women. Their colors are white and purple and each member of the district needs at least a modicum of military training. Almost all have shaved heads and shaved eyebrows. They are people of few words, choosing instead to remain as stalwart bulwarks against their foes. They desire order more than chaos. Political Body: Everything in the district serves the military force stationed within. Alignment: Starts out as the Rose; betrays them, joins the Forge The Azure Tower Primary Color: Blue Element: Water District Name: Stormheld Symbol: Vampire Squid Demographics: Stormheld shares a main waterway with the City of Silver, and therefore has a thriving merchant community as well. This attracts men and women of every persuasion; it is the largest District geographically and by population. It is a beautiful, colorful place with much of society centered around the docks. Mei-Yu Political Body: Various magical cults vie for power over Stormheld. The most prominent of these is the Iaikuma, led by Mei Yu, a powerful channeler with a hidden agenda. In this world, magic and science often go hand-in-hand; in Stormheld, you could find an enchanter on the same street as a DNA-splicing scientist. Alignment: The Forge Shardlight Research Facility in Stormheld The Skytree Tower Primary Color: Green Element: Air District Name: Sol Symbol: An Alkonost Demographics: If Stormheld controls the waterways, then Sol controls the skies. Between the two, almost all control of trade and commerce is under their purview. Nearly the entire district surrounding the tower is a desolate, barren desert; the tower, uniquely, is thinnest at its base, growing like running vines rapidly as it ascends to the heavens. Eventually, the vines blossom into a tremendous bulb, upon which the district truly resides. The people of Sol are an aerial, somewhat militarized bunch. Their cousins in the outskirts of the district are an agrarian society of farmers and ranchers. Beyond the deserts underneath the tower lay quite possibly the most beautiful lands in all the districts, and where our main character, Ariana, grew up. Political Body: This district is one of the most spread out and includes those that live on the branches of the tower in the sky and the �sandlanders� beneath. Those living in the agrarian areas of the district are largely inspired visually from Oriental and Aztec societies. As such, they typically wear beautiful, fine silks with big bursts of color. The people are generally beautiful, positive, forward-thinking and colorful. They laugh easily and love music. They would prefer not to think about politics much and leave much of the war-waging to the Shogunate of the Sun. As in our history, the shoguns are a sort of de facto shadow government; while the physical landscape of Sol is doused in splendid sunlight, the politics are shadowy and bloody. The Shogunate employs futuristic ninjas as spies and a unique mixture of Aztec and Samurai styles as foot-soldiers. Alignment: The Forge Eitan The Shadow Tower Primary Color: Dark grays, charcoal, black Element: Darkness District Name: Gloom Symbol: Crow Political Body: The people of Gloom are quick to smile � too quick. You can never fully Demographics: District Gloom has an almost Tim Burton-esque vibe; the people of Gloom have huge personalities, a flair for the dramatic, and a tremendous sense of style. They wear tailored suits with pinstripes and patterns, bowties, occasional top hats, carry canes... They are largely pale, having lived most of their lives underneath the darkness of the Shadow Tower, with long, thin limbs and conniving minds. They are almost vampiric in appearance and tend to stay away from overly sunny spots; you won�t see many District Gloom residents vacationing on the beaches of Sol. In many ways, this district is a gothic wonderland. While most people prefer to handle their dealings behind the scenes with overly complicated lawsuits and sowing chaos through the legal system, the frontline of their defense is a group of citizen-policemen gunslingers. As opposed to the finely tailored suits the dandies of Gloom prefer, the gunslingers wear cured leather, stylish hats, ride destriers, and carry shardlight-infused hand cannons (i.e., guns). Gunslingers have their own independent codes of morality and ethics that differ from one to the next. trust a citizen of Gloom; but you can trust that they�re trying to get one over on you. It may not be apparent; they are masters of the long con, twisting and turning every situation to their favor. As such, they are the most distrusted member of the Rose; both other districts believe they would change sides as soon as it became convenient. While individuals in Gloom are highly efficient, the government is anything but � by design. They are key trading partners with Stormheld, despite being on opposite ends of the Forge/Rose war. Alignment: Rose The Scarlet Tower Primary Color: Crimsons and deep Element: Fire District Name: Rao Symbol: Dragon Demographics: District Rao is primarily made up of aristocratic factory-owning elites and the blue-collar workers that perform the grunt work; this district is where nearly all machines are made. The waterways cannot be used by anyone except the Rao, who have developed special boats and marine vessels designed to withstand the heat. As such, their underwater animal life has evolved to adhere to the heat; it is said that long, slithering dragons live in the Lava Oceans, as they�re called. The closer one gets to Stormheld, the cooler the water becomes. Nearly all of the trees in this district are scarred by unending burns. However, pieces of bark from these trees are used in various potions, including healing and more. Political Body: The Rao are the only people that still adhere to a sort of constitutional monarchy � the �High Lord� rules in name above all of the other Lords, who rule over the Handlers. But the High Lord is rather ineffectual; he�s a young ruler, just into his 20s, and lacks the power of command his elderly father had. The Lords tend to ignore them and work as somewhat independent fiefdoms. One potential side-story could be the rise or fall of the royal family; they are, of course, named Rao. A film based on a true story about a woman named Lani. We're highlighting the emotional, scary, real parts of her story so her struggles and victories don't fade away like so many do. Many families feel like their loved one's stories are slipping through their fingers--confused about how to capture a meaningful representation of how they feel. Imagine being able to see a film of your great-great grandmother you've never met. It's not just a slideshow but a very well-made film. You see her telling the story. You hear her voice. You're able to emotionally connect to her, and it's engaging enough to actually sit through the whole thing. You feel like you actually connected with someone you won't ever met in this life, but still your sense of belonging to your family and ancestry explodes. That's the vision we have. Someone needs to start making these films happen. There are so many films on the "big screen" about fictional characters, in a fictional world, leaving us without much "real" material to bring into our own lives. We want to add our voices to the fight for light, by pushing for more real and honest content focused on REAL PEOPLE whose relatable stories can inspire your own. And you're getting their story first-hand, from their own mouth. We want to show what's possible when it comes to capturing the stories of those closest to us with this film about Lani. iPhone videos and scattered emails aren't enough to carry on your loved one's legacy to future generations. But a well-made film CAN. Please consider donating your means to our team - we're hoping to make more films like this one :) Meet Dreampack We're a visual media production team: www.dreampack.club See a breakdown of our budget below:

A great pair of active noise cancelling headphones can be life changing! Our first model headphones that block out sound were first invented by an airplane pilot (who is more qualified than that?) for long flights and since then have become a vital part of daily travel and life. Some people use them for added clarity when listening to music and audio or just with the noise cancelling activated for turning down the sounds of the world. Active noise cancelling (ANC) headphones are perfect for reducing the roaring sounds of engines and traffic from public transportation, the chattering of busy city life, coworker voices in the office or the everyday distracting sounds at home or school. Now the big question, there are so many headphones out there how do you choose? With all the over-priced big brand headphones we have made it our mission to offer a premium ANC headphone without breaking the bank. Like you, we have family and daily expenses that must come first. We have worked strategically with our factory to deliver an ANC headphone that features many, if not more, of the features of more expensive brands. We have also taken feedback from our prior successes and incorporated them into the new Plane Quiet X wired (non-bluetooth) rechargeable headphone. By backing our project you will be helping us fund the final steps in our production! *** Be sure to check out our kickstarter reviews from our first project the Solitude WX1 www.solitudeheadphones.com High-Quality Noice Cancelling Headphone at an unbelievable price point! The sleek new Plane Quiet Noise Cancelling X is made for today's road warrior! We have had 2 past successful Plane Quiet designs and we have gathered feedback from both models and engineered the new Plane Quiet X. With a clearer, crisper sound this model features an easy to fold, compact design for quick storage in your luggage/bag. Volume control right at your finger tips for easy level adjustment. The Plane Quiet X delivers a powerful performance with ANC up to 20 db Easy compact folding design and convenient volume controls Our flexible, adjustable headband helps create a more secure fit for most head sizes. Adjustable headband No hassle rechargeable battery ...never worry about forgetting batteries again! Light up logo Unique designed logo plate lights up when in use.
