Just cover and open the air release hole to expand and contract the mouthpiece as desired for a squeaky clean mouth! Normal Gum Stimulator VS "Vumblr" There are 30 inter-dental spaces, which are spaces in between the teeth of upper and lower dental arch, and these spaces are critical part to gum health. As the mouthpiece contracts, Vumblr mouthpiece has a same effect as using 30 gum stimulators at the same time. As the number of contraction increases, the effect increases 30 times. Moreover, the mouthpiece not only massages the inter-dental spaces but also massages the entire gums. Watch the power of the Vumblr in action! One size fit mouthpiece, Vumblr has a stretchable structure for stronger expansion and contraction. You can choose the size of the mouthpieces if you back us with Family for 2 or Family for 4. Vumblr basic includes one mouthpiece for Adult. 2. Flexible Structure for Dynamic Movement The mouthpiece delivers an invigorating and evenly distributed massage, increasing blood circulation which is essential for gum health. A thin wing structure is added to the mouthpiece to stick to the Mucogingival Junction to form vacuum pressure. 3. Specialized Cleaning Bristles The Vumblr brush was designed to increase the friction of the brush as much as possible and as a result scrubs the surface of the teeth to remove food debris and dental plaque. 4. Convenient Mouthpiece Storage Clean, protective storage for your mouthpiece where ever you take your Vumblr. It can be crumpled into a smaller space thanks to its thin and elastic structure. Vumblr's proprietary foam toothpaste is infused with nano-sized cleaning particles, natural ingredients including Hydroxyapatite. 1) Teeth cleaning - Nano-sized micro foam particles help specially designed brushes to clean the teeth. 2) Gum Care - Sterilization and anti-inflammatory function of natural plant material (Cnidium officinale Makino & mugwort) helps improve gum health. 3) Teeth Whitening - Since Hydroxyapatite , which has proven whitening effect, is included, if used continuously, it can whiten teeth without tooth hypersensitivity. For the perfect vacuum control and to avoid pain in the gums while vacuum pressure is established, the mouthpiece is designed to take the Mucogingival Junction into consideration and applies Neutral Zone Theory which is used in dental clinics to produce dentures and braces. Neutral Zone is that area where the forces of tongue pressing outward are neutralized by the forces of the cheeks and lips pressing inward. To avoid pain in the gums while vacuum pressure is established, the mouthpiece is designed by considering the anatomic structure, the Mucogingival Junction. Vumblr provides state-of-the-art teeth cleaning and gum massage effects based on AWARD-WINNING vacuum control technology. A dentist with 20 years experience, Dr. Hyun found that many patients remove plaque poorly because they lack adequate manual dexterity to manipulate the toothbrush. He also found that patients suffering from systemic complications such as aspiration pneumonia or dental disease due to poor oral hygiene have higher death rates. He was determined to find a solution to this problem. So in 2014, he worked together with enthusiastic engineers and developed an oral care device that automatically cleans teeth and massages gum with an application of vacuum pressure. Academic Activities After completion of the final prototype, and in various academic presentations, our team was recognized by experts and dentists for the effectiveness of the Vumblr Oral Care Device. Over the past 3 years, we have upgraded through 8 prototypes, researching, testing and refining the functionality and performance of this innovative oral care system. Our R&D team has spent years developing and perfecting Vumblr, finding the best materials and formulas to optimize the oral care experience. We are confident in our team, our product, and our manufacturing schedule. Top And Bottom Padding Padded top and bottom, it�s comfortable for your feet with no skidding. Perfect Arch And Tension The arch of the pedal is true to the original dimensions created by Joseph Pilates. It maximizes the stretch and curve of your foot, while the springs are the exact tension for the ideal workout. Built For Life An included tool makes disassembly easy so you can clean and maintain your piece of equipment whenever needed. Use it daily. Work it hard. People Jill Cassady, Pilates Expert Jill is recognized as a leading Pilates authority and Pilates instructor throughout Southern California and around the world. She has taught for over 25 years and as the owner of Pilates Technique (JosephPilates.com), she has certified nearly 400 successful Pilates instructors and Pilates Studio Owners. As the lead instructor at Pilates Technique, Jill has lectured in continuing education workshops and has taught clients with debilitating injuries of all kinds, pre and postnatal, illnesses, misalignment issues, athletes, dancers and Pilates instructors. She is one step away from Joseph Pilates, recognized as the only Trainer in all of California to have worked in Romana�s studio with her for years. Jill also studied with Ron Fletcher, and is proud to have studied and taught with two of the Original Masters. Henry Cassady, Engineer Henry is a lifelong engineer. He earned his degree in mechanical engineering from UC Davis and started designing control systems for industrial use. He became a founding member of Nova Controls, which specialized in industrial automation controls. Henry was the lead engineer for Nova until he eventually sold the company to the Dover Corporation (NYSE: DOV). After which he continued on as VP of Engineering and General Manager, responsible for all aspects of manufacturing and quality control. He began designing Pilates equipment after discussing the pros and cons of existing equipment with his daughter, Jill. Joe Wein, Marketing As a marketing consultant, Joe creates concepts and media content for social media. Hi. My name is John Vash and I create unique objects primarily from wood and stained glass. In this project I'm creating wood table lamps with interchangeable stained glass panels. The glass panels may be easily changed without tools and can completely alter the mood of a room. The lamps are 13 inches tall by 6 1/2 inches square and are made of American walnut. I use a pre-wired UL listed cord set with an inline switch. Each lamp includes an 800 lumen LED bulb. NEW - see new add-ons below. Get a second set of glass or even a second lamp at a special price. Even though each lamp reward says delivery will be March, 2020, the first eight lamps that are chosen will be delivered in September, 2019. And since the glass choices are limited choose your lamp early. Glass choices: The lamps are available in 18 different colors of stained glass. The quantities of each reward are limited to glass I already have or am certain I can get. Stained glass is challenging to photograph especially when backlit. I've made every effort to represent the glass colors as accurately as possible. Glass choices - each color is a different reward The development of this project: I spent three months designing and building prototypes before I got the size and proportions of the lamp just right. I also wanted to create a design where the glass could be changed without tools. This feature created challenges in how the wood is cut and routed. I then surface planed the wood to 3/4 inch thickness and cut all the pieces for the first eight lamps. That was just the beginning of the work that goes into each lamp. The next step involved 27 drill press operations and 41 router table operations before assembly could begin. These steps aren't obvious in the finished lamps but were necessary for the features I desired. Here are a few pictures of the lamp with different stained glass panels. Lamp with glass # 101 Lamp with glass #113 Lamp with glass #130 A few videos of the process: You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 Goal: My goal was to create a simple, elegant table lamp that would accommodate glass of different thicknesses, fully support the glass with minimal shadows, and allow the glass panels to be easily changed without tools. I believe I have achieved these goals. Delivery schedule: The lamps will be delivered in the order they were chosen by backers. Even though the rewards say the lamps will be delivered in March, 2020, I will deliver the first eight lamps in September, 2019. The remaining lamps will be delivered in groups of eight in three month intervals. NEW - Add-ons: Get a second set of stained glass panels for only $10 ($40 value). For backers that choose the table lamp reward, simply add $10 to your pledge and when the project ends you can choose your second set of panels from the available color choices. Since the color choices are limited they will be offered to backers in the order the rewards were chosen. This add-on is only available to backers who have chosen the table lamp reward. Why we have created Pix Mini Last year we launched our first product: Pix Backpack. It has been an absolute game changer for the industry of backpacks. Pix Backpack has been reviewed by top YouTube bloggers and featured on dozens of media. Everyone loved our product and we received great feedback. However, many backers have continuously asked for the same kind of backpack, only for kids. We made it happen and hope you'll love it as much as we do! Pix Mini vs. Usual Backpack Pix Mini Draw right on your backpack. The integrated in-app image editor allows you to create animations and display them on the ambient screen of the backpack. Each little box on the app corresponds to a specific pixel which can be adjusted in terms of color so that you can make up your own pixel art. The only limit is your imagination! Kids can also share animations with their friends. Simply hit the SHARE button and exchange your pixel art with other Pix Mini owners. The animation will appear on your friend�s backpack within a matter of seconds. Shine together with your friends! Make friends with Pix Mini Pix Mini is the first backpack that helps you socialize. By displaying self-made artworks on the backpack, your child can communicate his personal interests to his peers. It is a great way to find friends and express your individuality. Make your kid known as "that kid with the cool tech backpack!" Develop your child's thinking The Pix Mini app offers brain-stimulating games designed to test memory and cognitive capabilities of your child. When you play on your backpack, logical thinking turns into an interactive activity. Simply press controllers on your phone device and treat your backpack as the playing screen. Make your child safer The glowing animation will make your child clearly visible on the road. The geolocation feature will allow parents to see their kids on the map. Additionally, there is an alarm function that goes off whenever a child moves too far away from the backpack. Pix Mini is controlled from a free Pix app that can be installed on any iOS/Android smartphone device. The user-friendly interface enables your child to effectively operate the backpack and apply all of the functionalities with ease. Watch this short video that demonstrates how to use it: It is still a backpack! In addition to the cool features of Pix Mini, it is still a practical backpack that enables your kid to carry all of the school essentials. The trendy design of the backpack will highlight your kid�s style and maintain his confidence on every single walk to school. How to pack your Pix Mini Pix Mini is a convenient backpack that could be also worn casually and sustain an active lifestyle of a kid. Moreover, it could be easily worn in the event of rain or snow, as the ambient screen stays resistant to low temperature and water splashes. Timeline The Pix Story Pix is a consumer electronics startup with a young team of professionals who believe that users should be both the creators and innovators of the product. That�s why, less than a year ago, we released the first smart backpack for adults. The product has been a major success as we managed to hit the total funding of $338,000 on both Indiegogo & Kickstarter. However, after receiving numerous requests to also make one for children, we made a smaller, lighter backpack with a whole bundle of cool perks relevant for kids. That�s how we ended up with Pix Mini. The Pix Philosophy Pix connects portability with the creativity. Our mission is to make people happy while they�re on the go. All people are different and have a common need to express their personality through their looks. That�s why we give it to our consumers and let them to decide what they want to wear. We believe that personal looks should reflect our personality and serve as a way to communicate our views to the world. That�s why we strive our excellence to make the most customizable backpacks ever made. Our Team Social Network Links We know that not everyone will be able to afford Pix Mini. So even if you can�t donate a dollar or make a purchase, you can still help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of. We rely on all of our Pix fans! This is my second solo record and a far more ambitious project than my first. I started writing this thing back in November 2016, I spent 2017 working with a band to finish the songs and then demoing them out. In the beginning of 2018 we started recording the songs and finished up sometime over the summer. In November 2018, two years after I started writing, I got my final mixes for the record back. January 2019 I got my masters sent to me from the world renowned Blasting Room in Fort Collins Colorado. Since then I've been working double shifts, planning tours (including a trip to England to play a festival), finishing artwork with my amazing graphic designer, planning a PR campaign, planning a music video shoot, preparing for vinyl pressing, paying for said vinyl pressing, working on putting merchandise together, setting the album up for worldwide digital distribution, building my own website, booking local shows, promoting local shows, playing local shows, and practicing for my upcoming tours. Making an album isn't cheap or easy, especially if it's self funded. On June 30th 2019 my PR campaign kicks off for two months to lead up to the release of my album on August 31st through my own record label Travel Well Records, and along side another local label, Stars at Night, and German record label, Ring of Fire Records; but before I can kick off that campaign, I still have a lot to get done. 90 percent of this release and all the things that come with it have been paid for, by me (with some help from friends), simply from working myself into the ground, sacrificing my social life, selling my car and being as frugal as possible. This last 10 percent is where crowdfunding comes in. There are few things left on my check list; like shooting a music video, paying for shipping for my vinyl, building a stock pile of merchandise to sell on tour, traveling through the mid-west in July to promote the upcoming album, traveling to England at the end of that tour to play Rebellion Fest and promote the upcoming album, printing CDS, promoting the release, and if funds exceed expectations, maybe I'll be able to upgrade my gear, my guitar has taken a beaten over the years... I have a good part of the funds for this last bit saved, but I'm looking for a little help for this final push. Thank you so much for reading and contributing. Let's do this! For all interested parties, I've made a single track available for streaming so you have an idea of what you're supporting. Copy this link into your web browser. . . https://dylandisaster.bandcamp.com/track/halfway-home-2

Featured in Video Review by 9to5mac.com Press Release | Press Images We all love taking photos But NOT running out of space And finding photos to erase Why pay a monthly fee just to keep your photos in the Cloud? And lose your photos when you don't have Internet, to hackers or when you don't pay your fees? Introducing HyperCube The easy photo backup & media access solution for your iPhone, iPad and Android smartphone/tablet HyperCube connects between the USB charger and your phone And it automatically backups all the photos & videos from your smartphone onto a micro SD memory card or USB flash/hard drive HyperCube supports up to 2TB micro SD memory card (not included). HyperCube works with USB flash / SSD / hard drives (not included) with no capacity limit. Files system supported are FAT32, exFAT, NTFS. All while charging your phone at the same time. You can disconnect anytime and backup resumes when you reconnect HyperCube does incremental backup so it will only backup new photos/videos unless you tell it to redo the entire backup again. HyperCube works with any iPhone and Android smartphone It also works with Android/iOS tablets including the iPad Pro HyperCube gives you instant access to photos, movies, music and work files from any USB drive or micro SD on your Android/iDevice Stream movies/music, view photos, open files directly from USB drives and micro SD without needing to copy over to the iOS/Android device. HyperCube works as a USB flash drive on the computer So that you can easily transfer data between HyperCube and your computer And HyperCube only cost $29, which is less than 3 months of Cloud Storage subscription And there is no subscription with HyperCube Design Story & Evolution We started with the most basic and minimalistic design with space just sufficient enough to accommodate a male USB connector (to connect to power/computer), a micro SD slot (the smallest removable memory card for storage) and two female USB ports (one for the iOS/Android device and one for USB storage drive). The basic design is expanded to accommodate the actual final PCB printed circuit board and IC integrated circuit chip. All these while ensuring that one of the surface is a perfect square, a call out to our logo which is made up of 7 perfect squares. The final aesthetic design was to round the corners and add design line elements to the side with female USB ports to give the final look of the HyperCube product. Proof of working prototype The following single shot, unedited video shows a fully functional prototype of the HyperCube. In this video, HyperCube is able to charge the smartphone and automatically start photo/video backup, With HyperCube, the user can browse contents on the attached micro SD memory card as well as the attached USB storage drive, viewing photos/documents, streaming video and audio (including the ability to playback in the background). We are all exposed to many different types of stress in our lives. Each of us have different ways to soothe our minds, hearts and bodies. Here, we have one simple way to release your stress. that can be used as a huge squishy, plush cushion and hug & Lean pillow. Good quality relaxation has become a luxury that many cannot seem to afford. It's a FACT that we need to release our stress to be healthy and function properly. People want to touch the soft like squishies and slimes because it solves the lack of sensual desires in society. It relieves anxiety throughout the daily life and feels satisfies with the touch of them. Although the culture has becoming diversified, the most basic sense is not satisfied to many people. Playing with objects such as slime gives people a relaxing sensation that relieves stress. Feel the Cloud! Cloud nine is safe & functional in its healthy & comfy way! Memory foam or EPS Styrofoam has an unpleasant smell and is unhealthy. If the beads leak out, they can be inhaled and Memory foam releases dangerous VOC gas. Squishies and Slime also have a dangerous amount of chemicals that are hazardous to your health. CL9 Removed The Chemical Harm but keeps the TOUCH. Special 100% polyester gel fiber The result of using a Siliconized Micro Denier 100% Polyester Gel Fiber is the most smart and high quality down-alternative cushion. Siliconized polyester filler is a type of filler created from synthetic fiber, polyester, which is treated with a silicate material. This silicone coating adds a feather-like touch to the fill, which makes it very slippery, soft and easy to work with. The siliconized process also makes the fiber resistant to bacteria, non-allergenic. Polyester Fiberfill 15 Denier is an extra-comfortable polyester stuffing with a slick finish to prevent bunching. This thin microfiber can fit more inside the cushion and provide maximum comfort. Silicon coating makes CL9 cushion water-repellent, so it's machine washable. It is not easily scattered and clumped. The filling may tangle up in laundering a little bit, but can be smoothed back out with your hand because the length of the fiber is short. Small squishy is the perfect size to play with. You can use it as an indoor playing ball. Medium size cushion is just right to hug and hold onto. Use it when you take a nap or just to rest on. The Jumbo ball is ideal for using as body pillow. It is huggable, leanable, and seatable. Just sink into it gives you the feeling that you are floating on the clouds. CL9 Jumbo Cushion Outdoor Cover For your comfort, we added a weather-resistant outdoor cover. Cloud Nine outdoor cover protects from scratches, dusts, and water. You can bring it to the pool, backyard, and anywhere! STRETCH GOAL!! (not available for Face & Arm pillow) CL9 has a very unique smooth, gummy & squishy feeling.You can hug it, lean on it, sink into it and use it as a cushion or pillow for any occasion. Care Instruction Care: Machine wash on gentle cycle in cold water with mild detergent. Tumble dry set on low heat setting or air dry. Add dryer balls to keep it fluffy. Reshape the cushion with your hands after it is dried to return to its original shape. CL9 all fabrics and fillings are machine washable, but depends on the size of your washing machine, we recommend washing the cover only for the jumbo cushion. Note: Items are compressed for shipping. We recommend opening as soon as possible. Compressed filling takes up to a day to regain its original size and shape. project collaborated with ideapot I frequently sacrifice my sleep in order to balance my work and family. I was always so tired that I would take a nap anywhere and anytime I had the chance. I couldn�t find a cushion or pillow that allowed me to release the stress and get the most comfortable rest. One day, my daughter was playing with slime and said she wants to touch it all day long even when she goes to bed because she liked that gummy feeling. However, I couldn�t let her play with the slime since the ingredients of the slime like boric-acid and sodium-borate include harmful chemicals. my daughter loves to play with slime! I decided to create a soft but stretchy, and safe feeling �slime-like stress ball� so that everyone can use it. Well, it was NOT EASY. Choosing a perfect fabric for soft and gummy feeling, with hypo-allergenic (because my daughter has very sensitive skin), should be easy to wash but does not get stuffy. We had a hard time communicating with factories while we choose the perfect fabric, and the GIANT package shipping was a challenge. But ultimately, our final CL9 cushion is born! The final CL9 cushion is made with stretchy spandex + soft velvet fabric. Soft and stretchy cover helps you to stretch and shape cushion easier. The Short cut microfiber filling makes you more comfortable and relaxed. We are happy to introduce CL9 cushion set to many of you through Kickstarter, and looking forward to launch more awesome projects. Share our project with your family and friends and we will give you 15% of every dollar you helped to raise!

Black Label ComiCon on August 10th Saturday 10am - 5pm at Hampton Inn Hotel (Philadelphia Convention Center) 1301 Race Street Philadelphia, PA. If you are a creator or want to ask about how to create for the comic book industry you have to attend this event! This is for the small guys and women that never had a chance to show their true colors and talent. The big comic book companies would love to see this event fail because the stories and characters that will be shown here are from true creators that have purpose. Its time for the Independent creators to band together, rise, and take the comic book, fantasy, and sci-fi entertainment industry into a new direction! This is mainly an early kickoff campaign to help people to be aware of this event. Supporting this kickstarter will also help pay for the facility that the venue is being held, and it will assist in paying for the guests travel expenses. The event will carry on regardless. Marvel, DC Comics, Dark Horse, Image and others have had their time in the spot light now its time to usher in the new Independent and Exclusively Published Characters & Story Lines. Independent creators have a uneasy and somewhat of a difficult time selling their independent and original creations at Comic Cons that seem to only cater to Marvel, DC, Image, ext... along with the Cosplayers that seem to have become the celebrity stars at these events. You have to stop and ask yourself where do you think the ideas and creations of the characters come from? It's from the independent guys, and some of their creations are stolen by the large entertainment companies. Black Label ComiCon wants to set a new level of entertainment that is a nourishing atmosphere for people willing to put their hearts and minds into giving people something brand new and creations that have purpose. The comic book industry has become stagnate in trying to produce new content especially when it comes to diverse characters of color and sexual orientations, since they rarely hire people of color to create for them. They rather have these talented sisters and brothers of color and different sexual orientation repeat and revamp old concepts, they take true creativity out of the game and only do whats safe. Some times you have to go against the grain and produce what is truly meaningful. Black Label ComiCon plans to break the traditional rule, we want to usher in new ideas for people from many different walks of life. Black Label ComiCon plans to establish itself as the first truly Indy Publishing Con on the East Coast, but to also celebrate the accomplishments and the History of Black Wall Street. The creators at this event have put a lot on the line to be here and they would kindly love your support. www.BlackLabelComiCon.com There will be Vendors of uniquely owned individual properties, Too Many Artist to put on here, but many have the heart of these Legendary Creators. Peach / Cucumber Martini aka (Pikachu Martini) Door Prizes, Chocolate Nation Studios Productions and others will be added. Disk Jockey playing Classy style hits For More info about this event go to www.BlackLabelComiCon.com Support this Kickstarter and Share this campaign with others. Sleepless Domain is an ongoing fantasy webcomic for young adult readers and up, based on the Japanese "Magical Girl" genre of comics and anime. This Kickstarter's goal is to print the first four chapters of the book in a full-color, softcover collection. Denizens of a magically isolated city are under constant threat of monster attacks. By day, they live a relatively normal life. By night, deadly monsters roam the streets. Thankfully, the civilians can rely on the city's many Magical Girls to protect them from harm. Adored and celebrated by the populace, the Magical Girls are entrusted with great power and even greater expectations. Sadly, there's only so much pressure a teenager can take. The combination of the idol culture surrounding these girls, along with the genuine life-or-death struggle they face every night, forces them to grow quickly and adapt constantly. Perhaps it's a blessing that this barely gives them time to worry about the city's many secrets, not to mention the uncertain fate of the world outside. Undine is the water-wielding member of the popular Team Alchemical. While she's been happy to play a supporting role to the other four members of her team, a sudden tragedy forces her to learn to fight her own battles. A search for answers will lead her on a path to uncovering even deeper mysteries than she knew existed. Sleepless Domain is a coming of age story about expectations, loss, friendship through healing and hardship, and the price of magic. Basically, it's a story about typical teen girl stuff. The first English edition of Sleepless domain contains the first 4 chapters of the webcomic, printed as a full color, softcover, 7x10.5 book. The first 2 chapters were drawn by the very talented Oscar Vega, and written by Mary Cagle, artist and writer of all the subsequent chapters. The full comic can be read online here, where it is published by Hiveworks. In addition to the book itself, backers can select tiers that offer various other rewards. Check out the tiers below. Digital rewards include a wallpaper set and a digital copy of the book. Physical rewards include the book and a stationery set composed of a sticker sheet and a double-sided bookmark. As limited rewards, we have bookplates sketched and signed by Mary and acrylic character standees of HP and Undine! An adorable stationery set! 6-inch tall acrylic standee set of the two leads! The primary production costs of this Kickstarter will go toward printing the book, which is why additional stretch goals will be mostly focused on adding fun details to the book itself, rather then adding physical rewards. We'll be announcing them as they are unlocked! $25,000 - Spot Gloss added to the cover! $35,000 - Additional Concept and Commentary section in the back of book! $45,000 - A Fancy Team Alchemical mini print included with all physical tiers! The Hiveworks team will be helping with backer management, printing and shipping, and have already begun preparing the book for print. Special thanks to Rhiannon R.S. for the color correction and pre-press work on the comic. Thank you for helping us print Sleepless Domain Book 1! Be sure to check out Mary Cagle's work on Twitter and Patreon, and to give the comic a read! The music used in the video is Billion Stars by Remember the Future.

This new album will be the culmination of collective musical growth since the release of our debut album Little Sky in 2015. In the interim, Kathleen has lived in Ireland, the Netherlands, and now lives in Glasgow, Scotland; Everest spent half a year abroad in France and just moved to Montr�al, Qu�bec; and Guillaume has lived a quiet, charming existence at home in Putney, VT. Despite our geographic distance, our love for playing together has only grown. While we have continued to fly Kathleen back to the States to play for contra dance weekends, we have all collectively fallen in love with contemporary bal folk and Scottish music throughout our travels. This upcoming album will represent these new musical influences while remaining true to our roots as New England dance musicians. Photo by Dylan Ladds The Studio We will be recording at Studio Trad in Aalst, Belgium with the inimitable Jeroen Geerinck as our recording engineer. Jeroen is a formidable guitar player in bal folk bands such as Hot Griselda, Snaarmaarwaar, and Novar. As this album represents our newfound enthusiasm for bal folk music, we are beyond excited to be able to record in Europe with the support of one of our musical heroes. A note on our recording location: We debated long and hard about where to record our next album. We did a cost analysis of recording at Studio Trad versus recording within the United States. We decided to record at Studio Trad for the following reasons: Kathleen and Everest will both be in Europe this summer and it is cheaper to get Guillaume to Belgium than it is to get Kathleen and Everest back to the United States. Studio Trad was built and run by folk musicians who deeply understand the music we make and will help us create exactly the sound we want. Even with the exchange rate, the costs of recording/mixing/mastering are cheaper in Europe than in the States Studio Trad offers album artwork as a package, which saves us the cost of hiring a separate album designer. Jeroen Geerinck at Studio Trad Costs and Expenses Recording Mixing Mastering Designing Printing Shipping Publicity Merch and Swag Original music video by Jamie Oshima and Simon Beckford: Tunes in the video are: The Dwarves and The Lonely Mountain (Guillaume Sparrow-Pepin)

Well folks, we did it again. We've teamed up with Shut Up & Sit Down to create a HUGE new box of Monikers! At 330 cards, it's TRIPLE the size of our last collaboration. And at $20, it's only DOUBLE the price. What a steal! But for real, the cards are so funny and good: The box is full of pure comedy writing perfection, all 100% created by Shut Up & Sit Down and friends of the show! If you've never heard of Monikers before, the rules are super simple: get your friends to guess the name on the card. The twist is that you play over three rounds, and each time, you have to give clues in different ways. So in the 1st round, you can say or do anything. In the 2nd, you can only use one word. And in the 3rd, you can only do charades. The same deck of 50 or so cards are used in each round, so by the end of the game, you and your friends have made up a bunch of hilarious jokes together. Here's a really fun let's play video from Polygon that'll give you a good idea of what Monikers is like: And if you're still on the fence about the whole thing, here are some nice things people have said about the game: Monikers is also in the top 10 party games of all time on BoardGameGeek (in your FACE, Dixit: Odyssey) and has a 4.7 rating on Amazon from hundreds of reviewers. So if you like party games and laughing and just fun in general, we think you'll get a kick of out it. If you can believe it, the original Monikers kickstarter was 5 YEARS AGO. We want to keep things going for another 5 years AT LEAST�sorry in advance�so we've completely revamped our product line for how we want to release new games in the future. And we wrapped everything up in all new packaging, illustrated by the *brilliant* C�cile Gari�py as one long, ridiculous, interconnected party: Here's how the boxes are organized now: Monikers - The base 440-card set. For completionists, the base game has had about 30-40% turnover since the initial 2015 release, so if you have a super old copy, now might be the time to update. Monikers: Classics - This box combines all our previous small box expansions: Shmonikers, Something Something, and the original Shut Up & Sit Down Nonsense Box from a couple years ago. Monikers: More Monikers - The big box set from last year, condensed down to 330 cards and a normal sized box. We moved some of the leftover cards to Monikers and Classics, and cut a few that we think didn't age as well as the rest. Monikers: Serious Nonsense - The brand new set from Shut Up & Sit Down! It also includes the MUCH REQUESTED return of the 12 Hopelessly Stupid Fourth Rounds! ALL boxes come with rulebooks and are completely playable on their own! And because we hate AIR, all the cards have the same snug and compact fit as the old base game. We're so so so thrilled with the new box and CANNOT WAIT to get everything to you later in the year.

"I'm Glad You're In Our Family" is an illustrated children's book which tells the story of how a father, Andrew, and his adopted son, Bobby, become best friends. The sole motivation in creating and publishing "I'm Glad You're In Our Family" is to share a delightful message about adoption and bring families closer together. Any proceeds from sales will be used to benefit birth mothers and couples in the process of adoption. This campaign is to raise the money needed to cover the costs of developing a high-quality children's book and having it ready to sell at an affordable price. The funds raised will be used for the time investment from the artist, the proof copies (ensure high quality), and other various costs which are necessary to have a book ready to sell. If the target is reached, the book will be released in the Fall of 2019. Thank you for backing this project and playing a part in bringing the story to life. We're excited to have "I'm Glad You're In Our Family" ready for everyone to enjoy and hope you can be part of some of the fun events we'll have along the way!

This all started years ago, whenever I was a teen actually. I would be in so much pain. I would grow nauseous, emotionally unstable, very hungry, and very tired. Over the years I found simple things comforted me, and it made that short time a little better. I want to share that all over the world. I was also diagnosed with a host of related illnesses such as PMDD, and dermatological conditions that made this time last longer for me than others. I want to comfort women across the world and give them something to look forward to. There will be different package options, for different prices sent monthly to women on a specific date every month. It will include hygiene wipes, a few pads or tampons, candles, chocolates, special soaps, scented oils and more! I make my own products, everything is natural and handmade and the boxes will be together by me and others.

You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 Why Bedtime Sucks: the opposite of a bedtime story is my first book. The story begins with a little girl�s witty objection to the various reasons she�s been told she needs a good night�s rest. This book introduces readers to the creative and insightful thinking of an inspired little girl who could think of anything she�d rather do than go to sleep. The most exciting things happen after dark and maybe there are reasons she can explain to her parents about why she should stay up late. Author MaKayla Rose (photo by Meghann Roper) I love, love, love to read. I especially like reading books when the main character reminds me of myself. My name is MaKayla. My friends call me Kayla. I live with my mom, dad, and little sister in New Jersey. One of my favorite authors, Beverly Cleary, said Mrs. Cleary inspired me to write my own stories and I found that I love to write almost as much as I love to read! Late one night, I created the opposite of a bedtime story called Why Bedtime Sucks, because I couldn�t find a book I wanted to read for a bedtime story. MaKayla and Brianna (photo by Meghan Roper) It�s a story told from a kid's point of view explaining why they do not like bedtime and disputing some of the reasons parents give us for why we should get a good night�s sleep. Starring ME. I put myself in my story, and I added my family. Now I can find the book I want to read on my bookshelf. My story became a book at the end of the school year as a teacher appreciation gift for my first grade teacher, Mrs Kizitaff. Mrs. Kizitaff told me she'd like a copy of my first book, before I ever considered turning my story into a book. Her request sparked the idea! Listen to more of what my 1st grade teacher and principal have to say about this project: You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 All the illustrations in Why Bedtime Sucks are hand created by the extremely talented artist, Isabel Rivera. Isabel lives in Cancun Mexico and we met on KICKSTARTER (after supporting one of her campaigns). She understands my ideas and we work together on character development, hopefully there�ll be an international edition some day! We wanted to make the illustrations in this book as close to the images I first illustrated and imagined while writing the story. By working closely with Isabel my vision is becoming a reality and my character has my face and my personality in her artistic style. She made me adorable with smooth peanut butter skin, big dark chocolate almond shaped eyes and unruly curly hair. The characters inspired by my family are still being developed, but don�t worry I�m helping Isabel create them too! You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 Why Bedtime Sucks is an opportunity to provide diversity into illustrated children�s books that would benefit all children. The main character represents every child who can think of a million things they rather do than go to sleep. Writing children's books is one way I can help close the literacy gap. Another way is with book donations to an organization that has made it their mission to address the literacy gap one state at a time. The 50 States 50 Books project provides free diverse books to kids nationwide. Every pledge level above dawn includes a book donation to the 50 states 50 books project. Self-publishing will allow the book to stay 100% true to my vision and mission. In order to do so I need your support! Crowdfunding will allow this project to be made as a direct result of everyone�s support. That's where you come in: Here�s the breakdown of what the campaign will fund Production cost Book Printing Distribution (Shipping cost to me and then to you) Kickstarter fees A closer look at some of our rewards... PDF Coloring Page Door Hanger (design 1) Door Hanger (design 2) Door Hanger (design 3) Sticker Sheet Poster Enamel Pin The book is currently being illustrated. We are well underway, but it is a work in progress. Self publishing means we don't have a marketing team or a broad range of retailers to get the word out about the book prior to printing.

My Name is Adie Buchanan, I'm known on Instagram as CatHeadPins Instagram , Cat Head Pins Storenvy . I love to draw, read, marathon TV shows. Which is what made me decide to do this goth gfs themed kickstarter. I grew up watching all of these shows, I have more designs that I would like to add later on depending on how well these do. Raven from Teen Titans would be one of the later goth gf's added. Goth Girlfriend's of Childhoods Past This main goal is for the Goth Girls we all grew up loving. These in particular are some of my favorite goth girls. They really influenced me while growing up and they have continued to maintain an internet presence. Each design features either, glitter enamel, or glow enamel, a few offer both. The first goal on this Kickstarter is for the Hex Girls. Which is 2 inches wide, featuring a lovely bat shaped glitter background. It will have two pin posts, a back stamp featuring the cat head. Hex Girls Glitter Enamel Pin The Hex Girls- are seen in Scooby-Doo, first appearing in the Direct to DVD movie Scooby-Doo and the Witch's Ghost (1999). I designed this pin around the very iconic image and scene where the trio shows up. This pin will unlock at the main goal of $450. Left to right names: Dusk, Thorn, and Luna Bat Shaped Black Glitter Back Ground Gold plating 2 in wide 2 pin posts Cat Head back stamp Pie Chart Breakdown of Costs for The Hex Girls This shows the breakdown of costs for the Hex Girls any amount not used for the shipping, production, of this kickstarter will be put back into more pin designs in the future. Ember is described as a "siren like" character whose singing and playing hypnotizes people, getting people to chant her name causes her to increase her own power. Ember Detail image Ember's design is referencing her iconic rocker pose Bright Blue Glitter Enamel in her hair Her guitar flames and the back ground flames are glow in the dark enamel 2 pin posts 1.75 in tall Back stamp with the cat head design. Gold plating Stretch Goal #2 unlocks 950$: Wednesday Addams Wednesday Addams very first appearance was in a comic strip written by Charles Addams in The New Yorker, in 1938. I knew her from watching reruns on TV from the The Addams Family (1964), while others might know her more from the later adaptions of the show. In live action show, animated, or the movies. Where ever you first saw her almost everyone related to and loved her as one of the more well known goth. Wednesday Addams This design features Purple Glitter enamel inside the potion bottle and as well as the purple flowers on the bottom of the frame. Gold platting Cat Head back stamp 1.75 in tall 2 pin posts Stretch Goal #3 Unlocks at 1250$: Shego Shego first appears in the first episode of Kim Possible, episode "crush", which released in 2002. Shego is usually seen in connection to Dr. Drakken as a hired hand/ side kick. Despite her being hired help she is the main person Kim always fights with on sight. Shego is also not evil, but she just goes to where the money is highest. It is also seen that she has some sort of a moral compass but can usually ignore it in favor for whoever needs to pay her. Shego Shegos design features Glitter enamel in the back ground Glow in the dark hands and eyes 2 pin posts Cat Head back stamp gold plating is 1.75 in tall Stretch Goal #4 Unlocks at 1400$: Jinx Jinx is from the TV show Teen Titans, her first appearance in the TV show is tilted Final Exam. Jinx is a bad luck meta human, whose skills include shooting energy bolts to causing bad luck in a vague sense. Jinx is a bad guy, but shes not a terrible person. Personally i find her personality similar to cat woman, who does things for herself and her friends but others don't really matter. Jinx has stated that she "I'm bad luck. Good was never an option for me." giving her a more sad kind of motivation for being a bad guy because she can't be anything else. Sam is one of Danny's long term friends and often partakes in the adventures of the Danny. Hunting ghosts, getting into trouble and having fun. Sam isn't a depressed goth, and doesn't only hang out with goths either. Her best friends being Danny and Tucker. She is a quiet kid who likes reading, poetry, and taking photos. She seems to be a very lonely, sad person from the start of the movie, where she moves into the house of this dead but sweet married couple. During the movie she bonds more and more to the dead couple. At the end of the movie she seems to be much happier but still a classic goth aesthetic. A MESSAGE FROM MANHATTAN TRANSFER'S ALAN PAUL! You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 The Manhattan Transfer may be the most influential, iconic and beloved vocal harmony group in modern musical history. Tracing their origins from the New York club scene, through their nearly five decades of award-winning music and thousands of performances, this film will be an intimate and honest look into the true story of The Transfer as told by its members, colleagues, friends, and celebrities who have taken part in their fantastic journey. Through the good times and bad, hits and misses, loves and tragic loss, they have given us nearly half a century of great music and fantastic stories, and they're not done yet! It�s a backstage musical, a family drama, a tale about an incredible array of fascinating characters and their complex relationships, and ultimately a story of love. Plus, it will be packed with great musical performances by the Transfer and their musical influences. We are so grateful that The Transfer is opening up their vaults to hours of rare performances and never before seen backstage footage that will completely knock your socks off. It is our mission to bring it all to you. It�s a story that cries out to be told and preserved on film for the ages. I love art, I love jazz and soul, I love documentaries (I was even nominated for an Oscar for one), and I�ve loved The Manhattan Transfer�s music for decades. I also love great 4-part vocal harmony�of which The Transfer has set the bar. I hope this documentary will help bring it back into fashion. I first met Alan Paul, one of the group�s founders, when our daughters sang together in their high school vocal jazz group. The group even opened for a Transfer concert and won the Best High School Jazz Vocal Group award at the Monterrey Jazz Festival. Alan and I often carpooled and have stayed good friends ever since. Over the years, Alan has shared with me many personal stories of The Transfer and its members, from their childhoods to their founding, through nearly 5 decades of music, awards, and fans. I�ve been particularly interested in how the group stayed together for all these decades, long after most musical groups have broken up. I hope this film will enlighten audiences to their secret, while presenting backstage and performance footage, much of which has never been seen in public before. Although I�m one of the filmmakers, I can�t wait to see it. I hope you feel the same. Miles Mogulescu, Director No one sings 4-part harmony like The Manhattan Transfer. Recognized by fans, critics, and fellow musicians for their mastery of Jazz, R & B, Doo-Wop, Pop, and Bebop, they are, quite simply, the gold standard. It is hard to think of another internationally acclaimed group who has flourished as long at such a high level. The Transfer have won 11 Grammys, recorded over 30 albums and collaborated with the likes of Ella Fitzgerald, Jon Hendricks, Smokey Robinson, Bette Midler, The Count Basie Orchestra, Chick Corea, Frankie Valli, Bobby McFerrin, Take 6, and Weather Report. They�ve thrilled millions of fans around the world from small clubs, to major concert halls, to giant stadiums, running the gamut from being the summer replacement for The Cher Show on CBS, to performing at The Palace Theater in London to headlining Disney Hall in Los Angeles. And they�re still going strong! If you would like more than one of the rewards, please message us and we will help make that happen! CONTACT US AT: manhattantransferstory@gmail.com MILES MOGULESCU, DIRECTOR is an Academy Award-nominated documentary filmmaker, producer, and business affairs executive. His film �Union Maids� was nominated for an Oscar for Best Feature Documentary. He founded and ran The Film Fund, which helped support, numerous documentaries and also co-founded The Independent Feature Project, which went on to sponsor the Independent Spirit Awards. He produced �Montana� for HBO, written by Pulitzer Prize winner Larry McMurtry, starring Gena Rowlands and Richard Crenna. His superstar music video and documentary remake of �Give Peace a Chance� with new lyrics by Yoko Ono, Sean Lennon, and Lenny Kravitz, featured artists like Tom Petty, Peter Gabriel, Bonnie Raitt, Al Jarreau, Run DMC, Michael McDonald, Cindy Lauper, Little Richard, L.L. Cool J, Iggy Pop, and Steve Van Zandt. Miles is also an entertainment attorney and business affairs executive (graduated first in his law school class.) He was a Senior Vice President at MGM. He has negotiated financing for many independent films, including �Drive� starring Ryan Gosling, Carey Mulligan, and Oscar Isaac; the Oscar-nominated �Nightcrawler� starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rez Ahmed and Rene Russo; Oscar winner �Whiplash� starring J.K. Simmons and Miles Teller; and �Colette� starring Keira Knightly. JOHN ANDERSON, Co-Director/Editor is an Emmy-winning and Grammy-nominated editor, director, and executive producer, and the recipient of Screen Magazine's 'Editor of the Year' award. His work has appeared on HBO, PBS, A&E, MTV, Showtime, ABC, NBC, CBS, and the BBC. His award-winning collaborations with Brian Wilson and The Beach Boys over the last 20 years have spanned six projects, including Brian's performance of the title track in "Love & Mercy," the 2015 biopic starring John Cusack, Paul Dano, and Elizabeth Banks. Other artists whom John has worked with include Neil Young, Pete Townsend, Patti Smith, Paul McCartney, Kanye West, Elvis Costello, Jack White, Bonnie Raitt, Sheryl Crow, Jackson Browne, Iggy Pop, Todd Rundgren, John Prine, Eric Clapton, John Cage, and Nancy Sinatra. John recently completed producing, directing, editing and co-writing a feature documentary about legendary Chicago bluesman Paul Butterfield, entitled "Horn From The Heart." MATT MINDLIN, Cinematographer is best known for lighting and filming numerous photo and video shoots for Madonna, Cher, and Stevie Nicks over the past fifteen years. In addition to extensive commercial and music video work for major companies and artists, Matt�s other credits include �Mr. Hoover and I� (directed by documentary legend Emile de Antonio), �Spinal Tap: Back From The Dead,� �Dear Mom, Love Cher,� �Diddy: On The Record,� J -Lo: On The Record,� �Bill Frissell: A Portrait,� �Bukowski: Born Into This,� �Madonna: The Confessions Tour,� and �Madonna: Sticky and Sweet Tour� and he collaborated on a whimsical series of short films with Robert Downey, Jr. sponsored by HTC. If you would like to make a larger contribution that is tax deductible, please contact us! manhattantransferstory@gmail.com

Ever since I started writing the Days Series, historical feature stories about Southern Utah, Northern Arizona and Southern Nevada, I've wanted to put together a compilation book to share these stories with a wider audience and to have them on the printed page rather than just on a screen, which is the only place they are available now. This project means the world to me for several reasons: No. 1 - It is one of my bucket-list items is to get a book published; No. 2 - I look forward to the satisfaction of actually getting a book published; But most importantly, No. 3 - I will sincerely enjoy sharing my love of this region's history with even more people. I am not in this project for the money (I know I won't make much from doing it). I am in it for the satisfaction of sharing the history of this region I adore! I am doing this project because I need funds for graphics, formatting and set-up fees to self publish the compilation of 25 stories about Washington County, Utah. My day job is a middle school English teacher. As such, I don't have a lot of money to throw around. The proceeds of this call to action would provide me with the funds to make the publication of this compilation book a reality and once I'm done with this first book, Volume 1, I'll move on to the next book, Volume 2, which will be about other places in Southern Utah, Northern Arizona and Southern Nevada.

At 10th Dimension Productions we set out for to create a simply yet unique card design that would not overwhelm the eye, but at the same time could create an optical illusion in and of itself. What we came up with was Perplexity. Playing cards with a back design that always appears symmetrical, but the focal point for the symmetry changes based on the viewers perspective. Our primary goal was to design a deck of cards with magicians and cardists in mind so each Perplexity deck includes a double back, jokers that were made with changes in mind, and a special reveal on the one of the jacks. We have also included a bonus reveal on the tuck box. We didn't want to use traditional pips, so we decided to go with green and dark brown pips to make the faces of the cards stand out. Naturally this brought the face cards into the same color scheme. And lastly, we wanted to create something rare and meaningful to collectors, so the first version of Perplexity will only have 1000 decks printed... EVER. Making this the only chance to get a V1 Perplexity deck. There will be 20 uncut sheets available to those that really love the rarities. Version two will be released down the road, but will have a redesigned tuck, as well as other changes, and will not be a limited run. Perplexity will be printed by USPCC, so you can expect the highest standard of quality. Don't forget to check us out on Facebook for more pictures and videos. https://www.facebook.com/10thDimensionProductions

We are raising funds to purchase an enclosed trailer and fit it with a simulator entertainment ride that can be taken anywhere in the continental US and set up at festivals, fairs, group events or private parties. This will allow us to move the project to just about anywhere for any event and provide hours of fun for anyone of any age. The rides can be changed hourly if needed so we can offer a different adventure for repeat riders. Depending on your pledge the rewards could include bringing the adventure to your private party for your guests to enjoy or could be used as a fund raiser. This would also be available for reserving for parties or events on a pay per ride, hourly rental fee or event contractual fee as agreed upon.

Mr. Yunioshi is a solo performance piece written for an Asian American actor to perform. The goal of this piece is to create something that an Asian actor might be able to self-produce, no matter where you are. Coming from a regional theatre background, I understand the importance of being able to see yourself represented on stage. With Mr. Yunioshi, my hope is that if you're an Asian actor, you'll be able to share your work with your artistic community. This fundraiser is meant to support both the upcoming Hollywood Fringe Festival production, as well as starting the ball rolling on eventually publishing the script. Thank you all so much for your support!
