FINGAZ BOWL FOR FINGERS DRINKING GAME We present to you the original Fingaz Bowl. The Fingaz Bowl will drastically improve gameplay of Fingers Drinking Game. The Fingaz Bowl is made of FDA approved plastic and is dishwasher safe to improve cleanliness. But, most importantly, The Fingaz Bowl will be MADE IN AMERICA! The bowl is outfitted with carved out notches for fingers, a shot glass holder, and a spout to drink from. The Fingaz Bowl will come in red or blue. HOW TO PLAY FINGAZ BOWL FEATURES WHEN DID WE START? Fingaz Bowl Timeline OUR STORY After playing countless rounds of fingers drinking game with all sorts of kitchen objects, our founder Julien decided it was time to end this. Once he finished college, he put together a team to accomplish this. After two years of preparation, the Fingaz Bowl is ready for all your pre-games, parties, tailgates, beach days, BBQs, boat days, and good ol� gatherings with friends & family! MANUFACTURING DATES Manufacturing Timeline RULES Fingers is a rapid drinking game which needs no skills other than the ability to count. Each player puts one finger on the rim of the bowl on the finger notch. Next, the player that starts begins a countdown of �3,2,1�. When the player gets to 1 each person must leave their finger on the notch or remove it (this must happen quickly). The player doing the countdown must say a fourth number after his 3,2,1 countdown. This fourth number will be the number of fingers that player believes will be on the bowl at the end of the countdown. This guess can be anything from 0 (all fingers removed) to however many total people are playing. When this has happened, the number of fingers left on the bowl are counted. If the person says the correct number of fingers he or she has guessed correctly and is out for that round and therefor doesn�t need to drink at the end. If they are incorrect they must stay in the game. Everyone puts their fingers back on the bowl and begins to predict the correct number again. The game continues until only one person is left, the loser must drink the all contents of the bowl or shot glass to complete the round. WHO WE ARE CEO - Julien Graduated Sacred Heart University in 2016 with a degree in Business Administration with a focus in International Business. After countless rounds of playing fingers, maybe too many rounds, Julien came up with the idea of creating a custom bowl for the game. Julien spent the next year and a half as a sales rep for a large fortune 500 company. Since, he has been in an client success manager position for a large commercial real estate software company. COO - Thomas is a 2010 graduate of Villanova University where he majored in Philosophy. Thomas is Julien's cousin and had no option other than to play many rounds of Fingers and come on board as the Chief Operating Officer. Thomas founded a medical equipment company in 2008 with his father in Orange, CT. CFO - Jordan graduated from Sacred Heart University in 2016 with a double major in Economics and Finance. Jordan attended the same high school as Julien. However, Neither started playing Fingers until they went off to college. Since graduation Jordan has worked in multiple financial institutions. Jordan is the founder of Followout, a tri-state area based media and social entertainment company. CHEERS!!!

A War Department Cover-up Scandal Over 1,000 US Soldiers were killed when Hitler�s secret weapon hit their ship in WWII. The radio-guided missile attack resulted in the greatest loss of life at sea by enemy action in the history of US war. However, the German assault on the HMT Rohna was erased from history, along with the men who died when the burning ship sank to the bottom of the sea. We have obtained hundreds of classified documents from both the US and British War Departments Survivors Were Ordered to Remain Silent The US War Department declared the Rohna attack �Classified� ordering all survivors to remain silent in a cover-up scandal that left a thousand Gold Star families in the dark. Do you have 28 seconds? Click on play and hear what the survivors have to say... You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 1015 Heroes Were Killed in a Missile Attack and Then Forgotten The families were never told what happened to their boys and their remains still lay at the bottom of the sea. In most cases, there were no funeral services or burials for the forgotten heroes. Six months after the attack, the Gold Star families received one short paragraph confirming the demise of their loved one in a telegram that also stated that there was "no information available." That was it; the boys just never came home. May 21, 1944 was the date that most families found out that their loved one died (Six months after the attack). Classified documents confirm that the War Department knew that no one could survive the frigid water temperatures or the rough conditions of the sea that night. Families were Put Through Unnecessary Pain and Anguish The US Government's first sin regarding the attack was the War Department's decision to mislead the Gold Star families giving them false hope for six months when they knew that the 1015 heroes died. The second one was that they Classified the attack indefinitely. What Went Wrong and How Did This Happen? The reason for the cover-up and the secrecy behind the Rohna attack is a 75-year-old question that gets complicated. The HMT Rohna was a British transport ship with an Australian Captain and an Indian crew who were transporting American soldiers. The ship was considered unfit for wartime transportation and in poor condition. It was overcrowded, lifeboats were not in working order, appropriate drills and procedures for operating emergency equipment were not followed. We are still researching and investigating how and why this attack stayed classified even after the war was over as well as why families of the casualties were never told how their boys died. How This Film Got Started I was moving things around in my attic when I came across 23 letters written by a young man who was killed in WWII. The soldier was Sgt. Joseph Pisinski, he was my wife's great uncle. Those letters led me to discovering one of Hitler�s secret weapon attacks that was covered-up by the War Department. It was the first time a radio-guided missile was ever used against the US and resulted in the greatest loss of life at sea by enemy action in the history of US war. This is one of the letters he wrote to his mother from training camp. This is one of 23 letters Sgt. Joseph Pisinski sent home to his mother throughout training camp. After training was completed he boarded the HMT Rohna and was killed in the Rohna attack on his second day of war. The Outreach Program The ROHNA: CLASSIFIED team is on a mission to not only make a great documentary, but also to carry out the promise that the survivors made to find every family of the casualties and tell them the truth. Our Outreach Program, includes a "Casualty Search" page on our website. It is headed by Sunny Duncanson and Tracey Bannon whose uncle was a casualty in the Rohna attack. The Outreach Program also includes Rohna programs around the country as well as a Social Studies curriculum that teachers will be able to download from our website. Our goal is not only to get this story into the history books where it belongs, but it will also honor the forgotten soldiers and let their families know the truth behind this historic attack. Most of the casualties were boys in their late teens or early twenties. Documentary Preview Trailer The Rohna documentary will be told through the lives of 3 soldiers who were on the Rohna and one who was on the ship next to it. Two other subjects of the film include the German scientist who invented the the radio-guided missile and was smuggled back to the US and the commanding pilot who launched the deadly missile and asked his son to meet the survivors and apologize on his behalf. With your help, we will tell this story of fate, love, war and triumph. Watch our preview below: How We Will Use the Funds That We Raise Rohna: Classified has been in pre-production for the last year. We have been researching, writing, working on an amazing Outreach Program, making contacts with family members of the subjects and historians, as well as filming and editing promos. We've completed a fundraising reel and premiered our website and Social Media pages. This first phase of fundraising will allow us to move into production as we continue to submit grant applications and pitch Rohna: Classified to networks. These funds will allow us to travel and film in the different locations throughout the country and to continue researching the US and UK National Archives. The Rohna: Classified Team

A hand-crafted hardcover anthology including all original issues of "The Willows" magazine from 2007-2010 � PLUS: Our story: Thirteen years ago, a small group of artistic and literary misfits joined forces to create a publication unlike any other. In the flickering firelight of their library, editors Ben Thomas and Skadi meic Beorh envisioned a hand-crafted magazine of macabre neo-Victorian art and fiction... And so, The Willows Magazine was born. For four illustrious years, The Willows provided a home for contemporary writers working in the weird tradition of Arthur Machen and Algernon Blackwood � for poets inspired by Charles Baudelaire and Edgar Allen Poe � and for strange artists inspired by Aubrey Beardsley and Harry Clarke. At long last, the stars are right � and the time has come for The Willows to be reborn as a hardcover anthology! Featuring a wealth of classic stories from G. D. Falksen, Sarah Monette, Lawrence Dagstine, and many more � along with brand-new tales from award winners Gemma Files, John Langan, Brian Evenson, Orrin Grey and Jesse Bullington; plus a new introduction from editors Ben Thomas and Skadi meic Beorh � this anthology will be a collector's item you'll be proud to treasure. Every page will overflow with weird fiction, eerie poetry, macabre art � and highly diverting Victorian advertisements! Pledge your support, and give The Willows new life � in a volume you�ll be proud to display in your own firelit study.

HAIL TO THE VICTORS is the definitive annual preview magazine for Michigan football. It is jam packed with content from MGoBlog authors and our regular crew of contributors. CONTAINED WITHIN ITS MULTITUDINOUS PAGES ARE A FULL TEAM PREVIEW from Brian Cook of MGoBlog. Every potential contributor, every breakout freshman, every... uh... 2021 quarterback recruit we're quite excited about. Depth. Breadth. Pro Football Focus tweets. Yeah buddy. The opposition surveyed by Seth Fisher, Bryan Mackenzie, and Adam Schnepp. Ohio State in the post-Urban era. Notre Dame at night. I have not read the Middle Tennessee portion yet but I personally guarantee it will shout out Giddy Potts. HARDCORE FOOTBALL BUSINESS. This year's pieces include Seth's look at what Josh Gattis will try to accomplish as Michigan's first out-and-out spread offensive coordinator since... well, it's been a minute. Speed in Space! Also Ian Boyd evaluates what happened to Don Brown's defense at the end of last year and what he might do to make his defense less susceptible to... that. The material Michigan is made of. Adam Schnepp sits down with senior viper Khaleke Hudson. Michael Elkon surveys what happens when a legendary coach leaves. You know, in case that happened to anyone recently. Michigan's history, researched annually. Dr. Sap talks to Bo's chief assistants Jerry Hanlon and Jim Young about their preparation, strategies, play calls, and tricks for beating Ohio State in 1969. Greg Dooley on Fielding Yost's rarely-discussed tenure as athletic director. Craig Ross finally writes about something he did not personally experience by going all the way back to 1893, the year the colleges realized football was a big business and made it theirs. THE SHIRT This year's exclusive kickstarter shirt almost had ALF on it until we decided not to get sued by a vengeful purveyor of 1980s sitcom copyrights: If this does not fit your fancy you'll be given the option to pick from a selection of our most popular merch. 128 pages jam-packed with Michigan content! No filler! Even the roster has delightful asides! A free E-Book version for everyone! Consume!

A B O U T Hello! I am a proud supporter of the LGBT Community. Both me and my sister are one of the many LGBT supporters/members who live in a household where we cannot show who we are to our family in fear of being kicked out or harassed until we leave. Because of this, it is hard for use to buy pride merchandise and often have to get things that can still be pride but 'lowkey'. After trying to shop for items for this pride month, we found that there are not many things we could get cause it would be too obvious if our parents saw it. I figured we are not the only ones out there who want more lowkey pride merchandise. So I decided to make my own pride merchandise, where it still shows off pride but not too obvious, in the form of delicious cake slices! Enjoy a delicious slice of your favorite flavor and show your pride! FamilyMatch is currently being developed to be the world�s first Internet matching service for entire families to enhance their family social life and well-being. I.e. focused on providing parents a way to match both their children and themselves with other children and parents in their area who they would most likely develop meaningful bonds and community relations with. It is a service for all families consisting of either single or coupled parents, along with any number of children, whose ages range from 1 to 13-years old, and who wish to improve the choices they have for socializing with other suitable families. The prototype site is planned to be completed within sixty (60) days after the end of this Kickstarter Campaign before going on to Beta testing thereafter . Our aim is to have the best service, on and off the Web, for matching entire families with others who would not have otherwise met, in order to help build healthy community relations for children and adults alike. Simply put: Improve family and hence, human relations . Let�s face it: Many times you will get together with a family who you hope and pray will be good for you and your kids. If you're lucky, the children will get along even if the adults don't. On the other hand, the adults may get along fine, but the kids don't. Then of course more often than not, neither the kids nor the adults are motivated to get back together with "that" family. But perhaps even more bothersome is how we must spend so much time and effort setting up today�s "playdates" and groups, then struggle to drag the father along, only to result in a temporary or superficial outing that no one cares to repeat. There are other issues such as the time it takes to go through the conventional process of finding and meeting families, and we discuss this in more detail below . Many of us are finding our families being isolated in our communities, even though there are hundreds of other families around us. On the one hand, we are limited to going on "play-dates" only with those who attend our school, church, mosque, synagogue or extra-curricular activities. On the other hand, even if we had a larger number of families to choose from, how would we know whether they are compatible with our interests and values or not? What seems to add to the problem is the growing trend of using high-tech devices which appears to cause families to not only become more and more disconnected from other families, but even disconnected within their own. High-tech gadgets and technology are not bad in and of themselves, but the way we are using them, is frankly endangering our social relationships. FamilyMatch is founded, operated and driven by parents who are confronting the dramatic changes that our modern-day world forces upon us. Parents who have lived, worked and even had their children enrolled in schools located in the United States, Australia, India, Pakistan, Dominican Republic and England. Not only did they find it time consuming and difficult to identify the right families to get together with, but they witnessed that around the globe, parents encounter the same issue. Technology has changed the face and nature of families more than any other period in history. From children being connected to games and their friends through devices, to adults being plugged into their jobs as never before. These demands are put on us in ways that isolates us from having the healthy physical connections that families in the past enjoyed. The Founders of FamilyMatch recognize this. Some of them have actually been directly part of the earliest online matching systems since 2010 and have now marshalled their experience and know-how to develop an online service that is designed to dramatically improve a family�s social and community life. So instead of letting technology diminish or eliminate your family�s social life, you can now use technology to intelligently expand or reduce your family�s orbit, versus letting it randomly shrink or grow it Next, they spent 14 months conducting focus-group surveys of over 2600 parents which resulted in 98.3 claiming that they needed something like FamilyMatch to help them with finding suitable families whom they can be matched with. They collectively agreed that as long as FamilyMatch maintains the best possible security of their family's information that they would readily use and incorporate it into their lives. The founders' aim is to use technology to give families the control to expand their family's orbit with families whom they would not otherwise be able to connect with. The system is in prototype, pre-Beta stage and is designed to not only more accurately identify those who would be suitable for each other, but to be a safer way for families to get together because they would have been pre-screened by FamilyMatch as well as yourself. This is why we created FamilyMatch! Step 1: Create A Profile; Step 2: Fill Out Values & Characteristics Matching Survey; Step 3: FamilyMatch's patented algorithm goes to work; and, Step 4: Browse matching families and start planning family gatherings and events Parents start by creating a FamilyMatch� profile. All of this information will be backed by our absolute privacy guaranty. We will never share our users personal data with others, and even within FamilyMatch, only highly classified personnel shall have access to such under Board of Director supervision. The Profile will consist of basic information such as name, single or coupled parents, number of children and other similar information. Once the profile is completed, you will then be ready to move on to the confidential FamilyMatch Survey. Next, is the FamilyMatch survey where the foundational pre-screening takes place. We will ask the parent(s) questions about their family's values, characteristics and qualities that will help our algorithm find the best family for yours. This information is not processed by humans, but our highly secured algorithm which has been developed by some of the best matching experts in the world. Our survey shall allow you to answer a few questions and save others for later, so that you are in control of how much time you spend on it. We also do not make these questions mandatory. You decide what you wish or do not wish to provide. Note: The more our parents answer during the survey process, the more accurate your matches will be. Once you have made a family profile, our website will begin to analyze other families in your area. You will never be forced to accept any family or even have your identity known to them. You will always be in control of the process at every stage. We will present our FamilyMatch recommendations to you for you to make a choice of which families to get together with, or not. Once you have selected a family you will be able to access messaging and other features in order to establish contact. The choices will be to go at the pace that you and the other family is comfortable with. Some may be ready and willing to meet each other right away, others may need to go one step at a time. e.g. text or email each other for a period, before speaking on the phone then meeting at your own designated place or at a FamilyMatch event. As an additional feature, we are developing a model where there will be FamilyMatch Events in each area that will be exclusive to FamilyMatch Members, which will be focused on family activities, relational work-ships, speakers and more, sponsored by FamilyMatch. FamilyMatch is a convenient and time saving concept. Our Focus Groups have found that mothers, on average can spend 1 to 2 hours a day emailing, calling, and talking with other mothers to see when and where they can meet for playdates. After you become a FamilyMatch Member, each time that you wish to find a family to partner with will take a few minutes to find. Also, FamilyMatch's pre-screening process filters out surprises and cuts down on time to find families who have similar qualities and values as yours. This helps you avoid the trial-and-error playdates and focus on quality time spend in actual activities. There are times when someone is more of a indoor piano playing-child and the other child that you "playdate" with, turns out to be an insatiable soccer fan. Ninety percent of the time this arrangement simply doesn�t work. The families end up in frustration with a feeling of wasting their time and resulting in not seeing each other again. Some times they ultimately they give up on the entire playdate scene itself. Parents clearly need a way to minimize the effort it takes to find the right family and be able to do this at a time that they can control. FamilyMatch aims to encourage families to have more social interactions with great matches and become a family's personal Match-Maker! First and foremost is the security of FamilyMatch users in general, particularly the children. We do live in a world where some bad-actors prey on children and women. We are guaranteeing that FamilyMatch will deploy the best means possible for preventing those types from being part of our system and if any slip through the cracks, to identify and terminate them right out of the system. We are partnering with national and international security background check companies to stand on the front line, and there will be other things used to identify them as well. Concerning personal information: We will not sell any personal data about any family, nor will we give such away. Once we begin our Beta testing our system will be housed on the most secured servers in the world except for most governmental ones . At this stage of our pre-launching into Beta testing, we are currently on open servers where our prototype is being developed. Part of the reason for this crowdfunding campaign is to position this technology to be deployed from one of the most secured Cloud system(s) in the world. e.g. Amazon Web Services (AWS) or google's storage platform. Either one of these actually touts security that is beyond anything that the U.S. and other governments have for web security. We plan to actually issue a guaranty which will comment the company to paying any user whose data is breached. Lastly, all of our personal data shall be encrypted within our system so that even if James Bond were to penetrate our system's security they would not have the encryption keys to unlock any information. There are over a thousand matching services out there, but not a single one is helping families meet new families to build friendships. FamilyMatch is the very first service that is exclusively focused on bringing families together in hopes of improving family relations. Our challenge is to inform and capture the market before competitors arise. Our founders have a unique background in working with technology to match lawyers and clients who need their services. We are using such knowledge and experience now to bring families an incredible and easy experience with a lifetime of reward through rich experiences. Dr. Salma Merritt, MD, after spending several years in her medical career, was married to David Merritt and 2005. He was a former electronic engineer turned sales and marketing manager for LegalMatch.com, a site that focused on matching lawyers and clients together. He then launched a private company focused on bringing innovative children products to the market. Mother's 3rd Arm has been one of his greatest successes since 2009. Still selling at motherthirdarm.com and recently taken off of amazon and other retailers so he could put full attention on FamilyMatch. They authored 20th Century American Struggle, 21st Century Hope, a non-fiction work focused on improving race, gender and culture relations in the U.S. After they completed their National book tour with Barnes & Noble and others--2007-2008--they had their first child and in about 2 more years their 2nd. Both were novices on raising children, and both were very concerned about nurturing their kids. Salma worked as an in-home mom, prioritizing her children over her medical career. They agreed on finding a nurturing pre-K school for the children, experimented with homeschooling before joining a Parent Participating preschool. Ultimately they placed their kids in different private and charter schools before deciding on a unique, highly prized private elementary school. The Merritts started with live-in nannies in the heart of Silicon Valley. They then agreed on finding nurturing pre-K schools for their kids, before getting involved in homeschooling which led to joining a Parent Participating preschool. Ultimately they placed their kids in charter then private schools. In the end, no matter what type of schooling they did, there was always a growing difficulty in finding �the right� families to get together with. It was constantly a struggle. What was telling is the fact that they never met any parent who did not face the same struggles. Then finally, after meeting dozens of families who "wished that there was a better way" they commissioned numerous focus groups, mostly in the U.S. and Canada, who overwhelming wanted a tool which could truly help them. Salma struggled with setting up �playdates.� it was not only the logistics of getting together with other families but most of the time the children�s were not really a good match for each other. It was also a struggle to encourage David to join her in family gatherings with others, as it was for other women to encourage their husband to be part of it. The name FamilyMatch itself was obtained more than 20 years ago by co-founder Christina Stanbridge who founded and runs the London Nanny Company located in London and Kensignton, United Kingdom. She did not imagine that the name FamilyMatch would be making history in the 21st Century as the first family matching web service in the world, but she was "tickled" to join the Founder's team. Her own personal and professional paths lead her heart to focus on providing a service that matched nannies to care for the elderly as well as children. She and the Merritts met over the phone in 2017 and once she heard and felt the idea and motivation, she decided to join the effort before partnering with them to make FamilyMatch a reality. For their part, the Merritts were mostly inspired by seeing and understanding how some countries maintain solid family relations among themselves and develop loving bonds with other family groups which are not biological tied to them. Comparing such to the Western countries in general and the United States in particular, they came to believe that a tool for matching the right families together would go a long way in bringing health to community relations . Where Will The Funds Go?  40% Marketing  40% App & Web Development  10% Event Planning Costs  5% Referrals  5% Salary Product Specific FAQs: 1. How secure will my family�s information be? We live in a world where some bad-actors prey on children and women. At FamilyMatch not only do we understand this and willingly face this challenge, but we will guarantee that FamilyMatch will deploy the best means possible for preventing those types of folks from being part of our system. If any predators slip through the cracks, we will identify and terminate them right out of the system. We are partnering with national and international security background check companies to work on the front lines to wall out predators from our system. 2. Can we pause our membership? Going on vacation? Well you can pause your membership, but if you are an Elite Member, you can use FamilyMatch anywhere in the world. Otherwise, if you wish to suspend your monthly payments, you can pause your monthly payments to fit your time. We understand that other life priorities take hold of your time (money) and you should not have to pay for an inactive subscription. 3. Can we upload photos of our families on our Familymatch profile? Yes, you can upload photos on your Familymatch profile. Dare to share and let those selfies that consume your phone�s storage see the light of day! 4. How long does it take to build a Familymatch profile? The profile itself takes anywhere from five to 10 minutes. The subsequent survey is where our algorithm comes alive to matching your family with others. No survey question is mandatory, but the more data you provide, the more accurate your FamilyMatch will be. So it depends on how much time you�re willing to commit, but you are not required to commit it all in one sitting. You can choose to answer some questions in one sitting, and return later to answer more. Our system will save the place where you left off. 5. How long does it take to match with another family? Once you have provided our algorithm in with the information you wish to provide, it will just time minutes for it to search our database before showing you who the best candidates are for your family. It is to your discretion whether or not you chose to message them and attempt to become BFFs (or Best Friends Forever)! 6. Why is it important for my children to socialize with other families? Socialization is a key ingredient for personal growth and development of a child�s individuality. In order to share, set boundaries, and solve problem comes from socializing and interacting. You can Google it and you�ll find thousands of experts elaborating on the importance of getting your child engaged with others. We as parents are not going to be with our children in all of their future interactions, so just as we provide them the best food to eat when raising them, we must also provide them the best opportunities that we can to equip them for the world which they are going to face. 7. Is FamilyMatch a socially conscious technology? The whole reason why we created a FamilyMatch is to improve our communities. We know that technology has created separation from each other, so ironically, we are intentionally using technology in a way to bring us back into closer connection with one another. Just as there are people focused on curing the cancer that cigarettes create, we need folks who can focus on improving the disconnections that technology produces. Socializing with other families will also improve a personal relationships within the family as well as between each family in our communities. 8. What if I didn't like the family that I met with, but they are inviting us to meet again? Our system Rules & Guidelines will set the boundaries on how family interactions should take place. One of the Rules will be on prerogative, so that when a family request another family to meet, and the second family declines, the first family will be obligated to respect that family�s space. You can proceed to select other families that we have suggested for you and your family at any time. You should not have to settle for a family that just not the right fit. 9. What if I want to meet families unlike mine? Yes, you can absolutely do that. We will match you based on preferences that you provide. We understand that sometimes you want to see what different minded people are like as you try to break from your daily norm. Who knows? They just might spark a new interest in you. 10.What is the best way to arrange the first meeting? We recommend meeting in a public place, during the day while having a bite or participate in a mutually liked activity. If you have been touched by FamilyMatch, but can�t financially back us at this time, please take the time to share with your network on your social media pages. It would really help us out. You can reach more people than you think. If you know any families that would like or need FamilyMatch, you can participate and give the membership or other gifts to them or simply let them know about this campaign. Our official hashtag is #FamilyMatchOfficial.

Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 The Idea for the Zephyr Yes! occurred because I was given a prescription of added exercise, by my doctor; at the same time, I was experiencing symptoms of menopause (including, Hot Sweats). Due to the changes of my routine, and my body, the application of makeup became arduous and very unpleasant, at best. I was too balmy after hot sweats and workouts to apply makeup; this was not helping my esteem nor motivation, at all! I thought to myself, "There has to be a solution for this malady!" I Prayed to God for relief of of this plight. God's answer was, " Use the Gifts I have given You"... Thus, the Zephyr Yes! was born. This Mirror will illuminate as well as cool the user! With its integrated, three-speed fan, the Zephyr Mirror will blow air which will help set makeup by allowing it to dry faster. The mirror will provide both 1X and 10X magnification( by flipping mirror ) and illumination with three levels of brightness, LED lighting. Lighting and cooling is provided on both sides of mirror; just spin it to go from regular or 1X to 10X magnification. A 120V standard outlet is all that is needed to power the mirror. The mirror can be used by placing it on any level surface or by mounting it to a wall, door, etc., with the included mounting plate. I plan to develop future generations of this product to include battery operation and/or a USB charger, which will allow greater portability. My vision is that this product will end up in every home, gym, makeup studio, school and movie set, hospital, etc., so that the application of makeup and serums may become speedy and pleasurable. The cooling provided by the mirror will allow makeup to set, mascara to dry, and serums to absorb, with comfort and efficiency. Beauty can be fun and soothing again! The Zephyr Yes! is both design, and technology, patents pending. This Kickstarter Project will be used to fund manufacturing of the Zephyr Mirror prototype, the product itself, to get UL (Underwriters Laboratories) standard certification, and get product to the market. I also intend to donate to charitable causes that help Autism, Veterans and The Homeless.

I�ve always loved the quote �I�d rather be a little weird than all boring,� and I believe clothes and jewelry are one way you can make a statement to other about how unique you are. Each piece can give you a new sense of confidence and can allow your own spark of madness to shine. But I couldn't find jewelry for going out that made me feel confident but also wouldn't break or wasn't too expensive I was scarred of losing it. I�m creating Elurra Jewelry to fill this gap in the market of jewelry that captures one�s awe in design but is also worth the money in durability and quality. Most of our competitors trying to serve the same market, like Stella+Dot, fail in either producing pieces not worth the price tag or pieces that turn green within a month. This is because they use metals that are gold plated that easily oxidize and turn green. We're able to solve these problems by creating our pendants and earring out of laser cut two sided brushed gold or silver acrylic which can't tarnish and by using sterling silver chains that can last decades without rusting. The materials we chose also have a focus in sustainability as they help eliminate the need for fast fashion through using longer lasting materials for an affordable price. We�re asking you to join us so we can begin our journey as a business and retail our jewelry online. The Short Version: Damansara will be a Malaysian restaurant in San Francisco that unites eclectic Malaysian flavors with diverse palates. The casual noodle bar is an expansion of successful Malaysian pop up under the @EatWithTracy Instagram handle, which has received encouraging support around the Bay Area since 2013. The restaurant will be specializing in traditional Malaysian noodle meals collectively known as laksa. The mid-range casual eatery offers a menu of assorted laksa options, appetizers, seasonal specials and beverages. What others say about Tracy's Malaysian food: San Francisco Chronicle Eater Testimonials Background: Tracy was born and raised in Malaysia. She moved to the United States in 2012 where she subsequently left her desk job to become a food entrepreneur. In the beginning, cooking for no more than six guests was more of a cultural exchange social gathering in an attempt to meet new friends who enjoyed food just as much. The intimate dinner parties quickly turned into 20 to 60 people events. Fast forward to 2019, over 500 pop-ups and a few thousand diners later, we are ready for a permanent space. Tracy hosting a brunch in her former Sunset District 1BR apartment, circa 2014. Damansara's Vision: We want to extend the warm tropical spirit of Malaysia and share another type of noodle experience with this city that really embraces noodle soups from other parts of Asia. Damansara's Malaysian food is hot, full of flavor and comforting on the many foggy days in San Francisco. Why You Should Back This Project: 1) If you have been following our sporadic pop-up journey and wishing you could one day stop by at your convenience instead of waiting for a pop-up date that finally works for you - Damansara Restaurant is your answer :) 2) If you're reading this and find yourself wondering what laksa is and why there are hardly any actual Malaysian restaurants in the city, now is the time to help fill the void. 3) Rewards. We're all about meaningful connections, so we have chosen to spend time on creating special (and delicious) experiences with you in person rather than emphasizing on shipping things. That said, the limited edition items are thoughtfully designed and selected by Tracy and talented friends. How We Will Use the Fund: 1) Staffing: Good people are valuable assets to a business. 2) Inventory: Equipment, furniture, fixtures, tableware...things we need to get started. 3) The Space: Renovations, fresh paint, things we need to get the space ready for opening. Is the Food Going to be a Hit? Come taste it for yourself before backing. We're still actively popping up every weekend. Make a reservation before June 29 to find out if Tracy's got the chops. The Name: "Damansara" is named after Tracy's childhood home in Damansara Utama, a suburb that borders the west of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia's capital city. The neighborhood hosts some of the most popular hawker centers and restaurants in the city. Bandana Design (WIP) Updated 06/18/19: Here's the sketch for the bandana. All original pencil drawing by Aron Pruiett. Check out the flying noodles and quintessential laksa ingredients! This week we are refining the drawing and working with a US printer on fabric and color. Pledge $35 now to receive the cotton bandana and laksa bowl sticker set. Damansara Bandana Sketch Stickers for Backers Updated 05/31/19: Check out the laksa bowl stickers illustrated by my talented friend, Liew Kah Sing! We are still finalizing the designs. These are the works in progress:

Sunny the California Girl is the comic book biography of wrestler and model, Patricia Summerland, who wrestled in the groundbreaking 1980's G.L.O.W. - Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling promotion as Sunny the California Girl. Our comic tells the story of her life and career leading to her turn as a professional wrestler among such G.L.O.W. luminaries as Mount Fuji, Big Bad Mama, Major Tanya, and more! The script is based on personal interviews with Patricia conducted by writer and wrestling historian, John Crowther. It's 100% authorized and authentic! Sunny Herself - Patricia Summerland Who is Patricia Summerland? Sunny the California Girl in G.L.O.W. Promotion (1987) Playboy Model - March 1999 KISS Issue Model for Catalina Swimwear and Jordache Jeans (Early 1980's) Model for NFL Apparel (1980's) What You Get When You Back This Campaign: Sunny the California Girl is a 24-page comic in standard American comic size (6.625" x 10.25"). 23 of those pages are full-on story and art telling Patricia's story, chock full of wrestling action! This is a one-shot, self-contained story. Every physical (non-digital) backer will receive at least one print edition of the comic (Standard, Rare and Ultra-Rare options available, dependent upon the reward tier selected). All reward packages include a digital (PDF) edition of the comic. Many reward tiers include rare and even bonus collectibles, including autographed comics, original art from the comic, and rare KISS collectible sketch cards featuring Patricia in KISS make-up, illustrated by KISS trading card artist (and Squared Circle Comics co-owner) Amanda Rachels. Higher reward levels include all variant cover editions of the comic AUTOGRAPHED by Patricia herself, the original cover art from each edition of the book, as well as opportunities to advertise your comic or creative business in the book. Your name on our Acknowledgements page in the comic: Bronze level ($15-$49 pledge); Silver level ($51-$74 pledge); Gold level ($75+ pledge). FREE U.S. Shipping! Rare Edition Cover by Artist Amanda Rachels & Colorist Andrew Pate! You Will LOVE Sunny the California Girl IF: You are a fan of the GLOW television series on Netflix! You watched the G.L.O.W - Gorgeous Ladies of Wrestling series in the 1980's! You love action-packed, smartly written comics with a dynamic art style! You have a passion for professional wrestling, its superstars and its history! For years I have done my best to motivate and inspire people with my endeavors and my speeches worldwide. But often I know that people are unable to attend those speeches and while they love my method and delivery, haven't been able to benefit from what I can share. I often bristle at the idea of being called a motivational speaker because I have found many in the field do not present an accurate or true account of reality. Perhaps it is a touch of cynicism on my part but I have never been one who believes in the kumbaya spirit. As such I was always reluctant to write a book that was about much more than what I felt I could really talk about: running. However, given that running is such a small part of my life, and has just been the conduit which people have found out about what I have accomplished and still strive to do, I was finally convinced by enough cajoling to put my thoughts on inspiration and motivation down on paper. To me, Ignore The Impossible is not just a mantra but rather the non-motivational-lovers phrase to motivate. It is the book which brings truth and reality to those looking to be inspired but who do not wish to be pandered to. I show from my own life experiences, as well as the lessons I have learned from countless others, how to succeed in life. These are ironclad solutions to problems of every ilk. They are all ways in which we can improve our station in life, rise above our troubles, and bring others with us. I never say we can do anything we want. I have always said that the only way to find out what you can do is to ignore the impossible and try it anyway.

Who are these guys? We are a group of three guys from Minnesota that have been involved with gaming our whole lives. Board games, tabletop games, dice games, card games you name it, we�ve played it. Using our experience of games we intend to bring you games you�ll love. In a world where technology is everywhere in our lives, it may become difficult to find reasons to connect with friends and family. We hope our games are those reasons. What is Kooky Cooks? Our first game is called Kooky Cooks. It�s a wacky educational card game that utilizes money math skills and introduces youngsters to exciting new foods in unusual dishes. Kooky Cooks is a game that is easy for kids to learn and engaging for parents to enjoy. Our game is specifically designed for 2-6 players aged 8 and up. In our game, players take on the role of a Kooky Cook. Racing to complete as many orders as they can, players scramble to earn the most cash before time runs out. Throughout player turns, customers continuously fill the restaurant and request bizarre dishes. In order to cook these dishes, players will need to play specific combinations of ingredients from their hands. Along the way players may find special ingredients that have game changing abilities ranging from gathering extra ingredients to kicking out customers. Kooky Cooks is a game that has been years in the making. It started as just an idea that was discussed and debated until we felt it was ready for playtesting. We used note cards with handwritten information in order to playtest the original version of Kooky Cooks. Through many playtests the game went through a multitude of very small tweaks to major changes to create the perfect version. Currently we have a professionally printed prototype of Kooky Cooks that we use to show and play with friends and family and whoever else is interested in our game. We are now working with our manufacturer to create the best possible copy of the game. So what do I get if I back your game? We have three different Pledge Tiers where you can get a first run copy of our game. + $6 for shipping at this pledge tier Free shipping at this pledge tier. Free shipping at this pledge tier. Aprons come in adult and kids size. Want to learn more info about us? We appreciate your interest. Check us out at Intheorygames.com

Huge Thanks to our Amazing Backers and Supporters!! We are FULLY FUNDED! Sphero Mini, Wowwee MiP, Sphero Bolt Kinazium is a construction set for creating mazes and games for robots! Kinazium unleashes the potential of robots by giving kids the tools to design mazes, games and more for playing, racing and competing. At home or in school Kinazium engages kids for hours. Invent and design mazes and games like this: Each Kinazium includes: 4 Interconnecting Mats: each 20 x 20 inches, creating a 160 Sq. in. surface 44 Mixed Sized Flexible Surfaces: for walls, jumps, teeter-totters, hoops and more 80 Pegs: Multi-functional connectors of mats, surfaces, and sensors 2 Sensors: Wireless accelerometer sensors complete the game by adding timers, point scoring, or robot interaction 1 Carry-Along Storage Bag Robotic School Programs love Kinazium! Kinazium adds three dimensional challenges for robots that engage physics concepts into curriculums. It can be used everyday, engaging kids to invent and create and collaborate. Easy to clean up and put away, and less tape on the floor. Infinitely expandable, a four pack can be used individually or combined to become Kinazium in the Gymnasium! Kinazium out and about at schools. Kinazium is mazes, obstacles, racetracks and more Design and Build Place Sensors Play & Compete! How it works: Kids design a maze, towers or games like skee-ball, sports games, anything they can imagine. They add in the sensors to complete the game - the sensors can be set to score points, subtract points, be timers or to interact with the robots. Then the racing, or gamesmanship begins! Kinazium kits link together making it infinitely expandable. An 'evergreen' toy, it has long engagement playability because every time it comes out of the bag, new games and mazes are invented. We'll create add-on kits to continue to expand the universe of possibilities. Kids get right on the floor and intuitively start building. Parents and Teachers love that kids are inventing and designing, using their hands and working together to create complex challenges for their robots. Your Robot is waiting for Kinazium! No Robot? No Worries! Check out our Robot Packages! Kinazium is for Kids, Parents and STEM Educators Combine left and right-brain learning for an amazing playing experience. Benefits include: Educators love Kinazium because it brings new opportunity to their Robotics programs Comments coming in from other teachers: Jean Hendrickson � I need to keep an eye of this one. It is going to be a classroom game changer. Jami Sheilds - I want this so bad for my class of coders! Kim Jackson Backer - These are awesome #teacherwishlist Debbie Guerin Kryspin � Have a classroom full of Sphero Bolts and minis - REALLY need this! Kinazium is ready for prime-time The Team Behind Kinazium Kinazium was invented by Taylor Scott, Hunter Reid, Emily Scott, Susan Crouse and Adam Kemp. Their expertise in engineering and product development varies from successful startups to technical products for large companies; some products even earned technical Emmys. Want to Hear More? Click here to listen to the BoulderTech Podcast Interview with Susan Crouse CEO, or the STEM Everyday podcast by Chris Woods. What's Next? Build Kinazium and Augmented Reality Games Kinazium and Augmented Reality Some robots give you the ability to develop your own games. With open source tools for creating Augmented Reality it's not a big a leap to create games with virtual opponents in your physical kinazium game! In this example we took a 3D animated character, attached her to the target and programed her to disappear if the target disappears, which happens when the robot rolls over the target. We've set our supply chains in motion and have received samples for production. Traxart Toys is ready to launch Kinazium! Join us on this exciting journey.

I am raising funds to research, photo and travel around China to complete my study and book on the past and present culture in China. I am researching the ancient culture of China and also how the culture has changed in present day due to foreign influence. I have been working in China for over 2 years and I have seen personally how foreign influence has changed the culture and as a Doctor of Anthropology, I want to document and study this. I want to show how such a great and ancient culture can be influenced and changed. I will look at the past culture and compare it to now. I will talk to historians get their views on how it has changed. I will document with photos and I will produce an academic book on the subject when I have completed my research.

Meet Chatterbox Chatterbox is the world's first educational build-it-yourself, program-it-yourself smart speaker kit for kids that puts privacy first. Think of it like an Amazon Alexa or Siri, but one focused on privacy that kids can build and program to bring their creativity to life. A HUGE thank you to Hackster.io for interviewing us and taking the time to learn about Chatterbox, our beginnings and our future. Also featured in: Computers of the future will be voice-driven artificial intelligence. How do we prepare kids for a future where a human-like AI is ubiquitous? We do that by giving them the tools and motivations to create and use their very own AI. By building the hardware and teaching the voice assistant, kids learn how and why this technology works, rather than being tricked by "black-box" technology into thinking voice AI is human. 1. Smart Speaker Kit The only smart speaker kit easy enough for kids to build. The Chatterbox case is made of recyclable chipboard (really strong cardboard) and powered by the Raspberry Pi computer, the world's most popular educational computer. Its ears and voice are powered by our very own ChatterVoice HAT and microphone. Fold it, build it, customize it! 2. Smart Assistant Chatterbox is the only educational assistant that kids can teach and program how to listen, talk and respond to commands. It's designed for learning and engineered for fun! 3. Chatterbox App The Chatterbox app is a kid-friendly app that empowers kids to build their own voice-activated skills by connecting LEGO-like blocks. 1. Build your own smart speaker Our step-by-step instructions make it easy for any child seven or older to build the chipboard case and assemble the electronics, making problem solving fun and hands-on. It's as easy as making a paper airplane! 2. Teachable smart assistant Think of Chatterbox as a smart assistant that doesn't know it's smart yet. Teaching your assistant new tricks is simple using the easy-to-use Chatterbox Skill Builder. Kids as young as 7 years old can learn to build unique skills to get the weather, ask questions, control lights, listen to music and make their own voice-based games. Anything is possible! 3. Montessori inspired, educator approved Chatterbox is designed to give kids a practical learning environment where they can explore their unique creativity while developing communication, problem solving and critical thinking skills. Chatterbox is a maker kit for children to build real, screen-free technology that they can use in their daily lives. Designing voice skills places greater emphasis on communication and creative thinking. 1. Critical Thinking -- Learn to deconstruct problems to understand how things work. 2. Communication -- Build information processing skills by having to anticipate how other people communicate and ask questions. 3. Problem Solving -- Solve problems using realtime information from the internet. Kids are teaching their Chatterbox amazing skills! Kids can set up magic words to control lights, play music, message grandparents and craft their own interactive story adventures. Anything is possible! Just a sample of the kinds of skills that kids can build. The possibilities are endless! Featured integrations Chatterbox is a maker kit that contains everything kids need to build and program their very own smart speaker. The kit includes: Laser-cut chipboard enclosure Raspberry Pi 3B+ and specs. ChatterVoice HAT + Mic board Large arcade button Speaker SD card with pre-loaded ChatterOS Your child's privacy and safety is extremely important to us. Unlike Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant, Chatterbox only listens when you push the big yellow button. Chatterbox doesn't harvest or share any personal data and doesn't contain any ads. We *strongly* advocate for a commercial-free childhood. Have specific questions and concerns? We want to hear them! Email us at support@hellochatterbox.com. What People Are Saying About Chatterbox... We're educators, designers and developers committed to make learning fun. Our team's collective experience has built educational software and hardware products used by over 60 million people and 80 thousand schools worldwide. Stretch Goal #1: Unlocked after funding goal reached The Making of Chatterbox How to build a fun Star Wars skill for #MayTheFourthBeWithYou Teaching Chatterbox to say "Hello World," get weather forecasts by city and how to text messages to Dad

Dungeon Brawler takes the dungeon crawl game genre and mashes it with side-scrolling beat 'em up brawler arcade games from the 80's and 90's. Players each control a hero, arrange them in a formation, and prepare for the oncoming waves of monsters, traps, treasure. If they can survive this automatically-advancing onslaught, then they win as a team. Each player controls one hero. Each hero represents a different theme: chaos, order, harmony, or discipline. Their hero choice decides their starting deck of cards. Each different theme has a different playstyle, but also informs what future cards they can add to their deck. Across from the party line-up is the deadly dungeon itself. Whenever a card is removed from the dungeon, be it by killing a monster, the dungeon automatically shifts towards the players. This game is incredibly fast-paced: no moving, exploring, or down-time. This dungeon is coming at you full-speed! Fighting is resolved by playing unique combinations of cards, but be careful! Your hand of cards is also your lifebar! Overextend and you�ll leave yourself vulnerable. You can try our game for free. Download the Print-and-Play beta now and start playing. We believe in our product so much that we are offering free shipping worldwide. We want to get this game in the hands of as many players around the world as possible. Shipping costs are included in your pledges for this campaign. You will NOT be charged for shipping later, once rewards are ready to ship. This INCLUDES S&H + VAT.

OVERVIEW We are ALLUVIA: a publication, blog and creative collective uplifting the narratives of environmental artists of color. Since launching in March 2019 we have published 10 blog posts and interviewed and photographed almost 10 environmental artists of color to publish their stories in our upcoming print issue. The purpose of this fundraiser is to elevate the voices of environmental artists of color in a printed magazine and host a launch party that fosters an environmental POC community space in the Bay Area. WHO ARE WE? Alluvia Magazine is a publication and creative collective started in 2018 by two environmental artists in the Bay Area. Zahira and Isaias created Alluvia with 3 components: - Print Magazine: a color printed and bound magazine featuring the founders and mission statement, interviews and photo shoots with at least 10 environmental artists of color from across the US, and a list of artists featured on our online blog. - Blog: our blog at alluviamag.com has featured artwork, listicles, opinion pieces and interviews with environmental artists of color from around the world. - Creative Collective: the artists featured both on the blog and print issue will be connected to one another through this creative process in an effort to grow community for environmental artists of color. We�re currently in the process of finishing our first print zine. It will include interviews and photo-shoots with artists that upend the mainstream narrative of white environmentalism. We hope to show the environmental and art community that mainstream white environmentalism is not the single narrative in the environmental movement. WHY DO WE NEED FUNDING? We started this project as a labor of love. We are self-funded and all costs so far have been paid for out of our own pockets. The money we raise will help us print our first zine (and future ones!), plan our launch event, and connect our featured artists to one another. WHERE DOES YOUR DONATION GO? $150 for printing 150 magazines- Colored and glossy magazines around 25 pages using dynamic digital portrait photographs and long-form interviews to highlight the narratives of 10-12 environmental artists of color from across the US. Artists featured on our blog will also have their names printed, in addition to our mission statement. $200-$250 venue costs - the cost of reserving an event space in the Bay Area for 2 hours. This event will be a POC environmental space intended to sell our first print issue on a sliding scale, possible performances, food and nurturing of a vibrant POC environmental community $50 - colored stickers with the Alluvia logo on a green leaf background intended to be sold on a sliding scale $50 for pins - colored pins with the Alluvia logo on a green leaf background intended to be sold on a sliding scale WHAT IS OUR IMPACT? The environmental and climate movement is a one-sided and whitewashed narrative when people of color around the world are disproportionately affect by the deadly impacts of climate change. Current environmental curriculum highlight the contributions of white leaders but neglect to uplift the stories of people of color and their relationships to environmentalism. We've provided a platform for POC and QTPoC to connect, share, and publish their environmental artwork. We believe in the power of storytelling and creating spaces for environmental artists to have the recognition and force of change that disrupts the white environmental landscape. We also believe that it's important to hold spaces in real life for our community to have fun, while making sure our events are all safe and inclusive environments (#POCTOTHEFRONT). We will make sure that our launch event is a fun and safe environment to show love for one another, share stories and cultivate friendships. WHAT IF WE DON'T RECEIVE FUNDING? Without funding, we won't be able to: Document the stories of environmental artists of color and print these stories in a zine. These stories and magazine will continue to be carried on to future generations. Create a launch event that fosters IRL creative POC environmental community. HEAR IT FOR YOURSELF: "Alluvia Magazine was one of my first supporters when building my brand. Thanks to this platform I feel that my perspective as an environmentalist of color is valid and powerful." - Kristy Drutman, Creator of Brown Girl Green "Alluvia Magazine is not only a publication but a creative collective that allowed me to connect with other POC Environmentalist that helped me understand more environmental issues going on in the world. They've continuously shown me that people of color have an important role to play in the Environmental movement and are doing great things as educators, activists and business owners. A problem that affects everyone needs solutions that include everyone" - Ariel Maldonado, Creator of @gogreensavegreen OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP: If you can't donate, it doesn't mean you can't help. You can: Get the word out about Alluvia's fundraiser! Follow us on social media! Visit our blog! Reach out to us if you have ideas for collaboration!

MY BEAUTIFUL BOYS is the story of a celebrity with everything who still can't shake a pervasive sense of ennui. With the release of his newest summer blockbuster just weeks away, Cal Marlow�s management has to convince him to leave his Hollywood Hills home for a contractually obligated appearance in a commercial for children's breakfast cereal. The entire film takes place on Cal�s patio next to his pool, where he is visited only by his agent, his intern, and a claymation blue jay. The movie imagines a celebrity living a surreal, isolated existence in luxury, mistaking his life of leisure for one of contentment. Our film�s main character is an amalgamation of action movie stars given depth beyond the tabloid items, PR-sanctioned sound bites, and magazine profiles used to construct them. Cal holds a firm belief in a meritocracy; that he has worked hard as an artist, and has proven himself by the metric of commercial success. Cal accepts his good fortune unemotionally and unwaveringly because it's rooted firmly in fact: Cal is a very good actor. He believes himself to be exceptional, especially compared the vapid film industry types that surround him. But the movie places all three characters in the same boat, and the audience quickly realizes what Cal can�t bear to admit; that there isn�t that much difference between Cal and the industry after all. The short film delves into celebrity culture and male stardom. It�s set in a familiar world that steadily reveals itself to be absurd and untethered from reality. Days melt together, human existence is limited to the deck of a pool, and we chit-chat with a bird made out of clay that squawks for four pages straight. The movie probes humankind's comical ineptness at tackling larger existential questions, specifically the ineptness of men when they've achieved the societal hallmarks of success that they themselves have established. There is bitterness and a sense of isolation that comes from knowing you're unsatisfied when you feel you have no reason to be - when everyone, and every definition of success, leads you to believe that you should be content. The strange shores someone has to shipwreck upon before they finally turn their gaze upon themselves are unique to each situation. In this case, it's the deck of a multi-million dollar pool in California. Kickstarters are an all-or-nothing endeavor - we need to meet our goal in order to keep any of the money raised! Your contribution will go towards our production budget which takes into account - Crew and actor rates Renting camera and lighting equipment Location fees Short-term insurance policy used to rent film equipment and release the location Production expenses such as overflow parking for select shoot days, supplies to protect the location from potential damage from filming, tables, chairs, toilet paper, hand soap, trash bags, and anything else you need to consider when you're responsible for human beings for 12 hour long workdays Feeding crew and actors on set We're doing our part to make this film on as small a scale as possible. This translates to 9 crew members, 3 actors, 3 shoot days, and 1 shoot location. Everyone we're bringing on board knows the scale of the production; an indie film means half the pay and working twice as hard. The blue jay can't sing without your support! Let this California-themed pie chart further illustrate how your contribution will be spent. - The pie chart made famous from the video. Brooklyn/Alaska, a feature documentary she shot, was voted Indiewire's project of the month, and Canon asked her to speak about the project on the 'Shooting Documentaries' panel on their NAB stage. Sugar!, a feature film she shot, starring Tony award winner Alice Ripley, won Best Cinematography at the Glendale International Film Festival. She graduated from NYU's Tisch School of the Arts in 2007. (Fletcher's website) Hannah Dweck is a producer who founded her own production company, Dweck Productions, in the winter of 2018. She made her first comedy short, The Business Meeting in 2016. Since then, Hannah co-directed and co-produced her first feature documentary Guest House, alongside Yael Luttwak. She also worked to create a series of campaign videos for the Humane Rescue Alliance and was a location manager for the feature film, Framing John DeLorean (2019). This year she executive produced the narrative feature Giving Birth to a Butterfly, which is currently in post-production. (Hannah's website) Rachel Dainer-Best is a costume designer based in New York City. She works on film, theatre and commercial projects, with a focus on independent film. She has been the costume designer on features such as Assassination Nation (Sundance Film Festival, 2018) and Dreamland (Tribeca, 2019). She has recently worked on a Fox Searchlight shot film called Lavender, which premiered at Sundance, an upcoming feature from A24 called Waves and Kitty Green�s film The Assistant. (Rachel's website) Emily Bernstein is a freelance producer based in Los Angeles. Her work includes national TV commercials, web series, and narrative short films. Emily is a graduate of Vassar College and is thoroughly enjoying the oat milk trend. She is currently working on an interactive web series. Sarah Brown Carter is a casting producer and SAG actor based in Los Angeles. She both acts in and produces commercials and independent films, and got her start in Prague as a casting assistant for Snowpiercer (2013). Underdog (2019), the feature she produced, is playing next at the Block Island Film Festival.

The resonance of memory: Art helps us accept tragedy and reconcile ourselves to loss Hesperus will record a gorgeous soundtrack of French medieval music to Lon Chaney's silent masterpiece, The Hunchback of Notre Dame, next month. I feel a little tacky saying that, even though I've been wanting to make this DVD for years and scheduled it last September. But I'm realizing that the memory of the fire adds resonance to the film, and to our score. And when the Cathedral is rebuilt, that memory will remain. Quasimodo at Notre Dame The Hunchback of Notre Dame is an edgy film, made from Victor Hugo's epic tale of love, religion and greed. It's quirky, moody and passionate, even disturbing. It's full of ghosts. I can't help but see echoes of the fire in the despair of Quasimodo on the whipping block, the savagery of the beggar king, Esmeralda's terror in the torture chamber. I think we will play differently, thinking about the fire, and you may have a different experience watching it. And to me, this reinforces the power of art; to help us accept tragedy and reconcile ourselves to loss. One rather spooky thing; I realized that in our recorded version, we could use the actual sound of the bells of Notre Dame, recorded the day before the fire. Here they are. Let me tell you a bit about who we are. 2019 is HESPERUS' 40th anniversary! We've spent that time collaborating with film, theater, dance and storytellers, and creating crossover fusions with traditional musicians from all over the world. Since we started performing early film scores in 2003 we've created eight of them, of music from the time the film was set, not made. We think it grounds the film, gives audiences a sense of time and place. For The Hunchback it's medieval French music by Guillaume de Machaut, Jehan Lescurel and others; we sing it, and play it on medieval instruments, vielle and rebec, recorders, shawms and lute. We see our musical mission as bringing the past into the present, giving 21st century audiences context, appreciation and enjoyment. My goal is record all eight films; Hunchback is the third. So you see, I think there's a difference between exploiting an event and memorializing it. We play with love and respect, with the goal of getting closer to the actors and the story they're telling. Will you consider supporting our project?

It twisted the bodies of the infected, making them sprout limbs and eyes from every orifice. But some were immune, and they became the most feared of all. $20k - Harlequin Corruption Strain - UNLOCKED! Adds a new class of mutation that allows you to create clones of yourself and cause all manner of trickery. Read more about it HERE $22.5k - Barrow Mire Expansion -UNLOCKED! Adds a new environment to the game, the Barrow Mire. Explore these tragic caverns made of condensed bone and mud. Also adds a new major creature, the Babblefish. Avoid its tongue tentacles reaching for your spine! Read more about the expansion HERE $25k - Scion Corruption Strain - Unlocked! Adds a new class of mutation that allows you to channel your inner energy into Ki. Perform enhanced martial arts before eventually unleashing blasts of lightning and flying through the skies! Read more about it HERE $27.5k - Locked City Expansion Adds a new environment to the game, the Locked City. Explore an underground civilization with its citizens frozen in time. Each of you is inflicted with the Hunter�s Blood, a condition that not only makes you immune to the transformative effects of the corruption but allows you to control it. Explore the evolving wilds of the Warrens, a place where you can find strange landscapes of gurgling meat and discover cultures of sentient slime. Uncover the world�s secrets as you hunt the infected beasts of the Warrens and search for the source of the corruption. Children of the Beast is a game you can immediately pick up and play because of our included sandbox adventure. It is structured similarly to an interactive fiction game, allowing you to get started without any prep. What Makes Children of the Beast Different? Attach monstrous limbs to your character with fleshsmithing Mutate occult abilities with the virulent corruption Explore a living, crawling world Empowered with an optional companion app and sandbox adventure Use the optional companion app to streamline your game! Become a Part of Us! Rulebook (PDF & Hardcover), Companion App, & Pick-Up-and-Play Adventure Hardcover Mockup - Not final art Hardcover rulebook NOT included in Beast Child tier Everything included in all other tiers (Hemohydra and Uldabeast get 5x hardcover rulebook) The three pillars of Children of the Beast are given to all pledge levels. Each set contains five 20mm d20s and five 16mm d6s. Massive Elder Deity Playmat Actual-Sized Cat Add $35 to add to your pledge Already included in the Elder Hunter, Hemohydra, Keeper of Secrets, and Uldabeast tiers A behemoth of a playmat 4' x 2' across depicting the Elder Deity Oraskur. Prepare your table and your players for the horrors you're bound to uncover! Beware the wilds of the Warrens. They always evolve and change. Always seeking to become a part of you. The Warrens are a living landscape, constantly changing and adapting to the lives on and within them. Maps are almost useless, requiring scouting parties to constantly update others on how the lands have changed. It is a world of the bizarre and unexpected, where weirdness awaits at every turn. The people of the Warrens survive under the protection of so-called gods. They slave away to satisfy the needs of these creatures their cities are built upon Hunt Monstrous Beasts The corruption has spread to the beasts of the Warrens, possessing them with an infectious madness. During your journey to find the source of the corruption, hunting the tainted beasts will improve your strength and your chances of survival. But the corruption twists their bodies as well. Some creatures gain strange occult abilities, while others� shapes are mutated with bizarre new limbs and protrusions. You must learn what you can of these creatures and their occult capabilities if you ever hope to overcome them. Gain Power from Elder Deities Ancient, inscrutable beings exist within the Warrens, and none are more omnipresent than the Elder Deities. For unknown reasons they assist humanity in its struggle for survival, and those with the Hunter�s Blood are of heightened interest to these divine creatures. But who knows what dark whims you may be aiding? The Elder Deity Ordega Hunters are talented, motivated people who are powerful enough to explore a world most don't get a chance to see. Watch you characters evolve as they find living artifacts, learn the language of writhing worms that eat memories of the dead, and engage in reactive, tactical combat with the beasts that try to stop you. Mutate with the Corruption Corruption advances through multiple tiers, giving you new titles as your mutations progress Your hunter's blood can control the corruption, mutating your body as your connection with the occult deepens. But society does not wish this, fearing what you might become. Destroying corruption will reward you with riches, but consuming corruption will reward you with transformative power. Choosing to gain corruption is not a choice between good or evil, it is a choice of how much you want to stretch the limits of your humanity. Evolve Monstrous Limbs with Fleshsmithing Fleshsmithing is a craft that allows you to reattach lost body parts, but it also holds a more transformative purpose. Through the art of fleshsmithing, you can consume the parts of creatures to grow them as your own. Gain the special attacks and abilities of the creatures you once feared! But will the part's lingering consciousness damage your psyche? Destroy Individual Body Parts The creatures in Children of the Beast are intricately detailed, with highly specific body parts allowed to be struck Slash each piece of a beast thanks to Children of the Beast�s in-depth wound system. You can try to hack off intimidating limbs or interrupt a devastating blast of energy with a quick, hopeful blow to the head. Tame the Beasts... or Become Them Who's controlling who? Not all beasts need to be slain. If you can cure the infectious madness of a beast, it will become a powerful ally to aid you in your journeys. But corrupted beasts are intelligent, they can even speak. Let them join the ranks of hunters and play as the beasts. Every new beast you tame unlocks it as a new playable species, expanding the reach of humanity. For people with an Android device, we have developed a special companion app that helps manage and streamline the rules of the game. Here are some key features of the core app, and with enough support we hope to add many more! (Including an iOS version!) Adventure Management Playing through the adventure is not like typical rpg modules, instead it's structured similarly to an interactive fiction game. Each scene has a dedicated page, detailing to the GM key details, block text to read-aloud or paraphrase, special hidden interactions, and decision points that progress the players into a new area. There are also side-tabs that provide considerable extra detail: Comprehensive descriptions of NPCs and objects in the current area Charts for random encounters Fast travel options ...a section for character death? -DEATH IS NOT THE END- If you do not have access to the app, we will release a free HTML version of the adventure you can use at release. Character Creation Be guided step-by-step through all the options of creating your character. Either follow along while building a character sheet, or make a digital character sheet that the app can track for further digital features. Progression and item management are also included! Streamlined Combat There are many ways in which the app helps streamline combat. No more rolling for initiative! Turn order is automatically determined as soon as combat begins. Track all of your abilities and status effects! Even the most complex abilities function quickly and easily. Streamlined Wound System! Touch the target body part and sever that beast's head once and for all. Why wait? Go HERE to try a prototype version of the app that includes the first few sessions of the adventure. Try creating some characters too! The prototype rulebook is also available HERE. The adventure teaches you how to play, but the rulebook contains all of the extra detail. We will add more secrets of the world as the campaign progresses! Streaming We're regularly streaming during the campaign! Check out our channel here! Q&A streams are Tuesdays at 6 pm pacific! Gameplay streams of an ongoing campaign are Wednesdays at 8 pm pacific! Deep Dive streams, where we'll look at a creature, piece of lore, or mechanic more closely, will be every Friday and Sunday at 6 pm pacific! Watch a quick overview of character creation (and a bit of progression)! In our ongoing campaign, our hunters tracked down the Sahidarah... Interviews with Cool People Want to learn about cool lore and different aspects of the game? Check out these interviews! #Randomworlds Q&A Chat https://gmshoe.wordpress.com/2019/06/30/qa-nicholas-kitts-children-of-the-beast/ Thoughty Blog: http://briebeau.com/thoughty/2019/06/five-or-so-questions-on-children-of-the-beast/ Midgardia's "Cool Crowdfunding Show": Shipping costs are listed in USD. The estimated cost for US shipping is: $10 for the hardcover rulebook $5 for each custom dice set $15 for the Elder Deity Playmat International Shipping is a bit tricky right now with all of the trade issues going on, so we want to remind people that these are estimates: Canada $16 for the hardcover rulebook $7 for each custom dice set $25 for the Elder Deity Playmat UK, EU, China, Hong Kong, Japan $20 for the hardcover rulebook $10 for each custom dice set $30 for the Elder Deity Playmat Rest of World We'll try our best, send us a message!
