THE WORLD'S GREATEST is a coming-of-age independent film about Judy, a second generation Chinese American teen growing up and f**king up in a failing NYC high school and home. Initially a lazy/unfocused middle school kid, she gets into Murry Bergtraum High School through a second chance lottery system, and makes a promise to herself that this school is the place where she can start over. But things go south when she realizes the school has lost its formerly glory and she starts hanging out with the "bad" Chinatown kids. By the end of freshmen year, the principal announces that Bergtraum will get shut down by the NYC Department of Education if school conditions do not improve. While this is happening, she also learns that her family life is coming apart. With all this weight on her shoulders, will she fall into her old habits and drop out of school, or will she find the strength to overcome it all? photo taken by Kenneth Lei This film is inspired by my first solo show with the same title that premiered in NYC in August 2016. It is based on my life growing up in Chinatown, NYC, and it explores the complicated dynamics of finding one's place in high school with the delicate balance of living up to expectations at home in an immigrant family. casually cutting class and hiding from mom (photo taken by Karin Anna Cheung) I started writing the show in January 2014 because, at the time, there were limited opportunities for Asian American actors, and I didn't want to wait for an opportunity to come to me, I wanted to CREATE the opportunity. Ultimately, the show was performed 10x in NYC, and it sold out 7x at the TBG Studio Theatre + 1x at the Museum of Chinese in America and it traveled to Los Angeles in April 2017. LA Show at the JANM Tateuchi Democracy Forum (photo taken by Karin Anna Cheung) Last show ever in NYC TBG Studio Theatre - September 17, 2017 WHY NOW It has always been my dream to tell stories about the Asian American experience--especially in an independent film form. For the longest time, I was afraid of chasing that dream because it seemed IMPOSSIBLE; but with technology & costs of filmmaking going down + recent successes of Asian American films (CRAZY RICH ASIANS, SEARCHING, GOOK, ALWAYS BE MY MAYBE, PLUS ONE) & television (MASTER OF NONE, RAMY, PEN15) + a never-ending hunger for more Asian American content, NOW is the time to keep telling stories about OUR experiences. I have also never seen a coming of age film about a Chinese American girl from an immigrant family in NY, and I would DIE to see it come to life. If this campaign is successful, it will be the first coming of age NYC Chinatown comedy-drama independent film set in the early 2000s. I hope this project will inspire the next generation of NYC Asian American filmmakers to tell their stories. HOW WILL WE SPEND THE MONEY? The film is shot entirely in NYC and shooting in NYC is expensive. We are very ambitious, and want to shoot in actual locations and stay true to the story. We will shoot in a public high school, a Chinese banquet hall, three apartments + one big house, a college dormitory, and inside a convertible. All of the money raised on Kickstarter will also be used to hire our cast/crew, rent out camera/sound/lighting equipment, and feed everyone. THE TEAM DIRECTOR - STEVEN LIANG Steven Liang is a director and storyteller with roots in the rolling hills of Elysian Park�s historic Solano Canyon and the blazing sun of the South San Gabriel Valley. Steven spent formative years in the back of his father�s Chinese take-out restaurant and mother�s garment factory. Resilience, the American Dream, underdogs, and food inspire his work. Steven is the recipient of the 2018 Ryan Murphy TV HALF Initiative, the 2017 Film Independent Directing Lab Fellowship, the 2017 Armed with a Camera Fellowship, the 2013 AbelCine Documentary Grant, and the 2010 Fulbright Fellowship. IG: @stevenliangfilms DIRECTOR OF PHOTOGRAPHY - RAY HUANG Ray Huang is a Los Angeles based cinematographer who emerged from the Lower East Side of New York City. Steeped in street culture & the fine arts from an early age, he frequently draws inspiration by juxtaposing the two in the attempt to find truth in his work. His narrative work has been featured in film festivals around the world, including Cannes, Venice, Tribeca & Slamdance. His commercial work includes clients- Apple, Microsoft, Amazon, Hyundai, Burger King, Toyota, Gatorade, Nissan, Adidas, Reebok, AT&T, SAP, & NFL films. He has worked with star musical talents: U2, Metallica, 2Chainz, Wiz Khalifa, The Killers, & Maluma amongst others. Recently, he photographed the indie feature film Snakehead, sci-fi action films The 716th & The Suppression. He also enjoys driving with the windows down. IG: @velvetcellardoors LEAD ACTOR / EXECUTIVE PRODUCER / WRITER - JUDY LEI Judy is born and raised in Chinatown, Manhattan and Sunset Park (the Puerto Rican part), Brooklyn. She graduated from Smith College in 2011 with a self-designed Asian American Studies major and was jobless after college. She worked her way up at Asian CineVision and became the aaiff festival director in 2013, 2015, 2016, and 2017. She left ACV to further pursue her acting/writing career by working at restaurants: Nom Wah Tea Parlor and the Union Square Hospitality Group (North End Grill & Gramercy Tavern). She studied improv at the Upright Citizens Brigade Theatre (she has the school�s philosophies tattooed on her right arm/left wrist), and continuously takes Scene Study classes at The Barrow Group Theatre since 2012 to sharpen that fuckin� pencil. She wrote and performed two solo shows in NYC/LA: The World�s Greatest (collaborated with/directed by MC Jin) and 28: Still Fucked Up. She loves to watch independent films and stand-up comedy shows. She still thinks Pikachu is the cutest thing in the world + IS her boyfriend... forever. She still has no eyebrows. IG/Twitter/FB: @heyjudylei PRODUCERS JENNY YE Jenny Ye is a journalist and technologist from Manhattan's Chinatown. She met Judy in college through Asian American activism work and has been a friend and fan ever since. Jenny's favorite things include basketball, tennis, and coming-of-age stories. Follow Jenny on Twitter @thepapaya. JOANNA LIN Joanna "Jo" Lin is a Creative Director for hospitality brands, overseeing content direction for a collective of chefs, restaurants and hotels in New York City. She previously came from the agency world and oversaw the Digital teams at firms such as IW Group (New York) and Bullfrog & Baum. Outside of her professional life, Joanna is deeply passionate in all aspects of the arts, especially in photography, videography, and music. Being a native New Yorker (Brooklyn-born / Manhattan-raised), "The World's Greatest" speaks volumes about her own adolescent struggles growing up in the city and she is very excited to help bring it to life on screen. Follow Joanna on Instagram at @joanna.lin. SHIRLEY ZHU Shirley is a city mouse obsessed with documenting feelings and family stories. She loves her friends� childhood photos, unreasonably long walks, and every Santana collaboration song in existence. She had fantasies of being a cool Chinatown kid too, but she was a complete weirdo at Chinese school instead (peace to Sun Yat Sen I.S. 131). She splits her free time between scoping out produce at the market and running to catch the train. Drop @surlyzhu a line on Instagram.

US National Park Themed Playing Cards My name is Micah, known as ArticaVisuals online. I am a freelance graphic designer specializing in logo and branding design. One of my 2019 resolutions was to commit to a long-term design project I would be passionate about. While browsing the internet, I stumbled across a deck of cards featuring beautiful illustrations by several talented designers, and I instantly decided this was exactly the kind of project I wanted to take on. But what should go on the cards? I�ve traveled to so many national parks with my family, and they seemed like the perfect theme for my cards. Each of the 52 cards features a scene from a different national park in the United States and 2 jokers with fun animal designs. After 6 months and hundreds of hours of hard work, they are finally available for backing on Kickstarter. https://articavisuals.com Follow me @articavisuals on Instagram to see these designs and my other design projects The Design The casino-quality cards are inspired by a vintage western aesthetic, and all the illustrations are drawn with individual lines, giving them a modern feel, connecting the past to the present. Each park is assigned a card value by its popularity, and the suit is determined by the geographic location. Southwestern parks are diamonds, with the Grand Canyon as the ace. Eastern parks are clubs with the ace as Eastern Tennessee's Great Smoky Mountains, Southern parks are hearts, and Northwestern parks are led by Yellowstone as the ace of spades. Instead of traditional face cards, the aces, kings, queens, and jacks will have colored centers. The 6 of diamonds and the 3 of spades, featuring Kenai Fjord National Park. Lower value cards highlight less popular National Parks. The clean back design features the sun, the moon, leaves, trees, and mountains - all aspects of nature that can be found in the park. The tuck box design further complements the vintage aesthetic. It features a simplified version of the National Park arrowhead logo on the front and will have a key with all the parks listed on the back in fine print. When shipped, the white lines in the image below will be upgraded with embossed silver foil on a matte finish box. Adding some fun into the deck, the jokers, featuring a goofy antelope and bear, are great for replacing lost cards. What's included in a deck? A deck of National Park Playing Cards features 16 filled in park designs (face cards), 36 unique line art design national parks, and 2 animal themed jokers. Key of all the national parks featured in the deck. (Will be in fine print on the back box design) For Collectors! In addition to being able to play with these cards, they can also be a personal National Park Passport! Every time you got to a National Park, bring your cards along with you. You can stamp the park you went to with the official National Park Rubber Stamps (Usually found in the visitor center). Let's see how many parks you can stamp! Official National Park Rubber Stamps. Be sure to stamp your corresponding card every time you go to a national park! Reward Summary (w/ US shipping included) Standard or Dark Mode may be specified at the end of campaign. Multi-pack backers may select a combination of standard / dark mode 1x - $14 2x - $23 (11.50/ea) 3x - $30 (10/ea) 4x - $40 (10/ea) 8x - $64 (8/ea) 25x - $150 (6/ea) 1x Uncut Sheet (660x545mm)- $20 available in standard only (no dark mode) - limited qty Example of what an uncut sheet will look like. (Not my design) Stretch Goal Met - Dark Mode Option Unlocked We met our goal after 10 days and stretch goal after 22 days. Dark mode will be a special edition of the playing cards, featuring dark backgrounds on the front sides, with light designs. We will print both color decks and you can select between the two. Example of what dark mode cards will look like. Dark mode face card examples Dark Mode Joker Concepts. Background color will be the one shown above. Photoshop changed the coloring. Dark Mode Box Design The finish and quality of the dark mode edition will be the same as the standard deck. Additionally, the back design will be the same as the standard deck so you can mix them together for games requiring multiple decks. Quality and Dimensions I have already identified our printing company WJPC to produce the cards on high-quality 310gsm German black core card-stock (2.5" x 3"). The cards will be butter finish, which is a major finish for magic playing cards and cardistry playing cards. The tuck box will be a silk matte lamination with silver foil included.I cannot wait to ship them to my backers. This is a prototype. The final face cards will have filled in middle designs. Where will your funds go? The funds raised through this Kickstarter will allow me to print the National Parks Playing Cards! Below is the schedule for this campaign. Just like the National Park Service�s slogan, �Find your park,� there is a park for everyone inside this pixel-perfect deck.

What is Nature's Secrets season 1? Nature's Secrets season 1 is the first season of a show that we created and wrote and are now going into production of. With your help, we hope to make our show a reality. The Story 2 kids, Elliot and Henry, have been separated by a sudden storm during a vacation. Now, they find themselves racing through unknown woods from an evil all consuming force. Henry trips and his brother, eyes clouded, leaves him behind. 2 kids separated in a forest, not supposed to exist, miles apart, stuck in the midst of a war between a tribe of forest natives and an all consuming evil. Will they survive to make it back home? Production Plan and Timeline Budget Breakdown Who We Are We are a team of young people striving to make something amazing and breath-taking. Ethan Facione: Actor of Oak, Director, Writer, and a ton of other stuff! Drakon Mayes: Actor of Elliot, Financial Manager Matthew Benzie on the job: Actor of Henry, Camera supervisor Stretch Goals $2,000 - Nature's Secrets Soundtrack Release If we reach the stretch goal of $2,000, we will release a digital download of our soundtrack for all backers! $3,000 - More Posters! If we reach this amazing stretch goal of $3,000, we will not only be able to improve the quality of our production, but offer 2 more digital posters for backers already receiving posters! More Goals to Come! When we complete at least one stretch goal, we'll reveal more!

The Short Version: In today�s fast paced world, �foodies� have limited selections for �clean eating�, that tastes good, on the go. We aim to change that with vegan and health conscious menu items. Vegan Vrgr Shack, or simply VVS, will be the first 100% plant-based fast food restaurant of its kind in New York City. This fast food joint will provide NYC with fresh, delicious, and filling food options that will leave those who indulge craving for more. We will specialize in providing a delicious and healthier option to everyday American fast foods, burgers and tacos. We are raising money to obtain a store front so that we can provide consumers with readily available access to affordable, delicious, and healthy food options. The Blue Print Background: Hello, my name is Charles E. Edwards. I earned my undergraduate degree from Duke University in International Comparative Studies in 2016 and have embarked upon a Masters Degree in Community Development from Iowa State University. In my formative years, prior to college, I had the opportunity to live in Salamanca and Seville, Spain for one year. While there, I studied and traveled to eight countries including Portugal, Morocco, Netherlands, England, France, Germany, Poland, and Belgium experiencing the food and culture. Not only did I become fluent in Spanish and Portugueses, I developed a love for international cuisine and languages. My worldly travels, coupled with my creole and cajun heritage, have helped me develop a taste for creating and indulging in good food. While in college, I played football against some of the best players in the world, many of whom currently play on Sundays. As a student athlete, I was constantly eating fast food and quickly realizing the effects on my body. I transitioned and looked for cleaner eating options. While doing so, I faced the dilemma of affordability. It was something that I had a difficult time finding until I began preparing for the NFL draft. I connected with a few guys I knew from my hometown and created a vegan option that was both affordable and delicious. At the end of 2017, we had created a company that served some of the best tasting food in the city. After about a year, myself and my business partner elected to venture off on our own with aspirations of staying true to our vision of creating affordable and healthy fast food options. In doing so, we created Vegan Vrgr Shack, or simply VVS. Our last restaurant endeavor gave us great understanding and first hand experience in the restaurant industry as we have worked as advertisers, cashiers, cooks, held managerial roles, conducted inventory, secured business licenses, and last but not least, provided a product that was enjoyed by fast food connoisseurs. We will be taking our experiences and not only creating the best vegan food possible, but the best service and atmosphere. Wait this is VEGAN?! VVS's Vision: VVS is a 100% Black owned company. Being Black, I am all too familiar with the fact that many folks within my community are lacking access to necessary food resources that could allow them to be self-sufficient. These areas are known as food deserts. VVS is looking to enrich lives, through the way our community eats. In doing so, our goal is to create an environment and culture that not only promotes healthier eating habits, but a place where the community can come together and enjoy themselves. VVS is more than a fast food spot, but a symbol of much needed change in the community. VVS Taco Options

Can you solve it? Who sang it? Can you sing it? Remember those songs you grew up listening to on the radio, on your turntable, 8 track tape (in stereo), or your iPod? Calling the Wolfman (Clap For The Wolfman*) or your local DJ and and playing a tribute song to your bestie? And how, when you now hear those songs, heartwarming, smile-inducing memories come flooding back? In Paraphrase: Songs In Other Words you have to recall the name of hit songs from various decades while only having a few seconds in which to do so. The clues, however, are a paraphrase of the song titles so they aren't as easily recognizable. Can you do it? Can your team members do it? Wha'choo talkin' 'bout, Willis? Here's an example: Authentic pigmentations**. Clues are included on each card in case you need a hint. But watch out! Using those hints deducts from the points you can earn. Bonus points are handed out for naming the band or artist and, if your team can sing a portion of the song - out loud, you can earn some big points -- and some good hearty laughs, too. Oh, and did we say you had to do it before time runs out? Paraphrase: Songs In Other Words is the ultimate party game that will bring a song to your heart, and possibly get it stuck in your head as you solve it. Name the song and artist who sang it and belt it out for everyone's enjoyment! A complete evening of laughter and musical memories for 3 or more players included in each and every box. *Clap For The Wolfman, Guess Who, 1974 **Answer to the paraphrase: True Colors, Cyndi Lauper STRETCH GOALS This is not the final design for the tray. Here's what's being said about Paraphrase: Songs In Other Words Click on the image to see the review.

KEEP SAFE N' GRILL ON Introducing our bristle-free grill scraper and stainless steel skewers! This grilling set was designed to make your grilling experience both more versatile, and safer. Classic wire bristle brushes can be dangerous to use. The bristles can easily break off the scraper, and get left behind on the grill. Ingestion of wire bristles can cause perforated esophagus or intestines, which are serious medical conditions and surprisingly common given the popularity of the wire bristle brush. These bristles can cause damage while you eat, which isn�t a good mood setter for your summer cookout. Set a good mood for your summer cookout! The Grrrilla scraper takes away this possibility by providing the same capabilities as your traditional scraper, in a compact size with a strong solid body of stainless steel as opposed to bristles. How do you clean a grill brush? You don't. Gross. Until Now! Clean Grrrilla in the dishwasher! Simply remove the leather cord and put it in the dishwasher! ------------------------------------ FEATURES Our Grrrilla design is unique to us, as is its versatility. This scraper is compatible with almost any model of charcoal, propane (gas), and campground grills. The Grrrilla�s compact size creates a lower risk for any breaking or chipping, while still leaving realistic space for usage of the product allows for easy storage while still being easy to use. It also functions as a bottle opener! An extra way to ensure you have the tools you need for your cookout. For those who like to grill by lakes, or who simply like to take their portable grills out of the backyard once in a while, this tool provides a compact way to make sure every grill you use is clean. Compatible with most grills and able to fit in your pocket or picnic bag, this tool is designed for the adventurous griller as well as the everyday one. We are launching a unique set of stainless steel skewers as well! To make sure you really have everything you need, we have made companion skewers to our Grrrilla. Our laser cut stainless steel designs create durable products that can be used repeatedly without fear of quick wear or bending. The skewers are 9-inches long and made to fit any of your kebab needs. ------------------------------- SPECS While the durability and function found in these tools are important to us, so are the people who make them. All of our production work on this project is, as always, completely within the USA. Our skewers even celebrate this with an American flag laser cut into the top of each one. So throw them on the grill, and get a couple burgers going to celebrate with us! Open a bottle, enjoy yourself, and after it all you can ensure you have a safe and clean grill with your new Grrrilla tool. ------------------------- REWARDS Want even more scrapers or skewers? See our FAQ section on how to pledge for more options that we could have imagined ourselves! Go wild, get in on these before summer starts!

I guess I started making Memento Mori when I finally hit my breaking point with High Fantasy. So many campaign settings are High Fantasy. Powerful wizards, noble knights, and marauding dragons. Nothing wrong with any of it, but let's face it, you can't eat the same meal every night. I wanted something new. Something dark. Something different. Memento Mori started as individual stories and snippets of Dungeons and Dragons games. Eventually I used many of the concepts in my own home games, and after a time realized just how starved some people were for what I presented. I took inspiration from dark fantasy, gothic fantasy, and sword and sorcery. It just worked so well. For the last two years my home group and I have defined, built, and rebuilt the setting that would become Memento Mori. A dark gothic fantasy that takes place not in medieval times, but in the age of industry and exploration. Where firearms gave men courage, but the threat of monsters remains. Where lands long forsaken to old world horrors were finally being fought back against. A land where magic leads to damnation. A place where even fighting against this horror can lead one to their own destruction. Memento Mori takes risks that most campaign settings won't. Steamships, zeppelins, and trains. Weird science, witchcraft, and seduction to the darkness. A unique mix of that I'm sure you will enjoy. Magic is Evil: Throughout Vaetia, the world in which Memento Mori takes place, it is known that magic is a wicked force that drives mortals to damnation. All forms of magic in Memento Mori derive from terrible sources. Whether born or pacted as a Witch, or tempting damnation as a Magician, magic inevitably draws evil not just to the spellcaster, but infests them with it. In Memento Mori playing a spellcaster is a double edged sword. Your power comes with a terrible price. Does that mean all spellcasters themselves are evil? No. Does it mean that all spellcasters are at risk of corruption? Yes. Technology is On the Rise: Scientific progress is in full swing. Firearms are replacing the bow and arrow. Science is constantly finding new compounds and ways to heal the mind and body. Train tracks have been laid between major cities allowing more to travel the dangerous wilderness in safety. Large sailing ships now take explorers to new exotic lands filled with their own horrors and treasures. In Memento Mori you will have the opportunity to use technology to battle the forces of darkness. Grenades, rifles, and all sorts of other unique weapons, armor, and equipment will be available to characters. Some marvels even so amazing they rival magical items. Bonus: Marvels do not corrupt like magical items do. Classic Gothic Tones: Whether being hunted through the cold misty forests of Draskul, or coming across a crumbling estate filled with the ghosts of a dead and decadent family, A terrible romance between a young and kind nobleman and the spirit of a dead countess that visits him in his bedroom on every full moon. Memento Mori is ensconced with classic gothic tones. The world is under a great deal of change. Old monarchies are dying out as new ideas come into the world. These old nobles cling to their power through terrible secret acts with demonic beings, exacting the price from the common folk under them. A Need for Heroes: The world at large is in need of heroes. Forging new paths, destroying hidden evils, and recovering ancient lore. These are just some of the things that the world needs heroes for. With corrupt governments, ineffectual superstitions, and fear gripping the lives of so many, who does the average person put their faith in? Sometimes it is the disgraced soldier who fights for them. Sometimes it is the surly witch hunter slaying the undead horde. Sometimes it is the witch seeking to destroy her enemies. Whatever the case may be there is a place for it somewhere in the setting. New Races: Some unique races inhabit the world of Memento Mori. The eldritch Electus, humans who long ago ruled a vast empire and altered their biology. The Felisican, strange animal/human hybrids with a terrible history of enslavement and violence. The Kurz, a people grown from a nation overcome by Daemons who now live with a third eye and a terrible curse. Finally the Goblins, the only race not descended from humans on the continent. New and Altered Classes: Play the Alchemist, a unique chemist that can specialize in healing, poison, or even mind altering drugs. Play the Witch Hunter, a specialist warrior who hunts down to destroy the occult. Play a Witch, a practitioner of daemonic magic. In addition each of the new classes have at least three specializations. Other classes have new options as well. Some classes have been altered to help fit the setting. Rosenkratz Rosenkratz is the second oldest nation in Devara. First broken off of Alleagne, the nation of Rosenkratz fought a civil war to gain their independence. Once, Rosenkratz encompassed the lands of Creaca and Duvio. Creaca fought Rosenkratz to gain its independence, a concept that Rosenkratz allowed because of the crazed church that rules there. Duvio, in a surprising move, actually purchased its independence from the ruling lords of Rosenkratz. Rosenkratz is a wealthy plutocracy, with three major cities each ruled by one incredibly wealthy family. These three families, along with five others, make up the seven ruling families of Rosenkratz. The seven families are: Thobrand, Hollister, Glail, Ruxon, Mormont, Taycus, and Calmaker. These families have changed over the years. Only the Thobrand, the Mormont, and the Ruxon, are original families that have been around since the beginning of Rosenkratz. These three rule the major cities of the country, and the others are simply not to their wealth level. The Duvio's were once a family that was around since the beginning, but now control the kingdom that bears their name. Each of these families elect a 'Merchant King' from among the families to head as the executor of the kingdom. Effectively both a king and a pawn, the Merchant King election is a dangerous one that is most often a result of bribes, barters, and intimidation amongst the families in order to secure one of their own to the position. It comes with great power, but also severe limitations. The Merchant King can veto any decision made by the merchant families, but must rely on their collective military might to protect himself. Favor currying, dirty politics, assassinations, these are all part of the normal daily life in the Rosenkratz nobility. The current Merchant King is Darius Mormont, a middle aged man with a keen eye towards profit and power. Most think it was a mistake to elect Darius as he, unlike many others, is less of a pawn and more of a master. Darius has eyes towards Telmuria, and their decadent nobility. He has begun making arms deals with them, as well as mercenary purchases to help guard their borders. He has been making a hefty profit off of Telmuria, and has even been kind enough to extend a line of credit to them. The latter act has angered even his own family, but the keenest in the houses do not believe that Darius would be so foolish as to extend military credit without reason. They believe he may be helping them accrue a debt with him. A debt they will need to repay else face military action from Rosenkratz. Something they know the Telmurians will not want to do, as their eastern front is already in constant conflict with Draskul. Fighter Archetype - Triggerman You embrace the modern pistol as your go-to weapon. Unlike others you specialize in this weapon, and go so far as to learn new and impressive feats that few can match. Quickdraw At 3rd level you can always draw and stow pistols as a free flourish. In addition if you draw a pistol in your first round of a combat you gain advantage on your very first shot in that combat. Point Blank At 7th level whenever you target someone within ten feet you with a pistol you can choose to deal an additional 1d6 points of damage to your damage roll. Quick Load At 10th level you can reload one pistol without any action once per round. Powerful Critical At 15th level you deal an additional 1d10 points of damage whenever you strike a critical hit with a pistol. Riddled with Ammo At 18th level you can deal a massive amount of damage to a single target whenever you strike an opponent with more than one pistol shot. If a target is hit with more than one shot in your turn they take an additional 1d6 points of damage for each successful shot at the end of your turn. For example if a single target was struck with four shots, three from your main hand and one from your off-hand, you deal an additional 3d6 points of damage. Monster - The Gog Gog Concept Sketch - SickJoe The terror of the Gog is known across Vaetia. The Gog are a pestilence that every country has seemingly had to deal with at least once. Once they find their way to civilized people the Gog spread like wildfire and can repopulate at an alarming rate. Entire towns have been shut off and burned to help stem the infection. Gog Pup's, as they a re sometimes referred to, are born with an overwhelming hunger. They seek out living or dead things to feast on and rarely hesitate to kill and feast on the living. Once satiated, or at least not starved, the Gog reproduces over one hundred caterpillar like spawn that grow underground Gog will find a dead host, and then sit upon their back, digging their head through the base of the dead hosts skull exchanging their mouth for the human mouth. They then wrap their legs around the spine where nerve endings attach to the dead hosts nervous system. In this way they gain complete control over the dead corpse. This new body allows the Gog to move faster, cling to various surfaces, and mutate the host to be far deadlier. This common Gog is known as a Gog Runner due to they high land speed. Though it is even worse when a Gog manages to bond with a living host... Greed Witch Concept Sketch - Blue Collar Boneyards Concept Today nearly all the writing is done for the campaign. I am looking to start a series of books detailing the world of Memento Mori. The Kickstarter will begin the series starting with these three: Memento Mori: Ars Technica - This book will detail the custom classes, archetypes, feats, backgrounds, equipment and other custom rules and features of Memento Mori. Memento Mori: Magic and Marvels - This book will detail the custom spells, magical items and marvels of the campaign. Memento Mori: Vaetia - This book will detail the various countries, cultures, wilderness, politics, and history of Vaetia. Vaetia is the continent where the campaign setting focuses upon. I will work on and release one at a time. Smaller books have smaller printing costs, and this works to lower the costs further. When the kickstarter finished I would start by getting everything ready to get one of the three books finished. Hire the artists and begin getting the layouts ready. This run through I've decided to cut some costs by shifting some of my expectations. The books will all be softcover, black and white interior with full color cover. Each book I expect to be approximately sixty pages. We will be using DriveThruRPG to fulfill all the lower tier pledges. If you select a tier where you are asking for only digital rewards and PDF copies, or select just purchasing one copy of the book, you will be be given a code as each book is finished to download (in the case of PDF's) from DriveThruRPG. For those purchasing special the books, or opting in for the physical rewards, such as the limited signed edition or initiative tracker, you will have to add a shipping cost to your pledge. You will get your books shipped in the mail from US. Electus Concept Art - Blue Collar Boneyards We will be running two stretch goal systems during the pledging. The first will be for additional funding, while second will be for Facebook Shares and Likes. Social Media Stretch Goals We are looking to spread the word far and wide. As such we are asking for everyone to 'Like' the Luna publishing page. Shares matter. we will be creating a post for others to share. Depending on the number of shares that post has we will increase the benefits: Facebook Page Link 50 Likes - We will include pre-made characters as a Digital Reward for those hoping to jump into the game. 100 Likes - We will include a short, one-page mini adventure for jumping into the game. 250 Likes - We will make all the art downloadable. 500 Likes -We will include character art and monster art in premade setups for printing and crafting pawns from. Twitter Retweets/Likes @luna_publishing 250 - We will work on making as many of our art assets Roll20 / Fantasy Grounds Astral Tabletop compatible as possible. 500 - The Quartz Rose, a strange and famous author, has agreed to write articles about various events going on all over the world. Twice a month for a year, and available for free. 1000 - We will craft a 'Memento Mori' cheat book. A printable booklet that will be able to be given to new players to help them understand and creature characters for this setting! Funding Stretch Goals $6,000 - Uncommon Races are now included. Say hello to the Dhampir, Promethean, and the Changeling. I will give some details of each continent into the books, instead of just Vaetia. $7,000 - We want more! Add at least 25 pages of more material to each of the three books. $8,000 - Books will be printed full color. $9,000 - Reference Deck - Cards that hold important information about various topics in Memento Mori. Great for quick GM reference, or for players to help remember. Print on Cardstock for best results as this is a digital reward. $10,000 - Books will be all Hard Cover. $12,000 - Double the art! $15,000 - Memento Mori - Horrors of Vaetia : This book will be a sort of Monster Manual for Vaetia. We have over a dozen monsters already made for Memento Mori, and several edited ones. We plan on building over sixty creatures to use in this book, and being that each creature will need at least one or two pictures made in color it will be the most expensive to make. Digital Reward backers will get the PDF as a bonus, and physical reward backers will receive the actual book. This book will be the last to be made, and will increase fulfillment time. Digital Rewards Customized Character Sheets Concept - Not Finalized Physical Rewards Though our Digital rewards are somewhat dependent on Facebook stretch goals reached, our Physical Rewards are already planned out. Gamemaster's Screen Concept - Not Finalized Poster Map Final Style will be determined by Backer Vote Memento Mori T-Shirt Concept - Not Finalized Player Character Journal Concept - Not Finalized Dungeon Master Adventure Tome Concept - Not Finalized Skull Inspiration Token Physical Add-ons At the end of the Kickstarter I will be allowing all of you to increase your pledges and payments in order to purchase various addons. Anyone purchasing our Physical addons will not be charged shipping as these addons will be with your physical rewards. Everyone else may have to pay for shipping. $15 Extra Book - If you want an extra copy of one of the books just let us know. The price is per book, not per set. Digital pledges can also use this to get a physical book, but would require the pledger to pay an extra $5 for shipping. $40 Extra Book Set - An extra set of all three books. $50 Limited Edition Book - Seperate Limited Edition copy for those pledging at the Alienist, Witchcraft and Weird Science, or the Explorer level. $15 Memento Mori T-Shirt $15 Poster Map $20 Art Poster - Pick one of our artwork pieces to make a poster out of it. I will have examples set once more art for the books. $30 - Custom Dungeon Masters Screen $10 Dungeon Masters Journal $10 Player Character Journal $8 Set of 4 Inspiration Tokens "With an emphasis on the natural world and its sometimes macabre nature, I explore the small details and large questions of life through my work. I dabble in character design, fantasy settings, and often times volatile and unpredictable medium. " Augustinas Raginskis "I am an illustrator and designer, I work full time as a freelance artist on games, tabletop games, books and so on. I enjoy various types of projects rather than focusing on one specific thing and most of my work consist of creating the concepts and then illustrating environments, characters and items. All this started as hobby and I still work on personal projects all the time. " Link to other projects Augustinas Raginskis has worked on. SickJoe has worked on a number of comics and projects including Contagion, Trauma, and Hellgorythm. Gregory Lucas - Main author, designer, and mental case that crafted Memento Mori. When not working as a teacher he designs, plays, and is generally immersed in RPG games as he has for the last twenty-five years. G. Rae Lucas - Graphic designer, her husband's muse, and abnormally obsessed Scott Snyder fangirl. Works as a graphic designer, but prefers making many of the illustrative assets used in publication.

LGBTQ people deserve love, respect and to be included into the religious communities they belong to but far too many evangelical churches isolate, condemn and push out queer folx from their communities. I want to remind the people that go to these churches the they are hurting their queer family, friends and neighbors and to encourage them to rethink the choice to attend and fund homophobic churches. So... I'm making some stickers and I need your help because I can't order one at a time. These are small black vinyl 5x5" stickers with white text that demands people, �Stop Going To Homophobic Churches�. Perfect for placing anywhere you think they might be useful. I had three audiences in mind when I made these. Queer Folx - Centering marginalized people is the best way I know how to do a good job, and these stickers show our queer friends, family and selves that homophobia has no place in our cities, neighborhoods and especially not in our churches. People entering or leaving a non-affirming church - I believe that many people attending churches that are non-affirming are looking past the backward sexual ethic of many evangelical churches because they value the spiritual connection. Helping point out that the church they are attending is actively hurting queer people with their views and policies will hopefully make an impact on those people. Bystanders - I think it's also valuable for people not in those two groups to see these stickers and this particular slogan to remind them that there are queer christians and there are churches that both affirm and support their LGBTQ members. Homophobic on Purpose I choose to say "homophobic churches" in the text of the sticker specifically because it's more aggressive and attention grabbing and because the long form of, �Stop going to churches that refuse to accept various sexual and gender identities as valid, including stopping those with various gender identities and sexual preferences that are contested by bigoted readings of the Bible from volunteering and participating in the full life of the church" but the stickers got long. This is not a lot of money. Why not just pay for them? Great question - I'm about five months into shifting my full-time job away from a career in programming and toward a less certain business as a film maker (meaning I'm very, very broke). This project has been waiting at least that long for me to have the money and time to order the stickers, so I'm reaching out for help to get this project launched! And what if you raise more than $200? As far as the amount of money raised, I need at least $200 to get a reasonable price for the stickers and will just order more if we exceed the funding goal. The goal is to have enough stickers to both fulfill the rewards as well as having enough left over to keep them for sale going forward. If we raise more than $500 I'll take the extra to help fund a billboard project with the same intent with the below artwork - I've found a local company that has a few digital billboards for rent at pretty reasonable prices (starting at $20) Stop Going To Homophobic Churches

Rocket Age 5e Welcome to the 1938 that never was and the Solar System that should have been! Rocket Age is a radium punk sci-fi game of exploring the Solar System, fighting Nazis, Stalinists, aliens, and the bizarre environments of nine planets (yes nine, it is 1938 and Pluto is still a full fledged planet). It is a game of ancient ruins on Mars, the steaming jungles of Venus, strange life in the clouds of Jupiter, RAY guns, chromed rocket ships, radium fuel, hot exhaust, and fins. So many fins on things you didn't know you could put fins on. The setting is a kitchen sink sandbox for you to set your games in. Want to be the brave explorer discovering lost civilizations and new wonders? We have that on Venus, Mars, Jupiter, the Jovian Moons, and more. Looking for a daring game of brinksmanship as you battle agents of foreign powers (even alien nations)? Choose whom you want to fight and who you want to fight for, such as the Americans, British, French, Nazis, Soviets, Martian princes, or the enigmatic Europans. The Rocket Age first launched in 2013 using the Vortex system (we call that version Rocket Age Classic) and won an ENnie in 2014. Since then we have added four sourcebooks, an adventure path, a fiction anthology, and 13 adventures. In that time Rocket Age has gone from its original publisher to being owned and published by its creator, Ken Spencer and his company Why Not Games. We love Rocket Age and we want to bring it to everyone. 5e allows us to invite more people into the Rocket Age. From the beginning we did not want to do a simple conversion, we knew that to make system and setting work best we would have to adapt both. Where possible we have kept the core of the 5e engine, you can use Rocket Age (5e) with your full collection of 5e products. We have species (instead of races), classes, armor class, hit points and dice, proficiencies, and so forth. Rocket Age (5e) has a plethora of alien creatures to interact with, but we want you to be able to pull any monster out of whatever 5e compatible monster guide you might want. Where something had to be changed in the setting, most notably the availability of psychic powers, we made small changes as needed. The result is a merging of system and setting, not just a welding of one to another. Now, eighteen months later nearly two years worth of work has come to fruition in the Rocket Age (5e) Corebook. The game is written, playtested, filled with art, and through the magic of our graphic designer, being turned in to a completed book. We would like you to join us on this final leg of the journey and bring the Rocket Age into a brand new era. For our long time fans, Rocket Age Classic is not going anywhere. From here on out all Rocket Age products will be offered in different versions, one for each system. These will not be dual stat blocks, but different books, one for Rocket Age Classic and one for Rocket Age (5e). We don�t like dual stat block books; they just add pages and make it harder to find what you are looking for. To our new fans, this is just the beginning. In the coming months we will adapt the entire catalog of Rocket Age, from Blood Red Mars to Imperial Jupiter. For both old and new fans, there is more of the Rocket Age to explore and we have plans for new adventures, new sourcebooks, new fiction, and more. You can follow us at: www.whynotgames.com, our FaceBook page, and the unofficial Rocket Age fan group on Facebook. Inside Rocket Age (5e) you will find: Foreword by Ed Greenwood 17 playable species from the bizarrely alien Europans to the ape-like Venusians, including all seven Martian castes. Two species, Ioites and Robomen, are highly varied in psychical form, allowing you to customize your character from an extensive list of species traits. 5 New classes suitable for play in Rocket age or any sci-fi or pulp style game. Each has a set of subclasses to allow you to flesh out or customize your character. Will you be an Agent working for a larger organization, an Explorer pushing the boundaries of the known Solar System, a Scientist uncovering the wonders of the material world, a shifty Scoundrel getting by any way they can, or a stalwart Soldier standing between danger and their loved ones? A system of psychic powers not tied to species or class, nor using a Vanican system. In Rocket Age (5e) anyone can be a psychic, but what will you give up for the weird powers of the mind? 19 new feats for those of you using that optional system. Will you be an Ace or travel with a Boon Companion? Do you Dance it Out or have Resourceful Pockets? All the equipment you will need for adventures in the Rocket Age! We've got RAY guns, disintegrators, Martian silthanka, Ganymedian heart bows, Europan pain batons, and much more. Armor, weapons, tools, clothing, technological gear, refurbished Ancient Martian tech, it is all in there! Complete and comprehensive vehicle rules for everything from a motorcycle blasting across the sands of Mars to mighty rocket ships blazing beams through the void of space. These rules interact directly with class archetypes and feats, making the entire system integrated from character creation to game play. The entire Solar System of Rocket Age covered in detail. Each entry offers not just the history, geography, and culture of a place, a sample NPC to interact with as well as three story hooks tied to that place and the beings from there. With a little imagination and some friends you can play Rocket Age straight out of the book. Ancient Artifacts from the lost civilizations of Mars and Venus. These items use esoteric sciences beyond that which even the brightest minds of 1938 can devise, so using them is a bit more than dusting them off and hitting the 'ON' switch. A big part of Rocket Age is the thrill of discovery, and our Artifact Analysis system makes all that possible with a single die roll, but be careful, there might be unintended consequences to powering up that weird bit of ancient tech. Disclaimer: Why Not Games is not responsible for anything that happens when you let lizard monkeys play with ancient artifacts. A bestiary of all the strange, exotic, and down right alien creatures found in the Solar System. Ride bahmoots across Mars, run from the thunder lizards of Venus, dodge kilometer long tentacles of the mighty Jovian gasbags, or get a tesselon as a pet. In addition to these nasty critters, there are plenty of NPCs to befriend of battle, including everyone's favorite punch receiver, Nazis! Written by Ken Spencer, the creator of Rocket Age, with a cover by ReOnna Smith, and interior art by Paul Bourne, Brain Eads, Jon Hodgson, David King, Scott Purdy, Peter Saga, and Miguel Santos. Rocket Age (5e) is fully compatible with Pulp Fantastic from Battlefield press. In fact, Ken Spencer wrote the system mechanics for both. You should check them out while you are here on Kickstarter. They're good people and make great games. All of our stretch goals are in pdf. We are a small operation and producing stretch goals is a challenge, one that we barely made with our last kickstarter. Introduction: My name is Benjamin Sommers. This past year, my friends Eliot Nafziger and Juan Castaneda and I created a local art magazine highlighting various young creatives within Goshen, Indiana. Due to the support of the community we were able to successfully print and distribute over 225 copies containing artwork from over 25 artists. Vision: Our focus for this edition is humans� relationship with technology and its implications. As phones, computers, and the cloud are becoming tools we use on a daily basis, we would like to look at the various ways in which this has altered our shared existence. Our final product will reflect both positive and negative effects. We believe that combining talented artists with this theme will create a meaningful look at our relationship with technology through the lens of art. We are also expanding the pool of talent to include writers, educators, and advocates. This will strengthen the content and introduce new perspectives to our magazine. Logistics: This year, we are hoping to raise $300 through our Kickstarter and over $400 through corporate sponsorship. We will be expanding both the length of the magazine and the number of copies created, which will demand a large amount of initial capital. The specific quantity created will be determined by the amount of money raised. We guarantee at least 200 copies to be created if our $300 goal is met. Ideally, we would love to double this figure. Through your help, we can make this a reality. Additionally, we are planning a release event for the magazine in spring. More details on this event will be released in the future, but we plan to rent out a downtown space and feature our magazine, local art, as well as locally produced clothing from Eliot Nafziger�s brand: 6th Street Clothing. Your support will also go towards funding this event. Lastly, we will be filming and producing another short documentary covering the process behind the magazine, as well as artists� and individuals� perspectives on the ways in which technology affects our lives. Through a form submission process and a scheduling tool, we are streamlining our content collection to be completed by the end of August. Moving ahead, we will have months to work extensively on the editing, compiling, and finalization of our magazine, documentary, and launch event. If you have any interest in supporting young local creativity, please donate to our project! We believe Goshen is a city full of vibrant life and culture, and we want to display our perspective on technology while supporting talent.

My name is Weshoyot Alvitre and I am a Tongva/Scottish comic book artist and illustrator. This book, TOYPURINA: OUR LADY OF SORROWS, was a response to a personal project I have wanted to do for years. What started out as a month long story telling exercise to finally lay down some foundation stones for a longer graphic novel, has taken on a life of its own. I started this book last year on October 1 as drawing exercise to coincide with the popular #Inktober hashtag. I began each day with the set word prompt. I did not sketch out any ideas prior, but allowed this to be an exercise in trying to tell a linear story, connecting the pages each day in a larger story, but allowing it to develop organically to see where this story and these characters would take me. I did not know where this would end by day 31. Or what it would begin. And I did not realize that the work that would amount over the month of October would not only create a preview into the graphic novel I plan to do, but would impact as many people as it did. I actually finished a few days earlier, intentionally. I made it my personal goal to set the completion date of all story pages on October 25, to coincide with the anniversary of the revolt of 1785. I then decided to make 50 copies of books, collecting all 31 pages with a brief introduction and a few pages of sketches. I bound those in deer hide, which I cut, bound and branded into the cover the name TOYPURINA. I sold out. You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content. Play Replay with sound Play with sound 00:00 00:00 The goal of this Kickstarter is to take those original 31 pages and reprint them in a larger size, (approx 8" x 11") along with an extended forward and sketch section, to be available for anyone who missed out on the original print run. I have since been contacted by numerous Tongva people, University level educators, etc. and would like to make this story accessible to them. I would love to add to this book some of the research notes, mission records, etc. I have discovered since last October. I would also like to include some of the script I will be working on this summer for the larger, extended graphic novel that will come after this book is launched. Any funds that go over the goal will be put directly towards the larger graphic novel. This book will reprint everything that was included in those small handmade books from October of 2018, and include extra materials to further flesh out my plans for this future project. The artwork is done. I already have a Native based print company to do the printing on the book, Lee Francis of Native Realities has offered to help with distribution of the book. For the rewards, I have asked Native based screen print shop SABAWEAR to do hand screen-printed shirts. All I need is your support!

There you have the basic summary. A story that goes past the concepts of a world run by machines. In most stories, the heroes will always win, but what happens when there isn't anyone to stand up and fight the unjust? What do people fight for in a world that just no longer cares? What happens when: Grim Indications. Abandon Hope. Burned it all, nothing left breathing. Past the concepts of a dystopian life of humanity, A look at what it means to be human. What it means to be a machine. What constitutes a personality, what does truly existing really mean? This horror is philosophical in nature, with blood and gore taking back seat to utter despair. The psychological thrills start from the very first page, for not so obvious reasons. This story is one giant Thrill, where nothing is on accident. The Recycled Society. A dark story, staring unblinking at the abyss of the dark side of humanity. A group fighting overwhelmingly powerful corporations and cruel merciless groups of mechanized assassins who would love nothing more to dye the world red. A unique story that I hope to shock you with, in as many ways as possible. That is Mechanized Fabrications. Against Overwhelming odds. Sample Part of a page. Thoughts. Who are the main characters? While there are central characters, there really isn't anyone I consider a main character. But for the sake of an introduction, I chose 3 characters. Grey Lives - An amnesiac whose memory comes back fragmented, he carries an optimistic outlook, an almost criminal perspective. He has one working eye, secrets aplenty that even he is unaware of, and a desire to help. Even more interesting, he has a last name, something most do not... Gray Lives Laura- A woman one part brilliant, 3 parts vengeance. She lost everything, and holds a grudge against most every Mechanized. Dead set on seeing everyone responsible for her past to be destroyed, her mentality may sometimes affect her personality. Kindhearted, but a no-nonsense person, she is usually paired up with Gray, rubbing abrasively against his personality. Despite this, she prefers Gray to most any human alive. Stewart- A mechanized penguin. The Kickstarter exclusive story explains more about him. A hacker's paradise, he more than not earns his place in the resistance. This little guy is a technological marvel, even by this story's futuristic standards. Laura and Stewart What is this story even about really?!? Well, disembodied voice, to be frankly categorized, this series is a Psychological Science Fiction Thriller. It follows an unnamed resistance group facing a world dominated by only a few. It does take place on this planet, make no mistake, but it is disfigured beyond recognition. Mankind Society has collapsed and no one knows why. In addition to being as disruptive against the mega corporations as possible, our heroes may just find out the horrible, twisted truth behind the current world. It's a journey through a rough landscape, bringing an ever increasing (and decreasing...) cast of unique characters towards a singular goal. There is a small element of mystery as well, as the characters, as well as the reader, are given pieces to a complex puzzle that explains everything. I am not a believer of anything being completely good, or evil, and incorporate that into my storytelling. I believe the readers will enjoy this ambiguity, as I do my best to give everyone depth. While one could side with the resistance, one can also understand the various other sides as well. While gloom and doom make up the story's main drive, this is not a tale without it's moments of playing with your emotions. I hope to craft something that leaves a lasting impact on everyone who reads it! A shut off Utopia, looking in from the outside. Okay, so that's all great an' all, but what do i get from this? Well, okay, pushy voice, I shall show you, in pictures! As you can see through this, my main focus is to get the story to everyone, and be allowed the funds to continue the story for quite awhile. This is the mock-up of what the cover of issue one looks like: Cover for Issue 1 Okaaaaay... Neat. So, who is behind this machination? As of right now, I am a one person crew. Names Sebastian. I enjoy life and its freedoms as well as it's challenges. As an avid reader of comics and manga since, forever, I really want to contribute. This book is my contribution to the world and to the media as a whole. The world may change, but the universe remains the same. Remembrance. I like to think, and I've been doing art my entire life. I love to do things that make people think and think this story will accomplish that more than I could ever dream. I hope that everyone starts this journey with me into this dark world. Questions! Questions! Okay Mr. Story-teller, how will I get this book? The people ordering digital only get it emailed within a week of this campaign's completion. People ordering just the book will receive it directly from Ka-Blam printing. People who paid a little extra will receive it from myself after I sign it, as well as mailing the special art with anyone who asked. I've been a comic book collector for as long as I've been an artist, rest assured, I will be doing everything to ensure is arrives in it's best condition. Hmm... Fine. Anything I should be worried about? Check out the risks and rewards section for details. Am I forgetting to ask you anything? Well, if you are... Feel free to email me at Lhtema@yahoo.com with any inquiries you may have!

EN - I�m Fausto Podavini, a freelance photographer. I prefer medium to long-term projects because, in a time when everything is quickly consumed, I think it�s important to take some time and elaborate subjects that could easily go unnoticed, such as social and environmental issues. Two of my long-term projects, �MiRelLa� and �Omo Change� won the World Press Photo Award respectively in 2013 and 2018, and now, after six years of work, the will is to make Omo Change a book. ITA - Sono Fausto Podavini, fotogiornalista freelance. Prediligo lavori a medio lungo termine perch�, in un�epoca dove tutto si consuma velocemente, ritengo importante soffermarsi ed approfondire tematiche che altrimenti potrebbero passare inosservate, come quelle di carattere sociale ed ambientale. Due dei miei long term project, MiRelLa ed Omo Change sono stati premiati con il World Press Photo rispettivamente nel 2013 e nel 2018, ed ora, dopo sei anni di lavoro, la volont� � quella di fare diventare Omo Change un libro. EN - In 2011, I visited Northern Ethiopia for the first time to work on a project about the Tewahedo religion. From there I moved to the Tigray region and there I came to learn about what would become the biggest investment in Ethiopia, the construction of the highest dam in all of Africa, in the southern part of the country. I don�t know why exactly, surely for an interest in environmental issues, but a bell rang inside me and I decided to start researching and found out, among other things, that this dam would be built on the Omo River, the biggest and most important river in Ethiopia that, crossing the country towards south, creates its the Omo Valley before entering Kenya and becoming the Turkana Lake. In the waters of a river, the fate of two countries. ITA - Nel 2011 entrai per la prima volta in Etiopia del Nord per un lavoro sulla religione Tawaedho ed � l�, nella regione del Tigrai, che venni a conoscenza di quello che sarebbe stato il pi� grande investimento fatto in Etiopia, la costruzione dell�attuale pi� alta diga di tutta l�Africa, nel Sud del paese. Non so bene perch�, di sicuro per un interesse verso temi di carattere ambientale, ma un campanello risuon� dentro di me e comincia cos� a documentarmi per scoprire, tra le altre cose, che la diga sarebbe stata costruita sul fiume Omo, ovvero il corso d�acqua pi� grande ed importante dell�Etiopia. Scorrendo verso sud, il fiume Omo attraversa l�omonima valle per terminare il suo percorso in Kenya e diventare lago Turkana. Nelle acque di un fiume, il destino di due paesi. Photo (B) EN - The Omo Valley, the land that gave birth to humanity, is one of the most incredible areas in the African continent. This place is wild, difficult, charming and unique, and unique are the people living there. Divided in various ethnicities, each with their own rights, colors and customs, but all united by the same dependence; the river. Their tribal rites and essential homes reveal a deep balance with nature. Even with lots of difficulties, living aligned with nature is possible and the Omo Valley and its inhabitants were the perfect example. ITA - La Valle dell�Omo, la terra che diede i natali all'umanit�, � una delle zone pi� incredibili dell�intera Africa. E� un posto selvaggio, difficile, affascinante, unico, come uniche sono le persone che lo vivono. Divise in varie etnie, tutte con le loro prerogative, i loro colori e le loro usanze, sono unite da una stessa dipendenza, quella dal fiume. Riti tribali, abitazioni essenziali, sguardi profondi equilibrio perfetto con la natura. Anche se con mille difficolt� � possibile vivere in sintonia con la natura e la Valle dell�Omo e la sua gente ne era un perfetto esempio. Photo (C) EN - This is how I started my project �Omo Change�; the crazy idea of documenting the before, during and after of what would become the social and environmental changes linked to the building of the Gibe III, the biggest Ethiopian development project. For six years I lived the Omo Valley and met Karo, Hamar, Daasanach and Bodi. I held hands, I received smiles, I felt their warmth. I breathed their lifestyle, their tribal rituals, I ate and slept with them in their villages, trying to understand them as much as possible. While my project continued so did the works for the constructions of the dam. I was hoping nothing would change for these tribes, but I had to think again every time I went there. I watched helplessly, but always with my camera to document the consequences of what is way too easily defined as 'development.' Although the Ethiopian constitution provides for consultation with this tribes about everything regarding a development plan, the construction of the Gibe III dam imposed on their life, changing it and leaving these people as unaware viewers of their own changes, modifying forever their culture and habits, but relegating them to the margins of a society that is no longer their own, but a new forms of colonization: economic investments. ITA - Ho iniziato cos� il mio progetto Omo Change. Un�idea folle; voler documentare il prima, il durante e il dopo di quello che sarebbero stati gli eventuali cambiamenti sociali ed ambientali collegati alla costruzione della Gibe III, il pi� grande progetto Etiope. Per 6 anni ho vissuto la Valle dell�Omo, ho conosciuto Karo, Hamar, Daasanach, Bodi. Ho stretto mani, ho ricevuto sorrisi, ho sentito il loro calore. Ho respirato le loro usanze e i loro riti tribali, ho mangiato con loro e dormito nei loro villaggi, cercando per quanto possibile di comprenderli. E mentre negli anni il mio lavoro procedeva cos� come avanzavano i lavori di costruzione della diga, ho sperato che nulla sarebbe cambiato per questi popoli, dovendomi per� ricredere viaggio dopo viaggio. Ho assistito inerme se non con la mia macchina fotografica che le documentasse, a quelle conseguenze che troppo semplicemente si definiscono sviluppo. Bench� la costituzione etiope preveda la consultazione di questi popoli per ci� che riguarda eventuali piani di sviluppo, l�opera della costruzione della diga Gibe III si � abbattuta sulle loro vite, trasformandole e lasciandoli spettatori inconsapevoli del loro stesso cambiamento, modificando per sempre le loro culture e le loro abitudini, relegandoli ai margini di una societ� non pi� loro ma basata su nuove forme di colonizzazione: gli investimenti economici. EN - Not happy to only document the changes of the Omo Valley (Omo Change), to testify about one on the biggest environmental impacts in the Horn of Africa caused by mankind, I felt the need to travel to the Turkana Lake. Living in this area is very hard, and the lake, the main livelihood for the Turkana ethnic group, is also shrinking, due to the reduced flow of water from the Omo River. The lake shrank so much that even UNESCO noticed and decided to identify it as a �World Heritage in Danger�. This has been decided by the World Heritage Committee of the United Nations during the recent congress in Manama, Bahrein (June 24th � July 4th 2018). ITA - Non contento di assistere al cambiamento della valle dell�Omo, (l�Omo Change), per poter essere testimone di uno dei pi� grandi impatti ambientali del Corno d�Africa causati dall�uomo, ho sentito la necessit� di spingermi fino al lago Turkana. In una delle zone pi� difficili da vivere, il lago Turkana, principale sostentamento per l�etnia dei Turkana si sta ritirato anche a causa del poco afflusso di acqua da parte dell�Omo. Si � ritirato talmente tanto che se ne � accorta anche l�UNESCO, definendo il Turkana "Patrimonio mondiale in pericolo". Lo ha deciso il World Heritage Commitee delle Nazioni Unite durante il recente congresso a Manama, in Bahrein (24 Giugno, 4 Luglio 2018). Photo (E) EN - �Omo Change� is all of this: a document, a scream, a meditation, an awareness, an act of love for a land that is disappearing and that is showing us, without filters, of what humankind in the guise of multinational corporations is capable of. A spotlight from the prospective of those who are forced to suffer the imposition of change, an awareness that if the price to pay it�s too high, we will have to take a different direction. �Omo Change� could help us understand where to go. ITA - Omo Change � tutto questo; una documentazione, un grido, una riflessione, una consapevolezza, un atto d�amore per una terra che sta scomparendo e che ci fa vedere, senza filtri, di cosa l�uomo nelle vesti delle multinazionali sia oggi capace. Un faro puntato sulla prospettiva di chi � costretto a subire l�imposizione del cambiamento, consapevoli che se il prezzo da pagare � troppo alto, bisogner� intraprendere altre direzioni e Omo Change potrebbe aiutarci a comprendere quali. EN - Take part with me and FotoEvidence in the realization of the book, to allow this documentation to enter the memory of our time like a scream full of hope for a more sustainable world and to start reflections on how massive investments, hidden under the word �development,� could put at risk the balance between mankind and nature that were nurtured over hundreds of years. ITA - Partecipa anche tu, insieme a me e a FotoEvidence alla realizzazione del libro, per fare in modo che questa documentazione possa entrare nella memoria del nostro tempo come un grido di speranza per un mondo pi� sostenibile, e muovere cos� riflessioni su come degli investimenti imponenti mascherati sotto la parola sviluppo, possano mettere a rischio equilibri uomo/natura consolidati in centinaia di anni. Allocation of funds EN - The book, with a square format of 25x25 cm, will be printed on Arctic Volume Ivory 150 gr paper with a hard and hand bound cover. This kind of bookbinding, called �swiss open� allow you to browse the book and to open the pages without the annoying �wave effect�. This way you can appreciate the quality of the print especially for the pictures printed on double-page. The book will contain about 70 photographs and about 120 pages. There will be 750 copies with text in two languages, Italian and English. The book will be edited by R�gina Monfort, from the FotoEvidence team, who has a broad experience building long-form narratives. Questo tipo di rilegatura, molto dispendiosa e denominata Swiss Open, permette di sfogliare il libro aprendo le pagine senza il fastidioso effetto "onda", cos� da godere a pieno della qualit� di stampa in maniera particolare sulle foto in doppia pagina. CROSSING will be a six-issue mini-series and we are here on Kickstarter to print Issue 4 and bring CROSSING back to Comic Con International this July. Plus, in a series first, we�re printing an exclusive Invisible Woman Variant. CROSSING #4 cover and variant cover art by Alex Cormack. 100 signed & numbered variant editions will be printed exclusively for this campaign. Despite some pretty mature, heavy-hitting themes (crime, suicide, railroad safety) the series is a comedy about two people who wouldn't like each other under normal circumstances--much less paranormal--but have to find a way to work together if they ever want to be free of each other. Our next issue is in the final stages, and a print run of 400 copies, plus 100 of the signed and numbered Invisible Woman Variant (Kickstarter Exclusive), are guaranteed when we hit 100% funding. Script for the entire series is complete and we'll be rolling straight into Issues #5- 6 after we're funded. This series is happening, people, but we need you to help us get to the other side! Our Story In Part 1, after a meet-cute with a locomotive, DARC train engineer, M.C. Tejada, is haunted by the ghost of Nina Goldman, a goth girl with a grudge. He says her death was suicide, She knows she was murdered, and not by the poor guy who ran her over. The relationship is a roller coaster of pain for both parties, but Nina is convinced she would never have killed herself and she can't cross over until M.C. helps her solve her case. Enrica Jang (writer) is the writer and creator of AZTECA, Angel With a Bullet, The House of Montresor, and editor of the annual Red Stylo Presents series of anthologies. Her screenplay The Freshmen was made into a short film, Frienemies, winner of a CINE Golden Eagle in 2011. Alex Cormack (artist) is an illustrator living in Tyngsboro MA with his wife, Ashley, and three cats Danger, Destruction, and Disaster. He was an independent animator before diving into comics. He has worked with many publishers such as ComixTribe, Bliss on Tap, Red Stylo Media as well as numerous freelance writers, and has been published by Image comics and IDW. For more info please look at his website www.AlexCormack.com Mark Mullaney (logo, color, letters) is a three-time Emmy-nominated animator and artist from Boston, Massachusetts. See more of his work at landofthedisinterested.tumblr.com. Backers can either find the THIRD RAIL reward in the list OR add the bundle to your package at any level!
